GE09ram_02_u:001.001a: kasya cit tv atha kālasya rājā daśarathaḥ sutam
GE09ram_02_u:001.002c: tvāṃ netum āgato vīra yudhājin mātulas tava
GE09ram_02_u:001.005c: svapuraṃ prāviśad vīraḥ pitā tasya tutoṣa ha
GE09ram_02_u:001.006a: sa tatra nyavasad bhrātrā saha satkārasatkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:001.007a: tatrāpi nivasantau tau tarpyamāṇau ca kāmataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:001.007c: bhrātarau smaratāṃ vīrau vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_02_u:001.008a: rājāpi tau mahātejāḥ sasmāra proṣitau sutau
GE09ram_02_u:001.009a: sarva eva tu tasyeṣṭāś catvāraḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:001.010a: teṣām api mahātejā rāmo ratikaraḥ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:001.011a: gate ca bharate rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:001.012c: cakāra rāmo dharmātmā priyāṇi ca hitāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:001.014a: evaṃ daśarathaḥ prīto brāhmaṇā naigamās tathā
GE09ram_02_u:001.015a: sa hi nityaṃ praśāntātmā mṛdupūrvaṃ ca bhāṣate
GE09ram_02_u:001.016c: na smaraty apakārāṇāṃ śatam apy ātmavattayā
GE09ram_02_u:001.017c: kathayann āsta vai nityam astrayogyāntareṣv api
GE09ram_02_u:001.022a: arthadharmau ca saṃgṛhya sukhatantro na cālasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:001.024c: apradhṛṣyaś ca saṃgrāme kruddhair api surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:001.025a: anasūyo jitakrodho na dṛpto na ca matsarī
GE09ram_02_u:001.025c: na cāvamantā bhūtānāṃ na ca kālavaśānugaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:001.026a: evaṃ śraiṣṭhair guṇair yuktaḥ prajānāṃ pārthivātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:001.027c: guṇair viruruce rāmo dīptaḥ sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:001.029a: etais tu bahubhir yuktaṃ guṇair anupamaiḥ sutam
GE09ram_02_u:001.029c: dṛṣṭvā daśaratho rājā cakre cintāṃ paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:001.030a: eṣā hy asya parā prītir hṛdi saṃparivartate
GE09ram_02_u:001.030c: kadā nāma sutaṃ drakṣyāmy abhiṣiktam ahaṃ priyam
GE09ram_02_u:001.031c: mattaḥ priyataro loke parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān
GE09ram_02_u:001.033a: mahīm aham imāṃ kṛtsnām adhitiṣṭhantam ātmajam
GE09ram_02_u:001.033c: anena vayasā dṛṣṭvā yathā svargam avāpnuyām
GE09ram_02_u:001.034a: taṃ samīkṣya mahārājo yuktaṃ samuditair guṇaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:001.037a: sa labdhamānair vinayānvitair nṛpaiḥ; purālayair jānapadaiś ca mānavaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:001.037c: upopaviṣṭair nṛpatir vṛto babhau; sahasracakṣur bhagavān ivāmaraiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:002.002c: svareṇa mahatā rājā jīgmūta iva nādayan
GE09ram_02_u:002.005a: idaṃ śarīraṃ kṛtsnasya lokasya caratā hitam
GE09ram_02_u:002.008a: so 'haṃ viśramam icchāmi putraṃ kṛtvā prajāhite
GE09ram_02_u:002.009a: anujāto hi me sarvair guṇair jyeṣṭho mamātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:002.010a: taṃ candram iva puṣyeṇa yuktaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
GE09ram_02_u:002.011a: anurūpaḥ sa vo nātho lakṣmīvāṃl lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:002.011c: trailokyam api nāthena yena syān nāthavattaram
GE09ram_02_u:002.012a: anena śreyasā sadyaḥ saṃyojyāham imāṃ mahīm
GE09ram_02_u:002.012c: gatakleśo bhaviṣyāmi sute tasmin niveśya vai
GE09ram_02_u:002.013a: iti bruvantaṃ muditāḥ pratyanandan nṛpā nṛpam
GE09ram_02_u:002.014c: ūcuś ca manasā jñātvā vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_02_u:002.016a: iti tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājā teṣāṃ manaḥpriyam
GE09ram_02_u:002.016c: ajānann iva jijñāsur idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:002.017a: kathaṃ nu mayi dharmeṇa pṛthivīm anuśāsati
GE09ram_02_u:002.018a: te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ paurajānapadaiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:002.018c: bahavo nṛpa kalyāṇā guṇāḥ putrasya santi te
GE09ram_02_u:002.021c: mṛduś ca sthiracittaś ca sadā bhavyo 'nasūyakaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:002.022a: priyavādī ca bhūtānāṃ satyavādī ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:002.023a: tenāsyehātulā kīrtir yaśas tejaś ca vardhate
GE09ram_02_u:002.024a: yadā vrajati saṃgrāmaṃ grāmārthe nagarasya vā
GE09ram_02_u:002.025a: saṃgrāmāt punar āgamya kuñjareṇa rathena vā
GE09ram_02_u:002.027a: śuśrūṣante ca vaḥ śiṣyāḥ kaccit karmasu daṃśitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:002.029c: vatsaḥ śreyasi jātas te diṣṭyāsau tava rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:002.029e: diṣṭyā putraguṇair yukto mārīca iva kaśyapaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:002.030a: balam ārogyam āyuś ca rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:002.030c: āśaṃsate janaḥ sarvo rāṣṭre puravare tathā
GE09ram_02_u:002.031a: abhyantaraś ca bāhyaś ca paurajānapado janaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:002.031c: striyo vṛddhās taruṇyaś ca sāyaṃprātaḥ samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:002.034a: taṃ devadevopamam ātmajaṃ te; sarvasya lokasya hite niviṣṭam
GE09ram_02_u:002.034c: hitāya naḥ kṣipram udārajuṣṭaṃ; mudābhiṣektuṃ varada tvam arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:003.002c: yan me jyeṣṭhaṃ priyaṃ putraṃ yauvarājyastham icchatha
GE09ram_02_u:003.003a: iti pratyarcya tān rājā brāhmaṇān idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:003.004a: caitraḥ śrīmān ayaṃ māsaḥ puṇyaḥ puṣpitakānanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:003.005a: kṛtam ity eva cābrūtām abhigamya jagatpatim
GE09ram_02_u:003.006a: tataḥ sumantraṃ dyutimān rājā vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:003.006c: rāmaḥ kṛtātmā bhavatā śīghram ānīiyatām iti
GE09ram_02_u:003.007c: rāmaṃ tatrānayāṃ cakre rathena rathināṃ varam
GE09ram_02_u:003.008a: atha tatra samāsīnās tadā daśarathaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_02_u:003.008c: prācyodīcyāḥ pratīcyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca bhūmipāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:003.009a: mlecchāś cāryāś ca ye cānye vanaśailāntavāsinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:003.009c: upāsāṃ cakrire sarve taṃ devā iva vāsavam
GE09ram_02_u:003.010a: teṣāṃ madhye sa rājarṣir marutām iva vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:003.015c: āruroha nṛpaṃ draṣṭuṃ saha sūtena rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:003.016a: sa prāñjalir abhipretya praṇataḥ pitur antike
GE09ram_02_u:003.016c: nāma svaṃ śrāvayan rāmo vavande caraṇau pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:003.017a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇataṃ pārśve kṛtāñjalipuṭaṃ nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:003.019c: svayeva prabhayā merum udaye vimalo raviḥ
GE09ram_02_u:003.021a: taṃ paśyamāno nṛpatis tutoṣa priyam ātmajam
GE09ram_02_u:003.022a: sa taṃ sasmitam ābhāṣya putraṃ putravatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:003.022c: uvācedaṃ vaco rājā devendram iva kaśyapaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:003.023a: jyeṣṭhāyām asi me patnyāṃ sadṛśyāṃ sadṛśaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:003.023c: utpannas tvaṃ guṇaśreṣṭho mama rāmātmajaḥ priyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:003.024a: tvayā yataḥ prajāś cemāḥ svaguṇair anurañjitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:003.025a: kāmatas tvaṃ prakṛtyaiva vinīto guṇavān asi
GE09ram_02_u:003.025c: guṇavaty api tu snehāt putra vakṣyāmi te hitam
GE09ram_02_u:003.026a: bhūyo vinayam āsthāya bhava nityaṃ jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:003.028e: tasmāt putra tvam ātmānaṃ niyamyaiva samācara
GE09ram_02_u:003.029a: tac chrutvā suhṛdas tasya rāmasya priyakāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:003.030a: sā hiraṇyaṃ ca gāś caiva ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:003.031c: yayau svaṃ dyutimad veśma janaughaiḥ pratipūjitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:003.032a: te cāpi paurā nṛpater vacas tac; chrutvā tadā lābham iveṣṭam āpya
GE09ram_02_u:003.032c: narendram āmantya gṛhāṇi gatvā; devān samānarcur atīva hṛṣṭāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:004.001a: gateṣv atha nṛpo bhūyaḥ paureṣu saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:004.001c: mantrayitvā tataś cakre niścayajñaḥ sa niścayam
GE09ram_02_u:004.002a: śva eva puṣyo bhavitā śvo 'bhiṣecyeta me sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:004.003c: sūtam ājñāpayām āsa rāmaṃ punar ihānaya
GE09ram_02_u:004.004a: pratigṛhya sa tadvākyaṃ sūtaḥ punar upāyayau
GE09ram_02_u:004.004c: rāmasya bhavanaṃ śīghraṃ rāmam ānayituṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:004.005c: śrutvaiva cāpi rāmas taṃ prāptaṃ śaṅkānvito 'bhavat
GE09ram_02_u:004.006a: praveśya cainaṃ tvaritaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:004.006c: yad āgamanakṛtyaṃ te bhūyas tad brūhy aśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:004.007a: tam uvāca tataḥ sūto rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati
GE09ram_02_u:004.007c: śrutvā pramāṇam atra tvaṃ gamanāyetarāya vā
GE09ram_02_u:004.009a: taṃ śrutvā samanuprāptaṃ rāmaṃ daśaratho nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:004.009c: praveśayām āsa gṛhaṃ vivikṣuḥ priyam uttamam
GE09ram_02_u:004.010a: praviśann eva ca śrīmān rāghavo bhavanaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:004.011c: pradiśya cāsmai ruciram āsanaṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:004.012a: rāma vṛddho 'smi dīrghāyur bhuktā bhogā mayepsitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:004.013a: jātam iṣṭam apatyaṃ me tvam adyānupamaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_02_u:004.013c: dattam iṣṭam adhītaṃ ca mayā puruṣasattama
GE09ram_02_u:004.014a: anubhūtāni ceṣṭāni mayā vīra sukhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:004.015a: na kiṃ cin mama kartavyaṃ tavānyatrābhiṣecanāt
GE09ram_02_u:004.015c: ato yat tvām ahaṃ brūyāṃ tan me tvaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:004.016a: adya prakṛtayaḥ sarvās tvām icchanti narādhipam
GE09ram_02_u:004.017a: api cādyāśubhān rāma svapnān paśyāmi dāruṇān
GE09ram_02_u:004.018a: avaṣṭabdhaṃ ca me rāma nakṣatraṃ dāruṇair grahaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:004.019c: rājā vā mṛtyum āpnoti ghorāṃ vāpadam ṛcchati
GE09ram_02_u:004.020a: tad yāvad eva me ceto na vimuhyati rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:004.020c: tāvad evābhiṣiñcasva calā hi prāṇināṃ matiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:004.021a: adya candro 'bhyupagataḥ puṣyāt pūrvaṃ punar vasum
GE09ram_02_u:004.021c: śvaḥ puṣya yogaṃ niyataṃ vakṣyante daivacintakāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:004.024a: suhṛdaś cāpramattās tvāṃ rakṣantv adya samantataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:004.025a: viproṣitaś ca bharato yāvad eva purād itaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:004.025c: tāvad evābhiṣekas te prāptakālo mato mama
GE09ram_02_u:004.026a: kāmaṃ khalu satāṃ vṛtte bhrātā te bharataḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:004.027a: kiṃ tu cittaṃ manuṣyāṇām anityam iti me matiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:004.027c: satāṃ ca dharmanityānāṃ kṛtaśobhi ca rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:004.029c: tasmin kṣaṇe vinirgatya mātur antaḥpuraṃ yayau
GE09ram_02_u:004.030a: tatra tāṃ pravaṇām eva mātaraṃ kṣaumavāsinīm
GE09ram_02_u:004.031a: prāg eva cāgatā tatra sumitrā lakṣmaṇas tathā
GE09ram_02_u:004.032a: tasmin kāle hi kausalyā tasthāv āmīlitekṣaṇā
GE09ram_02_u:004.034c: uvāca vacanaṃ rāmo harṣayaṃs tām idaṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:004.035c: bhavitā śvo 'bhiṣeko me yathā me śāsanaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:004.036c: evam ṛtvigupādhyāyaiḥ saha mām uktavān pitā
GE09ram_02_u:004.037a: yāni yāny atra yogyāni śvobhāviny abhiṣecane
GE09ram_02_u:004.037c: tāni me maṅgalāny adya vaidehyāś caiva kāraya
GE09ram_02_u:004.039a: vatsa rāma ciraṃ jīva hatās te paripanthinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:004.039c: jñātīn me tvaṃ śriyā yuktaḥ sumitrāyāś ca nandaya
GE09ram_02_u:004.040a: kalyāṇe bata nakṣatre mayi jāto 'si putraka
GE09ram_02_u:004.040c: yena tvayā daśaratho guṇair ārādhitaḥ pitā
GE09ram_02_u:004.041a: amoghaṃ bata me kṣāntaṃ puruṣe puṣkarekṣaṇe
GE09ram_02_u:004.042a: ity evam ukto mātredaṃ rāmo bhāratam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:004.042c: prāñjaliṃ prahvam āsīnam abhivīkṣya smayann iva
GE09ram_02_u:004.043a: lakṣmaṇemāṃ mayā sārdhaṃ praśādhi tvaṃ vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_02_u:004.043c: dvitīyaṃ me 'ntarātmānaṃ tvām iyaṃ śrīr upasthitā
GE09ram_02_u:004.044a: saumitre bhuṅkṣva bhogāṃs tvam iṣṭān rājyaphalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:004.044c: jīvitaṃ ca hi rājyaṃ ca tvadartham abhikāmaye
GE09ram_02_u:004.045a: ity uktvā lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo mātarāv abhivādya ca
GE09ram_02_u:004.045c: abhyanujñāpya sītāṃ ca jagāma svaṃ niveśanam
GE09ram_02_u:005.003a: tatheti ca sa rājānam uktvā vedavidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:005.005a: tam āgatam ṛṣiṃ rāmas tvarann iva sasaṃbhramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:005.007a: sa cainaṃ praśritaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃbhāṣyābhiprasādya ca
GE09ram_02_u:005.007c: priyārhaṃ harṣayan rāmam ity uvāca purohitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:005.008a: prasannas te pitā rāma yauvarājyam avāpsyasi
GE09ram_02_u:005.008c: upavāsaṃ bhavān adya karotu saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:005.009a: prātas tvām abhiṣektā hi yauvarājye narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:005.009c: pitā daśarathaḥ prītyā yayātiṃ nahuṣo yathā
GE09ram_02_u:005.010a: ity uktvā sa tadā rāmam upavāsaṃ yatavratam
GE09ram_02_u:005.010c: mantravat kārayām āsa vaidehyā sahitaṃ muniḥ
GE09ram_02_u:005.011a: tato yathāvad rāmeṇa sa rājño gurur arcitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:005.012a: suhṛdbhis tatra rāmo 'pi tān anujñāpya sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:005.018a: tadā hy ayodhyā nilayaḥ sastrībālābalo janaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:005.019c: utsuko 'bhūj jano draṣṭuṃ tam ayodhyā mahotsavam
GE09ram_02_u:005.020c: vyūhann iva janaughaṃ taṃ śanai rāja kulaṃ yayau
GE09ram_02_u:005.022a: tam āgatam abhiprekṣya hitvā rājāsanaṃ nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:005.022c: papraccha sa ca tasmai tat kṛtam ity abhyavedayat
GE09ram_02_u:005.023a: guruṇā tv abhyanujñāto manujaughaṃ visṛjya tam
GE09ram_02_u:005.024c: vyadīpayaṃś cāru viveśa pārthivaḥ; śaśīva tārāgaṇasaṃkulaṃ nabhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:006.002a: pragṛhya śirasā pātrīṃ haviṣo vidhivat tadā
GE09ram_02_u:006.003a: śeṣaṃ ca haviṣas tasya prāśyāśāsyātmanaḥ priyam
GE09ram_02_u:006.009a: kṛtopavāsaṃ tu tadā vaidehyā saha rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:006.009c: ayodhyā nilayaḥ śrutvā sarvaḥ pramudito janaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:006.010c: prabhātāṃ rajanīṃ dṛṣṭvā cakre śobhāṃ parāṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:006.013a: sabhāsu caiva sarvāsu vṛkṣeṣv ālakṣiteṣu ca
GE09ram_02_u:006.013c: dhvajāḥ samucchritāś citrāḥ patākāś cābhavaṃs tadā
GE09ram_02_u:006.014c: manaḥkarṇasukhā vācaḥ śuśruvuś ca tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:006.015a: rāmābhiṣekayuktāś ca kathāś cakrur mitho janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:006.018c: dīpavṛkṣāṃs tathā cakrur anu rathyāsu sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:006.020a: sametya saṃghaśaḥ sarve catvareṣu sabhāsu ca
GE09ram_02_u:006.021c: jñātvā yo vṛddham ātmānaṃ rāmaṃ rājye 'hbiṣekṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:006.022a: sarve hy anugṛhītāḥ sma yan no rāmo mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:006.023c: yathā ca bhrātṛṣu snigdhas tathāsmāsv api rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:006.026a: te tu digbhyaḥ purīṃ prāptā draṣṭuṃ rāmābhiṣecanam
GE09ram_02_u:006.026c: rāmasya pūrayām āsuḥ purīṃ jānapadā janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:006.027a: janaughais tair visarpadbhiḥ śuśruve tatra nisvanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:006.028a: tatas tad indrakṣayasaṃnibhaṃ puraṃ; didṛkṣubhir jānapadair upāgataiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:006.028c: samantataḥ sasvanam ākulaṃ babhau; samudrayādobhir ivārṇavodakam
GE09ram_02_u:007.001a: jñātidāsī yato jātā kaikeyyās tu sahoṣitā
GE09ram_02_u:007.004a: avidūre sthitāṃ dṛṣṭvā dhātrīṃ papraccha mantharā
GE09ram_02_u:007.005a: rāmamātā dhanaṃ kiṃ nu janebhyaḥ saṃprayacchati
GE09ram_02_u:007.005c: atimātraṃ praharṣo 'yaṃ kiṃ janasya ca śaṃsa me
GE09ram_02_u:007.008a: dhātryās tu vacanaṃ śrutvā kubjā kṣipram amarṣitā
GE09ram_02_u:007.009c: śayānām etya kaikeyīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:007.010a: uttiṣṭha mūḍhe kiṃ śeṣe bhayaṃ tvām abhivartate
GE09ram_02_u:007.011c: calaṃ hi tava saubhāgyaṃ nadyaḥ srota ivoṣṇage
GE09ram_02_u:007.012a: evam uktā tu kaikeyī ruṣṭayā paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:007.013a: kaikeyī tv abravīt kubjāṃ kaccit kṣemaṃ na manthare
GE09ram_02_u:007.014a: mantharā tu vacaḥ śrutvā kaikeyyā madhurākṣaram
GE09ram_02_u:007.015a: sā viṣaṇṇatarā bhūtvā kubjā tasyā hitaiṣiṇī
GE09ram_02_u:007.018a: tava duḥkhena kaikeyi mama duḥkhaṃ mahad bhavet
GE09ram_02_u:007.018c: tvadvṛddhau mama vṛddhiś ca bhaved atra na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:007.019c: ugratvaṃ rājadharmāṇāṃ kathaṃ devi na budhyase
GE09ram_02_u:007.020a: dharmavādī śaṭho bhartā ślakṣṇavādī ca dāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:007.022a: apavāhya sa duṣṭātmā bharataṃ tava bandhuṣu
GE09ram_02_u:007.024a: yathā hi kuryāt sarpo vā śatrur vā pratyupekṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:007.024c: rājñā daśarathenādya saputrā tvaṃ tathā kṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:007.025c: rāmaṃ sthāpayatā rājye sānubandhā hatā hy asi
GE09ram_02_u:007.026a: sā prāptakālaṃ kaikeyi kṣipraṃ kuru hitaṃ tava
GE09ram_02_u:007.026c: trāyasva putram ātmānaṃ māṃ ca vismayadarśane
GE09ram_02_u:007.027a: mantharāyā vacaḥ śrutvā śayanāt sa śubhānanā
GE09ram_02_u:007.027c: evam ābharaṇaṃ tasyai kubjāyai pradadau śubham
GE09ram_02_u:007.028a: dattvā tv ābharaṇaṃ tasyai kubjāyai pramadottamā
GE09ram_02_u:007.028c: kaikeyī mantharāṃ hṛṣṭā punar evābravīd idam
GE09ram_02_u:007.029a: idaṃ tu manthare mahyam ākhyāsi paramaṃ priyam
GE09ram_02_u:007.029c: etan me priyam ākhyātuḥ kiṃ vā bhūyaḥ karomi te
GE09ram_02_u:007.030a: rāme vā bharate vāhaṃ viśeṣaṃ nopalakṣaye
GE09ram_02_u:007.030c: tasmāt tuṣṭāsmi yad rājā rāmaṃ rājye 'bhiṣekṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:007.031a: na me paraṃ kiṃ cid itas tvayā punaḥ; priyaṃ priyārhe suvacaṃ vaco varam
GE09ram_02_u:007.031c: tathā hy avocas tvam ataḥ priyottaraṃ; varaṃ paraṃ te pradadāmi taṃ
GE09ram_02_u:008.001a: mantharā tv abhyasūyyainām utsṛjyābharaṇaṃ ca tat
GE09ram_02_u:008.002a: harṣaṃ kim idam asthāne kṛtavaty asi bāliśe
GE09ram_02_u:008.004a: prāptāṃ sumahatīṃ prītiṃ pratītāṃ tāṃ hatadviṣam
GE09ram_02_u:008.005a: hṛṣṭāḥ khalu bhaviṣyanti rāmasya paramāḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:008.006a: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaprītāṃ bruvantīṃ mantharāṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:008.006c: rāmasyaiva guṇān devī kaikeyī praśaśaṃsa ha
GE09ram_02_u:008.007a: dharmajño gurubhir dāntaḥ kṛtajñaḥ satyavāk śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:008.007c: rāmo rājñaḥ suto jyeṣṭho yauvarājyam ato 'rhati
GE09ram_02_u:008.008a: bhrātṝn bhṛtyāṃś ca dīrghāyuḥ pitṛvat pālayiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:008.009a: bharataś cāpi rāmasya dhruvaṃ varṣaśatāt param
GE09ram_02_u:008.010a: sā tvam abhyudaye prāpte vartamāne ca manthare
GE09ram_02_u:008.010e: kausalyāto 'tiriktaṃ ca sa tu śuśrūṣate hi mām
GE09ram_02_u:008.011c: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya kaikeyīm idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:008.013a: bhavitā rāghavo rājā rāghavasya ca yaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:008.014a: na hi rājñaḥ sutāḥ sarve rājye tiṣṭhanti bhāmini
GE09ram_02_u:008.015a: tasmāj jyeṣṭhe hi kaikeyi rājyatantrāṇi pārthivāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:008.016c: anāthavat sukhebhyaś ca rājavaṃśāc ca vatsale
GE09ram_02_u:008.017a: sāhaṃ tvadarthe saṃprāptā tvaṃ tu māṃ nāvabudhyase
GE09ram_02_u:008.017c: sapatnivṛddhau yā me tvaṃ pradeyaṃ dātum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:008.018a: dhruvaṃ tu bharataṃ rāmaḥ prāpya rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:008.019a: bāla eva hi mātulyaṃ bharato nāyitas tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:008.019c: saṃnikarṣāc ca sauhārdaṃ jāyate sthāvareṣv api
GE09ram_02_u:008.020a: goptā hi rāmaṃ saumitrir lakṣmaṇaṃ cāpi rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:008.020c: aśvinor iva saubhrātraṃ tayor lokeṣu viśrutam
GE09ram_02_u:008.021a: tasmān na lakṣmaṇe rāmaḥ pāpaṃ kiṃ cit kariṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:008.021c: rāmas tu bharate pāpaṃ kuryād iti na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:008.022a: tasmād rājagṛhād eva vanaṃ gacchatu te sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:008.022c: etad dhi rocate mahyaṃ bhṛśaṃ cāpi hitaṃ tava
GE09ram_02_u:008.023a: evaṃ te jñātipakṣasya śreyaś caiva bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:008.023c: yadi ced bharato dharmāt pitryaṃ rājyam avāpsyati
GE09ram_02_u:008.024a: sa te sukhocito bālo rāmasya sahajo ripuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:008.026c: rāmamātā sapatnī te kathaṃ vairaṃ na yātayet
GE09ram_02_u:008.027a: yadā hi rāmaḥ pṛthivīm avāpsyati; dhruvaṃ pranaṣṭo bharato bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:008.027c: ato hi saṃcintaya rājyam ātmaje; parasya cādyaiva vivāsa kāraṇam
GE09ram_02_u:009.001a: evam uktā tu kaikeyī krodhena jvalitānanā
GE09ram_02_u:009.001c: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya mantharām idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:009.002a: adya rāmam itaḥ kṣipraṃ vanaṃ prasthāpayāmy aham
GE09ram_02_u:009.003a: idaṃ tv idānīṃ saṃpaśya kenopāyena manthare
GE09ram_02_u:009.003c: bharataḥ prāpnuyād rājyaṃ na tu rāmaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_02_u:009.004a: evam uktā tayā devyā mantharā pāpadarśinī
GE09ram_02_u:009.005a: hantedānīṃ pravakṣyāmi kaikeyi śrūyatāṃ ca me
GE09ram_02_u:009.005c: yathā te bharato rājyaṃ putraḥ prāpsyati kevalam
GE09ram_02_u:009.006a: śrutvaivaṃ vacanaṃ tasyā mantharāyās tu kaikayī
GE09ram_02_u:009.006c: kiṃ cid utthāya śayanāt svāstīrṇād idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:009.007c: bharataḥ prāpnuyād rājyaṃ na tu rāmaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_02_u:009.008a: evam uktā tayā devyā mantharā pāpadarśinī
GE09ram_02_u:009.009a: tava devāsure yuddhe saha rājarṣibhiḥ patiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:009.010a: diśam āsthāya kaikeyi dakṣiṇāṃ daṇḍakān prati
GE09ram_02_u:009.010c: vaijayantam iti khyātaṃ puraṃ yatra timidhvajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:009.011a: sa śambara iti khyātaḥ śatamāyo mahāsuraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:009.012a: tasmin mahati saṃgrāme rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:009.013a: tatrāpi vikṣataḥ śastraiḥ patis te rakṣitas tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:009.013c: tuṣṭena tena dattau te dvau varau śubhadarśane
GE09ram_02_u:009.014a: sa tvayoktaḥ patir devi yadeccheyaṃ tadā varau
GE09ram_02_u:009.014c: gṛhṇīyām iti tat tena tathety uktaṃ mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:009.014e: anabhijñā hy ahaṃ devi tvayaiva kathitaṃ purā
GE09ram_02_u:009.015c: pravrājanaṃ ca rāmasya tvaṃ varṣāṇi caturdaśa
GE09ram_02_u:009.016e: mā smainaṃ pratyudīkṣethā mā cainam abhibhāṣathāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:009.017a: dayitā tvaṃ sadā bhartur atra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:009.017c: tvatkṛte ca mahārājo viśed api hutāśanam
GE09ram_02_u:009.018a: na tvāṃ krodhayituṃ śakto na kruddhāṃ pratyudīkṣitum
GE09ram_02_u:009.018c: tava priyārthaṃ rājā hi prāṇān api parityajet
GE09ram_02_u:009.019a: na hy atikramituṃ śaktas tava vākyaṃ mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:009.020c: dadyād daśaratho rājā mā sma teṣu manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:009.021a: yau tau devāsure yuddhe varau daśaratho 'dadāt
GE09ram_02_u:009.021c: tau smāraya mahābhāge so 'rtho mā tvām atikramet
GE09ram_02_u:009.022a: yadā tu te varaṃ dadyāt svayam utthāpya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:009.022c: vyavasthāpya mahārājaṃ tvam imaṃ vṛṇuyā varam
GE09ram_02_u:009.023a: rāmaṃ pravrājayāraṇye nava varṣāṇi pañca ca
GE09ram_02_u:009.024c: bharataś ca hatāmitras tava rājā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:009.025a: yena kālena rāmaś ca vanāt pratyāgamiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:009.025c: tena kālena putras te kṛtamūlo bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:009.026a: prāptakālaṃ tu te manye rājānaṃ vītasādhvasā
GE09ram_02_u:009.027a: anartham artharūpeṇa grāhitā sā tatas tayā
GE09ram_02_u:009.027c: hṛṣṭā pratītā kaikeyī mantharām idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:009.029a: tvam eva tu mamārtheṣu nityayuktā hitaiṣiṇī
GE09ram_02_u:009.030c: tvaṃ padmam iva vātena saṃnatā priyadarśanā
GE09ram_02_u:009.031a: uras te 'bhiniviṣṭaṃ vai yāvat skandhāt samunnatam
GE09ram_02_u:009.031c: adhastāc codaraṃ śāntaṃ sunābham iva lajjitam
GE09ram_02_u:009.032c: jaṅghe bhṛśam upanyaste pādau cāpy āyatāv ubhau
GE09ram_02_u:009.034a: tavedaṃ sthagu yad dīrghaṃ rathaghoṇam ivāyatam
GE09ram_02_u:009.034c: matayaḥ kṣatravidyāś ca māyāś cātra vasanti te
GE09ram_02_u:009.035a: atra te pratimokṣyāmi mālāṃ kubje hiraṇmayīm
GE09ram_02_u:009.035c: abhiṣikte ca bharate rāghave ca vanaṃ gate
GE09ram_02_u:009.036c: labdhārthā ca pratītā ca lepayiṣyāmi te sthagu
GE09ram_02_u:009.037a: mukhe ca tilakaṃ citraṃ jātarūpamayaṃ śubham
GE09ram_02_u:009.037c: kārayiṣyāmi te kubje śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:009.039c: pādau paricariṣyanti yathaiva tvaṃ sadā mama
GE09ram_02_u:009.040a: iti praśasyamānā sā kaikeyīm idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:009.040c: śayānāṃ śayane śubhre vedyām agniśikhām iva
GE09ram_02_u:009.042a: tathā protsāhitā devī gatvā mantharayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:009.044a: tato hemopamā tatra kubjā vākyaṃ vaśaṃ gatā
GE09ram_02_u:009.044c: saṃviśya bhūmau kaikeyī mantharām idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:009.045a: iha vā māṃ mṛtāṃ kubje nṛpāyāvedayiṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:009.045c: vanaṃ tu rāghave prāpte bharataḥ prāpsyati kṣitim
GE09ram_02_u:009.046a: athaitad uktvā vacanaṃ sudāruṇaṃ; nidhāya sarvābharaṇāni bhāminī
GE09ram_02_u:009.046c: asaṃvṛtām āstaraṇena medinīṃ; tadādhiśiśye patiteva kinnarī
GE09ram_02_u:009.047c: narendrapatnī vimanā babhūva sā; tamovṛtā dyaur iva magnatārakā
GE09ram_02_u:010.002a: tāṃ tatra patitāṃ bhūmau śayānām atathocitām
GE09ram_02_u:010.003a: sa vṛddhas taruṇīṃ bhāryāṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasīm
GE09ram_02_u:010.004a: kareṇum iva digdhena viddhāṃ mṛgayuṇā vane
GE09ram_02_u:010.006a: na te 'ham abhijānāmi krodham ātmani saṃśritam
GE09ram_02_u:010.007a: yad idaṃ mama duḥkhāya śeṣe kalyāṇi pāṃsuṣu
GE09ram_02_u:010.007c: bhūmau śeṣe kimarthaṃ tvaṃ mayi kalyāṇa cetasi
GE09ram_02_u:010.008a: santi me kuśalā vaidyā abhituṣṭāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:010.008c: sukhitāṃ tvāṃ kariṣyanti vyādhim ācakṣva bhāmini
GE09ram_02_u:010.009a: kasya vā te priyaṃ kāryaṃ kena vā vipriyaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:010.009c: kaḥ priyaṃ labhatām adya ko vā sumahad apriyam
GE09ram_02_u:010.010a: avadhyo vadhyatāṃ ko vā vadhyaḥ ko vā vimucyatām
GE09ram_02_u:010.010c: daridraḥ ko bhavatv āḍhyo dravyavān vāpy akiṃcanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:010.011a: ahaṃ caiva madīyāś ca sarve tava vaśānugāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:010.011c: na te kaṃ cid abhiprāyaṃ vyāhantum aham utsahe
GE09ram_02_u:010.012c: yāvad āvartate cakraṃ tāvatī me vasuṃdharā
GE09ram_02_u:010.013a: tathoktā sā samāśvastā vaktukāmā tad apriyam
GE09ram_02_u:010.014a: nāsmi viprakṛtā deva kena cin na vimānitā
GE09ram_02_u:010.014c: abhiprāyas tu me kaś cit tam icchāmi tvayā kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:010.015a: pratijñāṃ pratijānīṣva yadi tvaṃ kartum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:010.015c: atha tad vyāhariṣyāmi yad abhiprārthitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_02_u:010.016a: evam uktas tayā rājā priyayā strīvaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:010.017a: avalipte na jānāsi tvattaḥ priyataro mama
GE09ram_02_u:010.017c: manujo manujavyāghrād rāmād anyo na vidyate
GE09ram_02_u:010.018a: bhadre hṛdayam apy etad anumṛśśyoddharasva me
GE09ram_02_u:010.018c: etat samīkṣya kaikeyi brūhi yat sādhu manyase
GE09ram_02_u:010.019a: balam ātmani paśyantī na māṃ śaṅkitum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:010.019c: kariṣyāmi tava prītiṃ sukṛtenāpi te śape
GE09ram_02_u:010.020a: tena vākyena saṃhṛṣṭā tam abhiprāyam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:010.021a: yathākrameṇa śapasi varaṃ mama dadāsi ca
GE09ram_02_u:010.022a: candrādityau nabhaś caiva grahā rātryahanī diśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:010.022c: jagac ca pṛthivī caiva sagandharvā sarākṣasā
GE09ram_02_u:010.023c: yāni cānyāni bhūtāni jānīyur bhāṣitaṃ tava
GE09ram_02_u:010.024c: varaṃ mama dadāty eṣa tan me śṛṇvantu devatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:010.026a: varau yau me tvayā deva tadā dattau mahīpate
GE09ram_02_u:010.026c: tau tāvad aham adyaiva vakṣyāmi śṛṇu me vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:010.028a: nava pañca ca varṣāṇi daṇḍakāraṇyam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:010.029c: adya caiva hi paśyeyaṃ prayāntaṃ rāghavaṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:010.030a: tataḥ śrutvā mahārāja kaikeyyā dāruṇaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:010.030c: vyathito vilavaś caiva vyāghrīṃ dṛṣṭvā yathā mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:010.031c: aho dhig iti sāmarṣo vācam uktvā narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:010.032a: cireṇa tu nṛpaḥ saṃjñāṃ pratilabhya suduḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:010.032c: kaikeyīm abravīt kruddhaḥ pradahann iva cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_02_u:010.033c: kiṃ kṛtaṃ tava rāmeṇa pāpe pāpaṃ mayāpi vā
GE09ram_02_u:010.034a: sadā te jananī tulyāṃ vṛttiṃ vahati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:010.036c: aparādhaṃ kam uddiśya tyakṣyāmīṣṭam ahaṃ sutam
GE09ram_02_u:010.037a: kausalyāṃ vā sumitrāṃ vā tyajeyam api vā śriyam
GE09ram_02_u:010.037c: jīvitaṃ vātmano rāmaṃ na tv eva pitṛvatsalam
GE09ram_02_u:010.038a: parā bhavati me prītir dṛṣṭvā tanayam agrajam
GE09ram_02_u:010.038c: apaśyatas tu me rāmaṃ naṣṭā bhavati cetanā
GE09ram_02_u:010.039a: tiṣṭhel loko vinā sūryaṃ sasyaṃ vā salilaṃ vinā
GE09ram_02_u:010.039c: na tu rāmaṃ vinā dehe tiṣṭhet tu mama jīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:010.040a: tad alaṃ tyajyatām eṣa niścayaḥ pāpaniścaye
GE09ram_02_u:010.040c: api te caraṇau mūrdhnā spṛśāmy eṣa prasīda me
GE09ram_02_u:010.041a: sa bhūmipālo vilapann anāthavat; striyā gṛhīto dṛhaye 'timātratā
GE09ram_02_u:010.041c: papāta devyāś caraṇau prasāritāv; ubhāv asaṃspṛśya yathāturas tathā
GE09ram_02_u:011.002c: punar ākārayām āsa tam eva varam aṅganā
GE09ram_02_u:011.003c: mama cemaṃ varaṃ kasmād vidhārayitum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:011.004a: evam uktas tu kaikeyyā rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:011.004c: pratyuvāca tataḥ kruddho muhūrtaṃ vihvalann iva
GE09ram_02_u:011.005a: mṛte mayi gate rāme vanaṃ manujapuṃgave
GE09ram_02_u:011.006a: yadi satyaṃ bravīmy etat tad asatyaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:011.006c: akīrtir atulā loke dhruvaṃ paribhavaś ca me
GE09ram_02_u:011.010c: atha vā gamyatāṃ śīghraṃ nāham icchāmi nirghṛṇām
GE09ram_02_u:011.010e: nṛśaṃsāṃ kaikeyīṃ draṣṭuṃ yatkṛte vyasanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_02_u:011.011a: evam uktvā tato rājā kaikeyīṃ saṃyatāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_02_u:011.011c: prasādayām āsa punaḥ kaikeyīṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:011.012c: prasādaḥ kriyatāṃ devi bhadre rājño viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:011.013c: kuru sādhu prasādaṃ me bāle sahṛdayā hy asi
GE09ram_02_u:011.014c: śrutvā vicitraṃ karuṇaṃ vilāpaṃ; bhartur nṛśaṃsā na cakāra vākyam
GE09ram_02_u:011.015a: tataḥ sa rājā punar eva mūrchitaḥ; priyām atuṣṭāṃ pratikūlabhāṣiṇīm
GE09ram_02_u:011.015c: samīkṣya putrasya vivāsanaṃ prati; kṣitau visaṃjño nipapāta duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:012.002a: pāpaṃ kṛtveva kim idaṃ mama saṃśrutya saṃśravam
GE09ram_02_u:012.002c: śeṣe kṣititale sannaḥ sthityāṃ sthātuṃ tvam arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:012.003a: āhuḥ satyaṃ hi paramaṃ dharmaṃ dharmavido janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:012.003c: satyam āśritya hi mayā tvaṃ ca dharmaṃ pracoditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:012.004a: saṃśrutya śaibyaḥ śyenāya svāṃ tanuṃ jagatīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:012.004c: pradāya pakṣiṇo rājañ jagāma gatim uttamām
GE09ram_02_u:012.005a: tatha hy alarkas tejasvī brāhmaṇe vedapārage
GE09ram_02_u:012.006a: saritāṃ tu patiḥ svalpāṃ maryādāṃ satyam anvitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:012.007a: samayaṃ ca mamāryemaṃ yadi tvaṃ na kariṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:012.008c: nāśakat pāśam unmoktuṃ balir indrakṛtaṃ yathā
GE09ram_02_u:012.009c: sa dhuryo vai parispandan yugacakrāntaraṃ yathā
GE09ram_02_u:012.010a: vihvalābhyāṃ ca netrābhyām apaśyann iva bhūmipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:012.010c: kṛcchrād dhairyeṇa saṃstabhya kaikeyīm idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:012.011a: yas te mantrakṛtaḥ pāṇir agnau pāpe mayā dhṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:012.011c: taṃ tyajāmi svajaṃ caiva tava putraṃ saha tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:012.013a: kim idaṃ bhāṣase rājan vākyaṃ gararujopamam
GE09ram_02_u:012.014a: sthāpya rājye mama sutaṃ kṛtvā rāmaṃ vanecaram
GE09ram_02_u:012.014c: niḥsapatnāṃ ca māṃ kṛtvā kṛtakṛtyo bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:012.015a: sa nunna iva tīkṣeṇa pratodena hayottamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:012.016a: dharmabandhena baddho 'smi naṣṭā ca mama cetanā
GE09ram_02_u:012.016c: jyeṣṭhaṃ putraṃ priyaṃ rāmaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi dhārmikam
GE09ram_02_u:012.017a: iti rājño vacaḥ śrutvā kaikeyī tadanantaram
GE09ram_02_u:012.017c: svayam evābravīt sūtaṃ gaccha tvaṃ rāmam ānaya
GE09ram_02_u:012.018a: tataḥ sa rājā taṃ sūtaṃ sannaharṣaḥ sutaṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:012.019a: sumantraḥ karuṇaṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā dīnaṃ ca pārthivam
GE09ram_02_u:012.019c: pragṛhītāñjaliḥ kiṃ cit tasmād deśād apākraman
GE09ram_02_u:012.020a: yadā vaktuṃ svayaṃ dainyān na śaśāka mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:012.020c: tadā sumantraṃ mantrajñā kaikeyī pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:012.021a: sumantra rāmaṃ drakṣyāmi śīghram ānaya sundaram
GE09ram_02_u:012.021c: sa manyamānaḥ kalyāṇaṃ hṛdayena nananda ca
GE09ram_02_u:012.022a: sumantraś cintayām āsa tvaritaṃ coditas tayā
GE09ram_02_u:012.023a: iti sūto matiṃ kṛtvā harṣeṇa mahatā punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:012.024a: tataḥ purastāt sahasā vinirgato; mahīpatīn dvāragatān vilokayan
GE09ram_02_u:012.024c: dadarśa paurān vividhān mahādhanān; upasthitān dvāram upetya viṣṭhitān
GE09ram_02_u:013.001a: te tu tāṃ rajanīm uṣya brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:013.002a: amātyā balamukhyāś ca mukhyā ye nigamasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:013.005c: yāś cānyāḥ saritaḥ puṇyā hradāḥ kūpāḥ sarāṃsi ca
GE09ram_02_u:013.006c: tābhyaś caivāhṛtaṃ toyaṃ samudrebhyaś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:013.007a: kṣaudraṃ dadhighṛtaṃ lājā dharbhāḥ sumanasaḥ payaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:013.010a: pāṇḍuraś ca vṛṣaḥ sajjaḥ pāṇḍurāśvaś ca susthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:013.010c: prasrutaś ca gajaḥ śrīmān aupavāhyaḥ pratīkṣate
GE09ram_02_u:013.011c: vāditrāṇi ca sarvāṇi bandinaś ca tathāpare
GE09ram_02_u:013.013c: apaśyanto 'bruvan ko nu rājño naḥ prativedayet
GE09ram_02_u:013.014a: na paśyāmaś ca rājānam uditaś ca divākaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:013.015c: abravīt tān idaṃ sarvān sumantro rājasatkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:013.016a: ayaṃ pṛcchāmi vacanāt sukham āyuṣmatām aham
GE09ram_02_u:013.019a: brāhmaṇā balamukhyāś ca naigamāś cāgatā nṛpa
GE09ram_02_u:013.020a: stuvantaṃ taṃ tadā sūtaṃ sumantraṃ mantrakovidam
GE09ram_02_u:013.020c: pratibudhya tato rājā idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:013.021a: na caiva saṃprasuto 'ham ānayed āśu rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:013.021c: iti rājā daśarathaḥ sūtaṃ tatrānvaśāt punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:013.022a: sa rājavacanaṃ śrutvā śirasā pratipūjya tam
GE09ram_02_u:013.023c: sa sūtas tatra śuśrāva rāmādhikaraṇāḥ kathāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:013.027a: sa vājiyuktena rathena sārathir; narākulaṃ rājakulaṃ vilokayan
GE09ram_02_u:013.027c: tataḥ samāsādya mahādhanaṃ mahat; prahṛṣṭaromā sa babhūva sārathiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:013.028c: avāryamāṇaḥ praviveśa sārathiḥ; prabhūtaratnaṃ makaro yathārṇavam
GE09ram_02_u:014.008c: upetaṃ sītayā bhūyaś citrayā śaśinaṃ yathā
GE09ram_02_u:014.011a: kausalyā suprabhā deva pitā tvaṃ draṣṭum icchati
GE09ram_02_u:014.011c: mahiṣyā saha kaikeyyā gamyatāṃ tatra māciram
GE09ram_02_u:014.012a: evam uktas tu saṃhṛṣṭo narasiṃho mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:014.012c: tataḥ saṃmānayām āsa sītām idam uvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:014.013a: devi devaś ca devī ca samāgamya madantare
GE09ram_02_u:014.015a: yādṛśī pariṣat tatra tādṛśo dūta āgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:014.016a: hanta śīghram ito gatvā drakṣyāmi ca mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:014.016c: saha tvaṃ parivāreṇa sukham āssva ramasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:014.018a: sa sarvān arthino dṛṣṭvā sametya pratinandya ca
GE09ram_02_u:014.020c: prayayau tūrṇam āsthāya rāghavo jvalitaḥ śriyā
GE09ram_02_u:014.021c: niketān niryayau śrīmān mahābhrād iva candramāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:014.022c: jugopa bhrātaraṃ bhrātā ratham āsthāya pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:014.024a: sa rāghavas tatra kathāpralāpaṃ; śuśrāva lokasya samāgatasya
GE09ram_02_u:014.024c: ātmādhikārā vividhāś ca vācaḥ; prahṛṣṭarūpasya pure janasya
GE09ram_02_u:014.025a: eṣa śriyaṃ gacchati rāghavo 'dya; rājaprasādād vipulāṃ gamiṣyan
GE09ram_02_u:014.025c: ete vayaṃ sarvasamṛddhakāmā; yeṣām ayaṃ no bhavitā praśāstā
GE09ram_02_u:014.025e: lābho janasyāsya yad eṣa sarvaṃ; prapatsyate rāṣṭram idaṃ cirāya
GE09ram_02_u:014.026a: sa ghoṣavadbhiś ca hayaiḥ sanāgaiḥ; puraḥsaraiḥ svastikasūtamāgadhaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:014.026c: mahīyamānaḥ pravaraiś ca vādakair; abhiṣṭuto vaiśravaṇo yathā yayau
GE09ram_02_u:014.027c: prabhūtaratnaṃ bahupaṇyasaṃcayaṃ; dadarśa rāmo ruciraṃ mahāpatham
GE09ram_02_u:015.003c: saṃvṛtaṃ vividhaiḥ paṇyair bhakṣyair uccāvacair api
GE09ram_02_u:015.004c: yathārhaṃ cāpi saṃpūjya sarvān eva narān yayau
GE09ram_02_u:015.006a: yathā sma lālitāḥ pitrā yathā pūrvaiḥ pitāmahaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:015.006c: tataḥ sukhataraṃ sarve rāme vatsyāma rājani
GE09ram_02_u:015.007a: alam adya hi bhuktena paramārthair alaṃ ca naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:015.007c: yathā paśyāma niryāntaṃ rāmaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_02_u:015.008a: ato hi na priyataraṃ nānyat kiṃ cid bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:015.009a: etāś cānyāś ca suhṛdām udāsīnaḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:015.010a: na hi tasmān manaḥ kaś cic cakṣuṣī vā narottamāt
GE09ram_02_u:015.011a: sarveṣāṃ sa hi dharmātmā varṇānāṃ kurute dayām
GE09ram_02_u:015.011c: caturṇāṃ hi vayaḥsthānāṃ tena te tam anuvratāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:015.012c: rājaputraḥ pitur veśma praviveśa śriyā jvalan
GE09ram_02_u:015.014a: tataḥ praviṣṭe pitur antikaṃ tadā; janaḥ sa sarvo mudito nṛpātmaje
GE09ram_02_u:015.014c: pratīkṣate tasya punaḥ sma nirgamaṃ; yathodayaṃ candramasaḥ saritpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:016.001a: sa dadarśāsane rāmo niṣaṇṇaṃ pitaraṃ śubhe
GE09ram_02_u:016.002a: sa pituś caraṇau pūrvam abhivādya vinītavat
GE09ram_02_u:016.004a: tad apūrvaṃ narapater dṛṣṭvā rūpaṃ bhayāvaham
GE09ram_02_u:016.004c: rāmo 'pi bhayam āpannaḥ padā spṛṣṭveva pannagam
GE09ram_02_u:016.006a: ūrmi mālinam akṣobhyaṃ kṣubhyantam iva sāgaram
GE09ram_02_u:016.007a: acintyakalpaṃ hi pitus taṃ śokam upadhārayan
GE09ram_02_u:016.008a: cintayām āsa ca tadā rāmaḥ pitṛhite rataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:016.008c: kiṃsvid adyaiva nṛpatir na māṃ pratyabhinandati
GE09ram_02_u:016.009a: anyadā māṃ pitā dṛṣṭvā kupito 'pi prasīdati
GE09ram_02_u:016.009c: tasya mām adya saṃprekṣya kimāyāsaḥ pravartate
GE09ram_02_u:016.011a: kaccin mayā nāparādham ajñānād yena me pitā
GE09ram_02_u:016.011c: kupitas tan mamācakṣva tvaṃ caivainaṃ prasādaya
GE09ram_02_u:016.012a: vivarṇavadano dīno na hi mām abhibhāṣate
GE09ram_02_u:016.012c: śārīro mānaso vāpi kaccid enaṃ na bādhate
GE09ram_02_u:016.012e: saṃtāpo vābhitāpo vā durlabhaṃ hi sadā sukham
GE09ram_02_u:016.013a: kaccin na kiṃ cid bharate kumāre priyadarśane
GE09ram_02_u:016.013c: śatrughne vā mahāsattve mātṝṇāṃ vā mamāśubham
GE09ram_02_u:016.014a: atoṣayan mahārājam akurvan vā pitur vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:016.014c: muhūrtam api neccheyaṃ jīvituṃ kupite nṛpe
GE09ram_02_u:016.015c: kathaṃ tasmin na varteta pratyakṣe sati daivate
GE09ram_02_u:016.016a: kaccit te paruṣaṃ kiṃ cid abhimānāt pitā mama
GE09ram_02_u:016.016c: ukto bhavatyā kopena yatrāsya lulitaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:016.017a: etad ācakṣva me devi tattvena paripṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:016.018a: ahaṃ hi vacanād rājñaḥ pateyam api pāvake
GE09ram_02_u:016.018c: bhakṣayeyaṃ viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ majjeyam api cārṇave
GE09ram_02_u:016.018e: niyukto guruṇā pitrā nṛpeṇa ca hitena ca
GE09ram_02_u:016.019a: tad brūhi vacanaṃ devi rājño yad abhikāṅkṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:016.019c: kariṣye pratijāne ca rāmo dvir nābhibhāṣate
GE09ram_02_u:016.021a: purā devāsure yuddhe pitrā te mama rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:016.023a: yadi satyapratijñaṃ tvaṃ pitaraṃ kartum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:016.023c: ātmānaṃ ca narareṣṭha mama vākyam idaṃ śṛṇu
GE09ram_02_u:016.024a: sa nideśe pitus tiṣṭha yathā tena pratiśrutam
GE09ram_02_u:016.024c: tvayāraṇyaṃ praveṣṭavyaṃ nava varṣāṇi pañca ca
GE09ram_02_u:016.025a: sapta sapta ca varṣāṇi daṇḍakāraṇyam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:016.027c: śrutvā na vivyathe rāmaḥ kaikeyīṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:016.028a: evam astu gamiṣyāmi vanaṃ vastum ahaṃ tv ataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:016.029a: idaṃ tu jñātum icchāmi kimarthaṃ māṃ mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:016.030a: manyur na ca tvayā kāryo devi brūhi tavāgrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:016.031a: hitena guruṇā pitrā kṛtajñena nṛpeṇa ca
GE09ram_02_u:016.031c: niyujyamāno viśrabdhaṃ kiṃ na kuryād ahaṃ priyam
GE09ram_02_u:016.032a: alīkaṃ mānasaṃ tv ekaṃ hṛdayaṃ dahatīva me
GE09ram_02_u:016.032c: svayaṃ yan nāha māṃ rājā bharatasyābhiṣecanam
GE09ram_02_u:016.033a: ahaṃ hi sītāṃ rājyaṃ ca prāṇān iṣṭān dhanāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:016.034a: kiṃ punar manujendreṇa svayaṃ pitrā pracoditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:016.035a: tad āśvāsaya hīmaṃ tvaṃ kiṃ nv idaṃ yan mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:016.038a: sā hṛṣṭā tasya tadvākyaṃ śrutvā rāmasya kaikayī
GE09ram_02_u:016.038c: prasthānaṃ śraddadhānā hi tvarayām āsa rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:016.039a: evaṃ bhavatu yāsyanti dūtāḥ śīghrajavair hayaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:016.040a: tava tv ahaṃ kṣamaṃ manye notsukasya vilambanam
GE09ram_02_u:016.040c: rāma tasmād itaḥ śīghraṃ vanaṃ tvaṃ gantum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:016.041a: vrīḍānvitaḥ svayaṃ yac ca nṛpas tvāṃ nābhibhāṣate
GE09ram_02_u:016.041c: naitat kiṃ cin naraśreṣṭha manyur eṣo 'panīyatām
GE09ram_02_u:016.042a: yāvat tvaṃ na vanaṃ yātaḥ purād asmād abhitvaran
GE09ram_02_u:016.042c: pitā tāvan na te rāma snāsyate bhokṣyate 'pi vā
GE09ram_02_u:016.043a: dhik kaṣṭam iti niḥśvasya rājā śokapariplutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:016.045c: śrutvā gatavyatho rāmaḥ kaikeyīṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:016.046a: nāham arthaparo devi lokam āvastum utsahe
GE09ram_02_u:016.046c: viddhi mām ṛṣibhis tulyaṃ kevalaṃ dharmam āsthitam
GE09ram_02_u:016.047a: yad atrabhavataḥ kiṃ cic chakyaṃ kartuṃ priyaṃ mayā
GE09ram_02_u:016.047c: prāṇān api parityajya sarvathā kṛtam eva tat
GE09ram_02_u:016.048a: na hy ato dharmacaraṇaṃ kiṃ cid asti mahattaram
GE09ram_02_u:016.048c: yathā pitari śuśrūṣā tasya vā vacanakriyā
GE09ram_02_u:016.050a: na nūnaṃ mayi kaikeyi kiṃ cid āśaṃsase guṇam
GE09ram_02_u:016.050c: yad rājānam avocas tvaṃ mameśvaratarā satī
GE09ram_02_u:016.051a: yāvan mātaram āpṛcche sītāṃ cānunayāmy aham
GE09ram_02_u:016.052a: bharataḥ pālayed rājyaṃ śuśrūṣec ca pitur yathā
GE09ram_02_u:016.052c: tahā bhavatyā kartavyaṃ sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:016.053a: sa rāmasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhṛśaṃ duḥkhahataḥ pitā
GE09ram_02_u:016.054a: vanditvā caraṇau rāmo visaṃjñasya pitus tadā
GE09ram_02_u:016.055a: sa rāmaḥ pitaraṃ kṛtvā kaikeyīṃ ca pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_02_u:016.059a: na vanaṃ gantukāmasya tyajataś ca vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_02_u:016.060a: dhārayan manasā duḥkham indriyāṇi nigṛhya ca
GE09ram_02_u:016.061a: praviśya veśmātibhṛśaṃ mudānvitaṃ; samīkṣya tāṃ cārthavipattim āgatām
GE09ram_02_u:016.061c: na caiva rāmo 'tra jagāma vikriyāṃ; suhṛjjanasyātmavipattiśaṅkayā
GE09ram_02_u:017.001a: rāmas tu bhṛśam āyasto niḥśvasann iva kuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:017.001c: jagāma sahito bhrātrā mātur antaḥpuraṃ vaśī
GE09ram_02_u:017.003a: praviśya prathamāṃ kakṣyāṃ dvitīyāyāṃ dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:017.004a: praṇamya rāmas tān vṛddhāṃs tṛtīyāyāṃ dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:017.004c: striyo vṛddhāś ca bālāś ca dvārarakṣaṇatatparāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:017.005a: vardhayitvā prahṛṣṭās tāḥ praviśya ca gṛhaṃ striyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:017.005c: nyavedayanta tvaritā rāma mātuḥ priyaṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:017.006a: kausalyāpi tadā devī rātriṃ sthitvā samāhitā
GE09ram_02_u:017.006c: prabhāte tv akarot pūjāṃ viṣṇoḥ putrahitaiṣiṇī
GE09ram_02_u:017.007c: agniṃ juhoti sma tadā mantravat kṛtamaṅgalā
GE09ram_02_u:017.008a: praviśya ca tadā rāmo mātur antaḥpuraṃ śubham
GE09ram_02_u:017.010a: tam uvāca durādharṣaṃ rāghavaṃ sutam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:017.011c: prāpnuhy āyuś ca kīrtiṃ ca dharmaṃ copahitaṃ kule
GE09ram_02_u:017.013a: mātaraṃ rāghavaḥ kiṃ cit prasāryāñjalim abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:017.013c: sa svabhāvavinītaś ca gauravāc ca tadānataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:017.014a: devi nūnaṃ na jānīṣe mahad bhayam upasthitam
GE09ram_02_u:017.014c: idaṃ tava ca duḥkhāya vaidehyā lakṣmaṇasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:017.015a: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vatsyāmi vijane vane
GE09ram_02_u:017.017a: tām aduḥkhocitāṃ dṛṣṭvā patitāṃ kadalīm iva
GE09ram_02_u:017.020a: yadi putra na jāyethā mama śokāya rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:017.020c: na sma duḥkham ato bhūyaḥ paśyeyam aham aprajā
GE09ram_02_u:017.021a: eka eva hi vandhyāyāḥ śoko bhavati mānavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:017.021c: aprajāsmīti saṃtāpo na hy anyaḥ putra vidyate
GE09ram_02_u:017.022a: na dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ kalyāṇaṃ sukhaṃ vā patipauruṣe
GE09ram_02_u:017.022c: api putre vipaśyeyam iti rāmāsthitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_02_u:017.023c: ahaṃ śroṣye sapatnīnām avarāṇāṃ varā satī
GE09ram_02_u:017.023e: ato duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ nu pramadānāṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:017.024a: tvayi saṃnihite 'py evam aham āsaṃ nirākṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:017.024c: kiṃ punaḥ proṣite tāta dhruvaṃ maraṇam eva me
GE09ram_02_u:017.025a: yo hi māṃ sevate kaś cid atha vāpy anuvartate
GE09ram_02_u:017.025c: kaikeyyāḥ putram anvīkṣya sa jano nābhibhāṣate
GE09ram_02_u:017.026a: daśa sapta ca varṣāṇi tava jātasya rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:017.027a: upavāsaiś ca yogaiś ca bahubhiś ca pariśramaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:017.027c: duḥkhaṃ saṃvardhito moghaṃ tvaṃ hi durgatayā mayā
GE09ram_02_u:017.028a: sthiraṃ tu hṛdayaṃ manye mamedaṃ yan na dīryate
GE09ram_02_u:017.029a: mamaiva nūnaṃ maraṇaṃ na vidyate; na cāvakāśo 'sti yamakṣaye mama
GE09ram_02_u:017.029c: yad antako 'dyaiva na māṃ jihīrṣati; prasahya siṃho rudatīṃ mṛgīm iva
GE09ram_02_u:017.030a: sthiraṃ hi nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ mamāyasaṃ; na bhidyate yad bhuvi nāvadīryate
GE09ram_02_u:017.030c: anena duḥkhena ca deham arpitaṃ; dhruvaṃ hy akāle maraṇaṃ na vidyate
GE09ram_02_u:017.031a: idaṃ tu duḥkhaṃ yad anarthakāni me; vratāni dānāni ca saṃyamāś ca hi
GE09ram_02_u:017.031c: tapaś ca taptaṃ yad apatyakāraṇāt; suniṣphalaṃ bījam ivoptam ūṣare
GE09ram_02_u:017.032a: yadi hy akāle maraṇaṃ svayecchayā; labheta kaś cid guru duḥkha karśitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:017.032c: gatāham adyaiva pareta saṃsadaṃ; vinā tvayā dhenur ivātmajena vai
GE09ram_02_u:017.033a: bhṛśam asukham amarṣitā tadā; bahu vilalāpa samīkṣya rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:017.033c: vyasanam upaniśāmya sā mahat; sutam iva baddham avekṣya kiṃnarī
GE09ram_02_u:018.001a: tathā tu vilapantīṃ tāṃ kausalyāṃ rāmamātaram
GE09ram_02_u:018.001c: uvāca lakṣmaṇo dīnas tat kālasadṛśaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:018.002a: na rocate mamāpy etad ārye yad rāghavo vanam
GE09ram_02_u:018.002c: tyaktvā rājyaśriyaṃ gacchet striyā vākyavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:018.003a: viparītaś ca vṛddhaś ca viṣayaiś ca pradharṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:018.003c: nṛpaḥ kim iva na brūyāc codyamānaḥ samanmathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:018.004a: nāsyāparādhaṃ paśyāmi nāpi doṣaṃ tathā vidham
GE09ram_02_u:018.005a: na taṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ loke parokṣam api yo naraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:018.006a: devakalpam ṛjuṃ dāntaṃ ripūṇām api vatsalam
GE09ram_02_u:018.006c: avekṣamāṇaḥ ko dharmaṃ tyajet putram akāraṇāt
GE09ram_02_u:018.007a: tad idaṃ vacanaṃ rājñaḥ punar bālyam upeyuṣaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:018.007c: putraḥ ko hṛdaye kuryād rājavṛttam anusmaran
GE09ram_02_u:018.008a: yāvad eva na jānāti kaś cid artham imaṃ naraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:018.008c: tāvad eva mayā sādham ātmasthaṃ kuru śāsanam
GE09ram_02_u:018.009a: mayā pārśve sadhanuṣā tava guptasya rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:018.010c: kariṣyāmi śarais tīkṣṇair yadi sthāsyati vipriye
GE09ram_02_u:018.011a: bharatasyātha pakṣyo vā yo vāsya hitam icchati
GE09ram_02_u:018.011c: sarvān etān vadhiṣyāmi mṛdur hi paribhūyate
GE09ram_02_u:018.012a: tvayā caiva mayā caiva kṛtvā vairam anuttamam
GE09ram_02_u:018.013c: satyena dhanuṣā caiva datteneṣṭena te śape
GE09ram_02_u:018.014a: dīptam agnim araṇyaṃ vā yadi rāmaḥ pravekṣyate
GE09ram_02_u:018.014c: praviṣṭaṃ tatra māṃ devi tvaṃ pūrvam avadhāraya
GE09ram_02_u:018.015a: harāmi vīryād duḥkhaṃ te tamaḥ sūrya ivoditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:018.015c: devī paśyatu me vīryaṃ rāghavaś caiva paśyatu
GE09ram_02_u:018.016a: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:018.017a: bhrātus te vadataḥ putra lakṣmaṇasya śrutaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:018.017c: yad atrānantaraṃ tat tvaṃ kuruṣva yadi rocate
GE09ram_02_u:018.018a: na cādharmyaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā sapatnyā mama bhāṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:018.018c: vihāya śokasaṃtaptāṃ gantum arhasi mām itaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:018.019a: dharmajña yadi dharmiṣṭho dharmaṃ caritum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:018.019c: śuśrūṣa mām ihasthas tvaṃ cara dharmam anuttamam
GE09ram_02_u:018.020a: śuśrūṣur jananīṃ putra svagṛhe niyato vasan
GE09ram_02_u:018.020c: pareṇa tapasā yuktaḥ kāśyapas tridivaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:018.021a: yathaiva rājā pūjyas te gauraveṇa tathā hy aham
GE09ram_02_u:018.021c: tvāṃ nāham anujānāmi na gantavyam ito vanam
GE09ram_02_u:018.022a: tvadviyogān na me kāryaṃ jīvitena sukhena vā
GE09ram_02_u:018.022c: tvayā saha mama śreyas tṛṇānām api bhakṣaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:018.023a: yadi tvaṃ yāsyasi vanaṃ tyaktvā māṃ śokalālasām
GE09ram_02_u:018.023c: ahaṃ prāyam ihāsiṣye na hi śakṣyāmi jīvitum
GE09ram_02_u:018.024a: tatas tvaṃ prāpsyase putra nirayaṃ lokaviśrutam
GE09ram_02_u:018.025a: vilapantīṃ tathā dīnāṃ kausalyāṃ jananīṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:018.026a: nāsti śaktiḥ pitur vākyaṃ samatikramituṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:018.026c: prasādaye tvāṃ śirasā gantum icchāmy ahaṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:018.027a: ṛṣiṇā ca pitur vākyaṃ kurvatā vratacāriṇā
GE09ram_02_u:018.027c: gaur hatā jānatā dharmaṃ kaṇḍunāpi vipaścitā
GE09ram_02_u:018.028a: asmākaṃ ca kule pūrvaṃ sagarasyājñayā pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:018.028c: khanadbhiḥ sāgarair bhūtim avāptaḥ sumahān vadhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:018.030a: na khalv etan mayaikena kriyate pitṛśāsanam
GE09ram_02_u:018.031a: tad etat tu mayā kāryaṃ kriyate bhuvi nānyathā
GE09ram_02_u:018.031c: pitur hi vacanaṃ kurvan na kaś cin nāma hīyate
GE09ram_02_u:018.032a: tām evam uktvā jananīṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:018.032c: tava lakṣmaṇa jānāmi mayi sneham anuttamam
GE09ram_02_u:018.032e: abhiprāyam avijñāya satyasya ca śamasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:018.033a: dharmo hi paramo loke dharme satyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_02_u:018.033c: dharmasaṃśritam etac ca pitur vacanam uttamam
GE09ram_02_u:018.034a: saṃśrutya ca pitur vākyaṃ mātur vā brāhmaṇasya vā
GE09ram_02_u:018.034c: na kartavyaṃ vṛthā vīra dharmam āśritya tiṣṭhatā
GE09ram_02_u:018.035a: so 'haṃ na śakṣyāmi pitur niyogam ativartitum
GE09ram_02_u:018.035c: pitur hi vacanād vīra kaikeyyāhaṃ pracoditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:018.036c: dharmam āśraya mā taikṣṇyaṃ madbuddhir anugamyatām
GE09ram_02_u:018.037a: tam evam uktvā sauhārdād bhrātaraṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:018.038a: anumanyasva māṃ devi gamiṣyantam ito vanam
GE09ram_02_u:018.038c: śāpitāsi mama prāṇaiḥ kuru svastyayanāni me
GE09ram_02_u:018.038e: tīrṇapratijñaś ca vanāt punar eṣyāmy ahaṃ purīm
GE09ram_02_u:018.039a: yaśo hy ahaṃ kevalarājyakāraṇān; na pṛṣṭhataḥ kartum alaṃ mahodayam
GE09ram_02_u:018.039c: adīrghakāle na tu devi jīvite; vṛṇe 'varām adya mahīm adharmataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:018.040a: prasādayan naravṛṣabhaḥ sa mātaraṃ; parākramāj jigamiṣur eva daṇḍakān
GE09ram_02_u:018.040c: athānujaṃ bhṛśam anuśāsya darśanaṃ; cakāra tāṃ hṛdi jananīṃ pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_02_u:019.001a: atha taṃ vyathayā dīnaṃ saviśeṣam amarṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:019.002a: āsādya rāmaḥ saumitriṃ suhṛdaṃ bhrātaraṃ priyam
GE09ram_02_u:019.002c: uvācedaṃ sa dhairyeṇa dhārayan sattvam ātmavān
GE09ram_02_u:019.004c: mātā naḥ sā yathā na syāt saviśaṅkā tathā kuru
GE09ram_02_u:019.005a: tasyāḥ śaṅkāmayaṃ duḥkhaṃ muhūrtam api notsahe
GE09ram_02_u:019.006a: na buddhipūrvaṃ nābuddhaṃ smarāmīha kadā cana
GE09ram_02_u:019.006c: mātṝṇāṃ vā pitur vāhaṃ kṛtam alpaṃ ca vipriyam
GE09ram_02_u:019.008a: tasyāpi hi bhaved asmin karmaṇy apratisaṃhṛte
GE09ram_02_u:019.008c: satyaṃ neti manas tāpas tasya tāpas tapec ca mām
GE09ram_02_u:019.009c: anvag evāham icchāmi vanaṃ gantum itaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:019.012a: buddhiḥ praṇītā yeneyaṃ manaś ca susamāhitam
GE09ram_02_u:019.012c: tat tu nārhāmi saṃkleṣṭuṃ pravrajiṣyāmi māciram
GE09ram_02_u:019.013a: kṛtāntas tv eva saumitre draṣṭavyo matpravāsane
GE09ram_02_u:019.013c: rājyasya ca vitīrṇasya punar eva nivartane
GE09ram_02_u:019.014a: kaikeyyāḥ pratipattir hi kathaṃ syān mama pīḍane
GE09ram_02_u:019.014c: yadi bhāvo na daivo 'yaṃ kṛtāntavihito bhavet
GE09ram_02_u:019.015a: jānāsi hi yathā saumya na mātṛṣu mamāntaram
GE09ram_02_u:019.015c: bhūtapūrvaṃ viśeṣo vā tasyā mayi sute 'pi vā
GE09ram_02_u:019.016c: ugrair vākyair ahaṃ tasyā nānyad daivāt samarthaye
GE09ram_02_u:019.017c: brūyāt sā prākṛteva strī matpīḍāṃ bhartṛsaṃnidhau
GE09ram_02_u:019.018a: yad acintyaṃ tu tad daivaṃ bhūteṣv api na hanyate
GE09ram_02_u:019.018c: vyaktaṃ mayi ca tasyāṃ ca patito hi viparyayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:019.019a: kaś cid daivena saumitre yoddhum utsahate pumān
GE09ram_02_u:019.019c: yasya na grahaṇaṃ kiṃ cit karmaṇo 'nyatra dṛśyate
GE09ram_02_u:019.020c: yasya kiṃ cit tathā bhūtaṃ nanu daivasya karma tat
GE09ram_02_u:019.021a: vyāhate 'py abhiṣeke me paritāpo na vidyate
GE09ram_02_u:019.021c: tasmād aparitāpaḥ saṃs tvam apy anuvidhāya mām
GE09ram_02_u:019.022a: na lakṣmaṇāsmin mama rājyavighne; mātā yavīyasy atiśaṅkanīyā
GE09ram_02_u:019.022c: daivābhipannā hi vadanty aniṣṭaṃ; jānāsi daivaṃ ca tathā prabhāvam
GE09ram_02_u:020.001a: iti bruvati rāme tu lakṣmaṇo 'dhaḥśirā muhuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:020.002a: tadā tu baddhvā bhrukuṭīṃ bhruvor madhye nararṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:020.003c: babhau kruddhasya siṃhasya mukhasya sadṛśaṃ mukham
GE09ram_02_u:020.004a: agrahas taṃ vidhunvaṃs tu hastī hastam ivātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:020.004c: tiryag ūrdhvaṃ śarīre ca pātayitvā śirodharām
GE09ram_02_u:020.005a: agrākṣṇā vīkṣamāṇas tu tiryag bhrātaram abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:020.005c: asthāne saṃbhramo yasya jāto vai sumahān ayam
GE09ram_02_u:020.006c: kathaṃ hy etad asaṃbhrāntas tvadvidho vaktum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:020.007c: kiṃ nāma kṛpaṇaṃ daivam aśaktam abhiśaṃsasi
GE09ram_02_u:020.008a: pāpayos tu kathaṃ nāma tayoḥ śaṅkā na vidyate
GE09ram_02_u:020.008c: santi dharmopadhāḥ ślakṣṇā dharmātman kiṃ na budhyase
GE09ram_02_u:020.009c: yeneyam āgatā dvaidhaṃ tava buddhir mahīpate
GE09ram_02_u:020.009e: sa hi dharmo mama dveṣyaḥ prasaṅgād yasya muhyasi
GE09ram_02_u:020.010a: yady api pratipattis te daivī cāpi tayor matam
GE09ram_02_u:020.010c: tathāpy upekṣaṇīyaṃ te na me tad api rocate
GE09ram_02_u:020.011a: viklavo vīryahīno yaḥ sa daivam anuvartate
GE09ram_02_u:020.013a: drakṣyanti tv adya daivasya pauruṣaṃ puruṣasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:020.014a: adya matpauruṣahataṃ daivaṃ drakṣyanti vai janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:020.014c: yad daivād āhataṃ te 'dya dṛṣṭaṃ rājyābhiṣecanam
GE09ram_02_u:020.016c: na ca kṛtsnās trayo lokā vihanyuḥ kiṃ punaḥ pitā
GE09ram_02_u:020.017a: yair vivāsas tavāraṇye mitho rājan samarthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:020.017c: araṇye te vivatsyanti caturdaśa samās tathā
GE09ram_02_u:020.018a: ahaṃ tadāśāṃ chetsyāmi pitus tasyāś ca yā tava
GE09ram_02_u:020.019a: madbalena viruddhāya na syād daivabalaṃ tathā
GE09ram_02_u:020.022c: naivam icchasi dharmātman rājyaṃ rāma tvam ātmani
GE09ram_02_u:020.023a: pratijāne ca te vīra mā bhūvaṃ vīralokabhāk
GE09ram_02_u:020.023c: rājyaṃ ca tava rakṣeyam ahaṃ veleva sāgaram
GE09ram_02_u:020.024a: maṅgalair abhiṣiñcasva tatra tvaṃ vyāpṛto bhava
GE09ram_02_u:020.024c: aham eko mahīpālān alaṃ vārayituṃ balāt
GE09ram_02_u:020.025a: na śobhārthāv imau bāhū na dhanur bhūṣaṇāya me
GE09ram_02_u:020.026c: na cāhaṃ kāmaye 'tyarthaṃ yaḥ syāc chatrur mato mama
GE09ram_02_u:020.027c: pragṛhītena vai śatruṃ vajriṇaṃ vā na kalpaye
GE09ram_02_u:020.029c: patiṣyanti dvipā bhūmau meghā iva savidyutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:020.030c: kathaṃ puruṣamānī syāt puruṣāṇāṃ mayi sthite
GE09ram_02_u:020.031a: bahubhiś caikam atyasyann ekena ca bahūñ janān
GE09ram_02_u:020.032c: rājñaś cāprabhutāṃ kartuṃ prabhutvaṃ ca tava prabho
GE09ram_02_u:020.033c: vasūnāṃ ca vimokṣasya suhṛdāṃ pālanasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:020.034a: anurūpāv imau bāhū rāma karma kariṣyataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:020.035a: bravīhi ko 'dyaiva mayā viyujyatāṃ; tavāsuhṛt prāṇayaśaḥ suhṛjjanaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:020.035c: yathā taveyaṃ vasudhā vaśe bhavet; tathaiva māṃ śādhi tavāsmi kiṃkaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:020.036a: vimṛjya bāṣpaṃ parisāntvya cāsakṛt; sa lakṣmaṇaṃ rāghavavaṃśavardhanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:020.036c: uvāca pitrye vacane vyavasthitaṃ; nibodha mām eṣa hi saumya satpathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:021.001a: taṃ samīkṣya tv avahitaṃ pitur nirdeśapālane
GE09ram_02_u:021.002c: mayi jāto daśarathāt katham uñchena vartayet
GE09ram_02_u:021.003a: yasya bhṛtyāś ca dāsāś ca mṛṣṭāny annāni bhuñjate
GE09ram_02_u:021.003c: kathaṃ sa bhokṣyate nātho vane mūlaphalāny ayam
GE09ram_02_u:021.004a: ka etac chraddadhec chrutvā kasya vā na bhaved bhayam
GE09ram_02_u:021.004c: guṇavān dayito rājño rāghavo yad vivāsyate
GE09ram_02_u:021.005a: tvayā vihīnām iha māṃ śokāgnir atulo mahān
GE09ram_02_u:021.006a: kathaṃ hi dhenuḥ svaṃ vatsaṃ gacchantaṃ nānugacchati
GE09ram_02_u:021.007a: tathā nigaditaṃ mātrā tad vākyaṃ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:021.008a: kaikeyyā vañcito rājā mayi cāraṇyam āśrite
GE09ram_02_u:021.008c: bhavatyā ca parityakto na nūnaṃ vartayiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:021.009a: bhartuḥ kila parityāgo nṛśaṃsaḥ kevalaṃ striyāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:021.009c: sa bhavatyā na kartavyo manasāpi vigarhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:021.010a: yāvaj jīvati kākutsthaḥ pitā me jagatīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:021.010c: śuśrūṣā kriyatāṃ tāvat sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:021.011a: evam uktā tu rāmeṇa kausalyā śubha darśanā
GE09ram_02_u:021.012a: evam uktas tu vacanaṃ rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:021.012c: bhūyas tām abravīd vākyaṃ mātaraṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitām
GE09ram_02_u:021.013a: mayā caiva bhavatyā ca kartavyaṃ vacanaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:021.013c: rājā bhartā guruḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarveṣām īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:021.014a: imāni tu mahāraṇye vihṛtya nava pañca ca
GE09ram_02_u:021.015a: evam uktā priyaṃ putraṃ bāṣpapūrṇānanā tadā
GE09ram_02_u:021.016a: āsāṃ rāma sapatnīnāṃ vastuṃ madhye na me kṣamam
GE09ram_02_u:021.016c: naya mām api kākutstha vanaṃ vanyaṃ mṛgīṃ yathā
GE09ram_02_u:021.016e: yadi te gamane buddhiḥ kṛtā pitur apekṣayā
GE09ram_02_u:021.017a: tāṃ tathā rudatīṃ rāmo rudan vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:021.017c: jīvantyā hi striyā bhartā daivataṃ prabhur eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:021.017e: bhavatyā mama caivādya rājā prabhavati prabhuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:021.018c: bhavatīm anuvarteta sa hi dharmarataḥ sadā
GE09ram_02_u:021.019a: yathā mayi tu niṣkrānte putraśokena pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:021.019c: śramaṃ nāvāpnuyāt kiṃ cid apramattā tathā kuru
GE09ram_02_u:021.020c: bhartāraṃ nānuvarteta sā ca pāpagatir bhavet
GE09ram_02_u:021.021a: śuśrūṣam eva kurvīta bhartuḥ priyahite ratā
GE09ram_02_u:021.021c: eṣa dharmaḥ purā dṛṣṭo loke vede śrutaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:021.022a: pūjyās te matkṛte devi brāhmaṇāś caiva suvratāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:021.023a: prāpsyase paramaṃ kāmaṃ mayi pratyāgate sati
GE09ram_02_u:021.024e: gaccha putra tvam ekāgro bhadraṃ te 'stu sadā vibho
GE09ram_02_u:021.025a: tathā hi rāmaṃ vanavāsaniścitaṃ; samīkṣya devī parameṇa cetasā
GE09ram_02_u:021.025c: uvāca rāmaṃ śubhalakṣaṇaṃ vaco; babhūva ca svastyayanābhikāṅkṣiṇī
GE09ram_02_u:022.001a: sāpanīya tam āyāsam upaspṛśya jalaṃ śuci
GE09ram_02_u:022.002a: svasti sādhyāś ca viśve ca marutaś ca maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:022.002c: svasti dhātā vidhātā ca svasti pūṣā bhago 'ryamā
GE09ram_02_u:022.003a: ṛtavaś caiva pakṣāś ca māsāḥ saṃvatsarāḥ kṣapāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:022.003c: dināni ca muhūrtāś ca svasti kurvantu te sadā
GE09ram_02_u:022.004a: smṛtir dhṛtiś ca dharmaś ca pāntu tvāṃ putra sarvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:022.004c: skandaś ca bhagavān devaḥ somaś ca sabṛhaspatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:022.005a: saptarṣayo nāradaś ca te tvāṃ rakṣantu sarvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:022.005c: nakṣatrāṇi ca sarvāṇi grahāś ca sahadevatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:022.006a: plavagā vṛścikā daṃśā maśakāś caiva kānane
GE09ram_02_u:022.006c: sarīsṛpāś ca kīṭāś ca mā bhūvan gahane tava
GE09ram_02_u:022.007a: mahādvipāś ca siṃhāś ca vyāghrā ṛkṣāś ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:022.007c: mahiṣāḥ śṛṅgiṇo raudrā na te druhyantu putraka
GE09ram_02_u:022.008c: mā ca tvāṃ hiṃsiṣuḥ putra mayā saṃpūjitās tv iha
GE09ram_02_u:022.009a: āgamās te śivāḥ santu sidhyantu ca parākramāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:022.010a: svasti te 'stv āntarikṣebhyaḥ pārthivebhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:022.010c: sarvebhyaś caiva devebhyo ye ca te paripanthinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:022.011c: ye ca śeṣāḥ surās te tvāṃ rakṣantu vanavāsinam
GE09ram_02_u:022.012a: iti mālyaiḥ suragaṇān gandhaiś cāpi yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:022.013c: vṛtranāśe samabhavat tat te bhavatu maṅgalam
GE09ram_02_u:022.014c: amṛtaṃ prārthayānasya tat te bhavatu maṅgalam
GE09ram_02_u:022.015c: cakāra rakṣāṃ kausalyā mantrair abhijajāpa ca
GE09ram_02_u:022.016c: avadat putra siddhārtho gaccha rāma yathāsukham
GE09ram_02_u:022.017c: paśyāmi tvāṃ sukhaṃ vatsa susthitaṃ rājaveśmani
GE09ram_02_u:022.018c: abhiprayātasya vanaṃ cirāya te; hitāni kāṅkṣantu diśaś ca rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:022.019a: itīva cāśrupratipūrṇalocanā; samāpya ca svastyayanaṃ yathāvidhi
GE09ram_02_u:022.019c: pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva cakāra rāghavaṃ; punaḥ punaś cāpi nipīḍya sasvaje
GE09ram_02_u:022.020a: tathā tu devyā sa kṛtapradakṣiṇo; nipīḍya mātuś caraṇau punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:022.020c: jagāma sītānilayaṃ mahāyaśāḥ; sa rāghavaḥ prajvalitaḥ svayā śriyā
GE09ram_02_u:023.001a: abhivādya tu kausalyāṃ rāmaḥ saṃprasthito vanam
GE09ram_02_u:023.003a: vaidehī cāpi tat sarvaṃ na śuśrāva tapasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:023.003c: tad eva hṛdi tasyāś ca yauvarājyābhiṣecanam
GE09ram_02_u:023.004a: devakāryaṃ sma sā kṛtvā kṛtajñā hṛṣṭacetanā
GE09ram_02_u:023.006a: atha sītā samutpatya vepamānā ca taṃ patim
GE09ram_02_u:023.007c: āha duḥkhābhisaṃtaptā kim idānīm idaṃ prabho
GE09ram_02_u:023.008a: adya bārhaspataḥ śrīmān yuktaḥ puṣyo na rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:023.008c: procyate brāhmaṇaiḥ prājñaiḥ kena tvam asi durmanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:023.011a: vāgmino bandinaś cāpi prahṛṣṭās tvaṃ nararṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:023.012a: na te kṣaudraṃ ca dadhi ca brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:023.013a: na tvāṃ prakṛtayaḥ sarvā śreṇīmukhyāś ca bhūṣitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:023.014c: mukhyaḥ puṣyaratho yuktaḥ kiṃ na gacchati te 'grataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:023.015a: na hastī cāgrataḥ śrīmāṃs tava lakṣaṇapūjitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:023.016a: na ca kāñcanacitraṃ te paśyāmi priyadarśana
GE09ram_02_u:023.017a: abhiṣeko yadā sajjaḥ kim idānīm idaṃ tava
GE09ram_02_u:023.017c: apūrvo mukhavarṇaś ca na praharṣaś ca lakṣyate
GE09ram_02_u:023.018c: sīte tatrabhavāṃs tāta pravrājayati māṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:023.022a: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vastavyaṃ daṇḍake mayā
GE09ram_02_u:023.022c: pitrā me bharataś cāpi yauvarājye niyojitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:023.022e: so 'haṃ tvām āgato draṣṭuṃ prasthito vijanaṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:023.023a: bharatasya samīpe te nāhaṃ kathyaḥ kadā cana
GE09ram_02_u:023.023c: ṛddhiyuktā hi puruṣā na sahante parastavam
GE09ram_02_u:023.023e: tasmān na te guṇāḥ kathyā bharatasyāgrato mama
GE09ram_02_u:023.024a: nāpi tvaṃ tena bhartavyā viśeṣeṇa kadā cana
GE09ram_02_u:023.025a: ahaṃ cāpi pratijñāṃ tāṃ guroḥ samanupālayan
GE09ram_02_u:023.025c: vanam adyaiva yāsyāmi sthirā bhava manasvini
GE09ram_02_u:023.026a: yāte ca mayi kalyāṇi vanaṃ muniniṣevitam
GE09ram_02_u:023.027a: kālyam utthāya devānāṃ kṛtvā pūjāṃ yathāvidhi
GE09ram_02_u:023.028a: mātā ca mama kausalyā vṛddhā saṃtāpakarśitā
GE09ram_02_u:023.028c: dharmam evāgrataḥ kṛtvā tvattaḥ saṃmānam arhati
GE09ram_02_u:023.029a: vanditavyāś ca te nityaṃ yāḥ śeṣā mama mātaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:023.031a: vipriyaṃ na ca kartavyaṃ bharatasya kadā cana
GE09ram_02_u:023.031c: sa hi rājā prabhuś caiva deśasya ca kulasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:023.033a: aurasān api putrān hi tyajanty ahitakāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:023.034a: ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi mahāvanaṃ priye; tvayā hi vastavyam ihaiva bhāmini
GE09ram_02_u:023.034c: yathā vyalīkaṃ kuruṣe na kasya cit; tathā tvayā kāryam idaṃ vaco mama
GE09ram_02_u:024.001a: evam uktā tu vaidehī priyārhā priyavādinī
GE09ram_02_u:024.001c: praṇayād eva saṃkruddhā bhartāram idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:024.002a: āryaputra pitā mātā bhrātā putras tathā snuṣā
GE09ram_02_u:024.002c: svāni puṇyāni bhuñjānāḥ svaṃ svaṃ bhāgyam upāsate
GE09ram_02_u:024.003a: bhartur bhāgyaṃ tu bhāryaikā prāpnoti puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:024.003c: ataś caivāham ādiṣṭā vane vastavyam ity api
GE09ram_02_u:024.004a: na pitā nātmajo nātmā na mātā na sakhījanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:024.004c: iha pretya ca nārīṇāṃ patir eko gatiḥ sadā
GE09ram_02_u:024.005a: yadi tvaṃ prasthito durgaṃ vanam adyaiva rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:024.006c: naya māṃ vīra viśrabdhaḥ pāpaṃ mayi na vidyate
GE09ram_02_u:024.008a: anuśiṣṭāsmi mātrā ca pitrā ca vividhāśrayam
GE09ram_02_u:024.008c: nāsmi saṃprati vaktavyā vartitavyaṃ yathā mayā
GE09ram_02_u:024.009a: sukhaṃ vane nivatsyāmi yathaiva bhavane pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:024.010c: saha raṃsye tvayā vīra vaneṣu madhugandhiṣu
GE09ram_02_u:024.011a: tvaṃ hi kartuṃ vane śakto rāma saṃparipālanam
GE09ram_02_u:024.011c: anyasya pai janasyeha kiṃ punar mama mānada
GE09ram_02_u:024.012c: na te duḥkhaṃ kariṣyāmi nivasantī saha tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:024.013a: icchāmi saritaḥ śailān palvalāni vanāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:024.013c: draṣṭuṃ sarvatra nirbhītā tvayā nāthena dhīmatā
GE09ram_02_u:024.014c: iccheyaṃ sukhinī draṣṭuṃ tvayā vīreṇa saṃgatā
GE09ram_02_u:024.015c: evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇāṃ śataṃ vāhaṃ tvayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:024.016a: svarge 'pi ca vinā vāso bhavitā yadi rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:024.016c: tvayā mama naravyāghra nāhaṃ tam api rocaye
GE09ram_02_u:024.017a: ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi vanaṃ sudurgamaṃ; mṛgāyutaṃ vānaravāraṇair yutam
GE09ram_02_u:024.017c: vane nivatsyāmi yathā pitur gṛhe; tavaiva pādāv upagṛhya saṃmatā
GE09ram_02_u:024.018a: ananyabhāvām anuraktacetasaṃ; tvayā viyuktāṃ maraṇāya niścitām
GE09ram_02_u:024.018c: nayasva māṃ sādhu kuruṣva yācanāṃ; na te mayāto gurutā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:024.019a: tathā bruvāṇām api dharmavatsalo; na ca sma sītāṃ nṛvaro ninīṣati
GE09ram_02_u:024.019c: uvāca caināṃ bahu saṃnivartane; vane nivāsasya ca duḥkhitāṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:025.001a: sa evaṃ bruvatīṃ sītāṃ dharmajño dharmavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:025.001c: nivartanārthe dharmātmā vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:025.002a: sīte mahākulīnāsi dharme ca niratā sadā
GE09ram_02_u:025.002c: ihācara svadharmaṃ tvaṃ mā yathā manasaḥ sukham
GE09ram_02_u:025.003a: sīte yathā tvāṃ vakṣyāmi tathā kāryaṃ tvayābale
GE09ram_02_u:025.003c: vane doṣā hi bahavo vadatas tān nibodha me
GE09ram_02_u:025.004c: bahudoṣaṃ hi kāntāraṃ vanam ity abhidhīyate
GE09ram_02_u:025.005c: sadā sukhaṃ na jānāmi duḥkham eva sadā vanam
GE09ram_02_u:025.006c: siṃhānāṃ ninadā duḥkhāḥ śrotuṃ duḥkham ato vanam
GE09ram_02_u:025.009a: atīva vātas timiraṃ bubhukṣā cātra nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:025.009c: bhayāni ca mahānty atra tato duḥkhataraṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:025.010a: sarīsṛpāś ca bahavo bahurūpāś ca bhāmini
GE09ram_02_u:025.010c: caranti pṛthivīṃ darpād ato dukhataraṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:025.011c: tiṣṭhanty āvṛtya panthānam ato duḥkhataraṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:025.012a: pataṃgā vṛścikāḥ kīṭā daṃśāś ca maśakaiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:025.012c: bādhante nityam abale sarvaṃ duḥkham ato vanam
GE09ram_02_u:025.013a: drumāḥ kaṇṭakinaś caiva kuśakāśāś ca bhāmini
GE09ram_02_u:025.014a: tad alaṃ te vanaṃ gatvā kṣamaṃ na hi vanaṃ tava
GE09ram_02_u:025.015a: vanaṃ tu netuṃ na kṛtā matis tadā; babhūva rāmeṇa yadā mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:025.015c: na tasya sītā vacanaṃ cakāra tat; tato 'bravīd rāmam idaṃ suduḥkhitā
GE09ram_02_u:026.001a: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sītā rāmasya duḥkhitā
GE09ram_02_u:026.002a: ye tvayā kīrtitā doṣā vane vastavyatāṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:026.002c: guṇān ity eva tān viddhi tava snehapuraskṛtān
GE09ram_02_u:026.003a: tvayā ca saha gantavyaṃ mayā gurujanājñayā
GE09ram_02_u:026.003c: tvadviyogena me rāma tyaktavyam iha jīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:026.004a: na ca māṃ tvatsamīpastham api śaknoti rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:026.005a: patihīnā tu yā nārī na sā śakṣyati jīvitum
GE09ram_02_u:026.005c: kāmam evaṃvidhaṃ rāma tvayā mama vidarśitam
GE09ram_02_u:026.006a: atha cāpi mahāprājña brāhmaṇānāṃ mayā śrutam
GE09ram_02_u:026.006c: purā pitṛgṛhe satyaṃ vastavyaṃ kila me vane
GE09ram_02_u:026.008a: ādeśo vanavāsasya prāptavyaḥ sa mayā kila
GE09ram_02_u:026.008c: sā tvayā saha tatrāhaṃ yāsyāmi priya nānyathā
GE09ram_02_u:026.009c: kālaś cāyaṃ samutpannaḥ satyavāg bhavatu dvijaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:026.010a: vanavāse hi jānāmi duḥkhāni bahudhā kila
GE09ram_02_u:026.011a: kanyayā ca pitur gehe vanavāsaḥ śruto mayā
GE09ram_02_u:026.012a: prasāditaś ca vai pūrvaṃ tvaṃ vai bahuvidhaṃ prabho
GE09ram_02_u:026.012c: gamanaṃ vanavāsasya kāṅkṣitaṃ hi saha tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:026.013a: kṛtakṣaṇāhaṃ bhadraṃ te gamanaṃ prati rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:026.013c: vanavāsasya śūrasya caryā hi mama rocate
GE09ram_02_u:026.014c: bhartāram anugacchantī bhartā hi mama daivatam
GE09ram_02_u:026.015a: pretyabhāve 'pi kalyāṇaḥ saṃgamo me saha tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:026.015c: śrutir hi śrūyate puṇyā brāhmaṇānāṃ yaśasvinām
GE09ram_02_u:026.016a: iha loke ca pitṛbhir yā strī yasya mahāmate
GE09ram_02_u:026.016c: adbhir dattā svadharmeṇa pretyabhāve 'pi tasya sā
GE09ram_02_u:026.017a: evam asmāt svakāṃ nārīṃ suvṛttāṃ hi pativratām
GE09ram_02_u:026.017c: nābhirocayase netuṃ tvaṃ māṃ keneha hetunā
GE09ram_02_u:026.018a: bhaktāṃ pativratāṃ dīnāṃ māṃ samāṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ
GE09ram_02_u:026.019a: yadi māṃ duḥkhitām evaṃ vanaṃ netuṃ na cecchasi
GE09ram_02_u:026.019c: viṣam agniṃ jalaṃ vāham āsthāsye mṛtyukāraṇāt
GE09ram_02_u:026.020a: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ taṃ sā yācate gamanaṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:026.020c: nānumene mahābāhus tāṃ netuṃ vijanaṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:026.021a: evam uktā tu sā cintāṃ maithilī samupāgatā
GE09ram_02_u:026.022a: cintayantīṃ tathā tāṃ tu nivartayitum ātmavān
GE09ram_02_u:026.022c: krodhāviṣṭāṃ tu vaidehīṃ kākutstho bahv asāntvayat
GE09ram_02_u:027.003a: kiṃ tvāmanyata vaidehaḥ pitā me mithilādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:027.004a: anṛtaṃ balaloko 'yam ajñānād yad dhi vakṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:027.004c: tejo nāsti paraṃ rāme tapatīva divākare
GE09ram_02_u:027.005a: kiṃ hi kṛtvā viṣaṇṇas tvaṃ kuto vā bhayam asti te
GE09ram_02_u:027.006c: sāvitrīm iva māṃ viddhi tvam ātmavaśavartinīm
GE09ram_02_u:027.007a: na tv ahaṃ manasāpy anyaṃ draṣṭāsmi tvadṛte 'nagha
GE09ram_02_u:027.008a: svayaṃ tu bhāryāṃ kaumārīṃ ciram adhyuṣitāṃ satīm
GE09ram_02_u:027.008c: śailūṣa iva māṃ rāma parebhyo dātum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:027.009a: sa mām anādāya vanaṃ na tvaṃ prasthātum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:027.009c: tapo vā yadi vāraṇyaṃ svargo vā syāt saha tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:027.010a: na ca me bhavitā tatra kaś cit pathi pariśramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:027.012c: rajo ramaṇa tan manye parārdhyam iva candanam
GE09ram_02_u:027.014a: patraṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ yat tvam alpaṃ vā yadi vā bahu
GE09ram_02_u:027.015a: na mātur na pitus tatra smariṣyāmi na veśmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:027.015c: ārtavāny upabhuñjānā puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:027.016a: na ca tatra gataḥ kiṃ cid draṣṭum arhasi vipriyam
GE09ram_02_u:027.016c: matkṛte na ca te śoko na bhaviṣyāmi durbharā
GE09ram_02_u:027.017a: yas tvayā saha sa svargo nirayo yas tvayā vinā
GE09ram_02_u:027.017c: iti jānan parāṃ prītiṃ gaccha rāma mayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:027.018a: atha mām evam avyagrāṃ vanaṃ naiva nayiṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:027.018c: viṣam adyaiva pāsyāmi mā viśaṃ dviṣatāṃ vaśam
GE09ram_02_u:027.019a: paścād api hi duḥkhena mama naivāsti jīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:027.019c: ujjhitāyās tvayā nātha tadaiva maraṇaṃ varam
GE09ram_02_u:027.020a: idaṃ hi sahituṃ śokaṃ muhūrtam api notsahe
GE09ram_02_u:027.020c: kiṃ punar daśavarṣāṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca duḥkhitā
GE09ram_02_u:027.021a: iti sā śokasaṃtaptā vilapya karuṇaṃ bahu
GE09ram_02_u:027.021c: cukrośa patim āyastā bhṛśam āliṅgya sasvaram
GE09ram_02_u:027.022a: sā viddhā bahubhir vākyair digdhair iva gajāṅganā
GE09ram_02_u:027.024a: tāṃ pariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ visaṃjñām iva duḥkhitām
GE09ram_02_u:027.025a: na devi tava duḥkhena svargam apy abhirocaye
GE09ram_02_u:027.025c: na hi me 'sti bhayaṃ kiṃ cit svayambhor iva sarvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:027.026c: vāsaṃ na rocaye 'raṇye śaktimān api rakṣaṇe
GE09ram_02_u:027.027a: yat sṛṣṭāsi mayā sārdhaṃ vanavāsāya maithili
GE09ram_02_u:027.027c: na vihātuṃ mayā śakyā kīrtir ātmavatā yathā
GE09ram_02_u:027.028a: dharmas tu gajanāsoru sadbhir ācaritaḥ purā
GE09ram_02_u:027.028c: taṃ cāham anuvarte 'dya yathā sūryaṃ suvarcalā
GE09ram_02_u:027.029a: eṣa dharmas tu suśroṇi pitur mātuś ca vaśyatā
GE09ram_02_u:027.029c: ataś cājñāṃ vyatikramya nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe
GE09ram_02_u:027.030a: sa māṃ pitā yathā śāsti satyadharmapathe sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:027.030c: tathā vartitum icchāmi sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:027.031a: brāhmaṇebhyaś ca ratnāni bhikṣukebhyaś ca bhojanam
GE09ram_02_u:027.032a: anukūlaṃ tu sā bhartur jñātvā gamanam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:027.033a: tataḥ prahṛṣṭā paripūrṇamānasā; yaśasvinī bhartur avekṣya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:027.033c: dhanāni ratnāni ca dātum aṅganā; pracakrame dharmabhṛtāṃ manasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:028.002a: mayādya saha saumitre tvayi gacchati tad vanam
GE09ram_02_u:028.002c: ko bhariṣyati kausalyāṃ sumitrāṃ vā yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_02_u:028.003a: abhivarṣati kāmair yaḥ parjanyaḥ pṛthivīm iva
GE09ram_02_u:028.004a: sā hi rājyam idaṃ prāpya nṛpasyāśvapateḥ sutā
GE09ram_02_u:028.005a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ ślakṣṇayā girā
GE09ram_02_u:028.006c: kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca prayato nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:028.007a: kausalyā bibhṛyād āryā sahasram api madvidhān
GE09ram_02_u:028.009a: āhariṣyāmi te nityaṃ mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:028.010a: bhavāṃs tu saha vaidehyā girisānuṣu raṃsyate
GE09ram_02_u:028.010c: ahaṃ sarvaṃ kariṣyāmi jāgrataḥ svapataś ca te
GE09ram_02_u:028.011a: rāmas tv anena vākyena suprītaḥ pratyuvāca tam
GE09ram_02_u:028.012a: ye ca rājño dadau divye mahātmā varuṇaḥ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:028.014c: sa tvam āyudham ādāya kṣipram āvraja lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:028.016c: rāmāya darśayām āsa saumitriḥ sarvam āyudham
GE09ram_02_u:028.017a: tam uvācātmavān rāmaḥ prītyā lakṣmaṇam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:028.017c: kāle tvam āgataḥ saumya kāṅkṣite mama lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:028.018a: ahaṃ pradātum icchāmi yad idaṃ māmakaṃ dhanam
GE09ram_02_u:028.019c: teṣām api ca me bhūyaḥ sarveṣāṃ copajīvinām
GE09ram_02_u:028.020a: vasiṣṭhaputraṃ tu suyajñam āryaṃ; tvam ānayāśu pravaraṃ dvijānām
GE09ram_02_u:028.020c: abhiprayāsyāmi vanaṃ samastān; abhyarcya śiṣṭān aparān dvijātīn
GE09ram_02_u:029.001a: tataḥ śāsanam ājñāya bhrātuḥ śubhataraṃ priyam
GE09ram_02_u:029.003a: tataḥ saṃdhyām upāsyāśu gatvā saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_02_u:029.003c: juṣṭaṃ tat prāviśal lakṣmyā ramyaṃ rāmaniveśanam
GE09ram_02_u:029.004a: tam āgataṃ vedavidaṃ prāñjaliḥ sītayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:029.005c: sahema sūtrair maṇibhiḥ keyūrair valayair api
GE09ram_02_u:029.006a: anyaiś ca ratnair bahubhiḥ kākutsthaḥ pratyapūjayat
GE09ram_02_u:029.007a: hāraṃ ca hemasūtraṃ ca bhāryāyai saumya hāraya
GE09ram_02_u:029.007c: raśanāṃ cādhunā sītā dātum icchati te sakhe
GE09ram_02_u:029.009a: nāgaḥ śatruṃ jayo nāma mātulo yaṃ dadau mama
GE09ram_02_u:029.010a: ity uktaḥ sa hi rāmeṇa suyajñaḥ pratigṛhya tat
GE09ram_02_u:029.011a: atha bhrātaram avyagraṃ priyaṃ rāmaḥ priyaṃvadaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:029.012a: agastyaṃ kauśikaṃ caiva tāv ubhau brāhmaṇottamau
GE09ram_02_u:029.013a: kausalyāṃ ca ya āśīrbhir bhaktaḥ paryupatiṣṭhati
GE09ram_02_u:029.014a: tasya yānaṃ ca dāsīś ca saumitre saṃpradāpaya
GE09ram_02_u:029.014c: kauśeyāni ca vastrāṇi yāvat tuṣyati sa dvijaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:029.015c: toṣayainaṃ mahārhaiś ca ratnair vastrair dhanais tathā
GE09ram_02_u:029.016a: śālivāhasahasraṃ ca dve śate bhadrakāṃs tathā
GE09ram_02_u:029.017a: tataḥ sa puruṣavyāghras tad dhanaṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:029.019a: lakṣmaṇasya ca yad veśma gṛhaṃ ca yad idaṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:029.020a: ity uktvā duḥkhitaṃ sarvaṃ janaṃ tam upajīvinam
GE09ram_02_u:029.021a: tataḥ sa puruṣavyāghras tad dhanaṃ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:029.022a: tatrāsīt piṅgalo gārgyas trijaṭo nāma vai dvijaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:029.022c: ā pañcamāyāḥ kakṣyāyā nainaṃ kaś cid avārayat
GE09ram_02_u:029.023a: sa rājaputram āsādya trijaṭo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:029.023e: uñchavṛttir vane nityaṃ pratyavekṣasva mām iti
GE09ram_02_u:029.024c: gavāṃ sahasram apy ekaṃ na tu viśrāṇitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_02_u:029.025a: sa śāṭīṃ tvaritaḥ kaṭyāṃ saṃbhrāntaḥ pariveṣṭya tām
GE09ram_02_u:029.026a: uvāca ca tato rāmas taṃ gārgyam abhisāntvayan
GE09ram_02_u:029.026c: manyur na khalu kartavyaḥ parihāso hy ayaṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:029.027a: tataḥ sabhāryas trijaṭo mahāmunir; gavām anīkaṃ pratigṛhya moditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:030.001a: dattvā tu saha vaidehyā brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ bahu
GE09ram_02_u:030.001c: jagmatuḥ pitaraṃ draṣṭuṃ sītayā saha rāghavau
GE09ram_02_u:030.004a: na hi rathyāḥ sma śakyante gantuṃ bahujanākulāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:030.004c: āruhya tasmāt prāsādān dīnāḥ paśyanti rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:030.005a: padātiṃ varjitacchatraṃ rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:030.006a: yaṃ yāntam anuyāti sma caturaṅgabalaṃ mahat
GE09ram_02_u:030.006c: tam ekaṃ sītayā sārdham anuyāti sma lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:030.007a: aiśvaryasya rasajñaḥ san kāmināṃ caiva kāmadaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:030.008a: yā na śakyā purā draṣṭuṃ bhūtair ākāśagair api
GE09ram_02_u:030.008c: tām adya sītāṃ paśyanti rājamārgagatā janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:030.009c: varṣam uṣṇaṃ ca śītaṃ ca neṣyaty āśu vivarṇatām
GE09ram_02_u:030.010a: adya nūnaṃ daśarathaḥ sattvam āviśya bhāṣate
GE09ram_02_u:030.010c: na hi rājā priyaṃ putraṃ vivāsayitum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:030.011c: kiṃ punar yasya loko 'yaṃ jito vṛttena kevalam
GE09ram_02_u:030.012a: ānṛśaṃsyam anukrośaḥ śrutaṃ śīlaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:030.014a: pīḍayā pīḍitaṃ sarvaṃ jagad asya jagatpateḥ
GE09ram_02_u:030.015a: te lakṣmaṇa iva kṣipraṃ sapatnyaḥ sahabāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:030.016a: udyānāni parityajya kṣetrāṇi ca gṛhāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:030.019a: vanaṃ nagaram evāstu yena gacchati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:030.019c: asmābhiś ca parityaktaṃ puraṃ saṃpadyatāṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:030.021c: śuśrāva rāmaḥ śrutvā ca na vicakre 'sya mānasaṃ
GE09ram_02_u:030.022c: jagāma rāmaḥ pitaraṃ didṛkṣuḥ; pitur nideśaṃ vidhivac cikīrṣuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:030.023a: tat pūrvam aikṣvākasuto mahātmā; rāmo gamiṣyan vanam ārtarūpam
GE09ram_02_u:030.023c: vyatiṣṭhata prekṣya tadā sumantraṃ; pitur mahātmā pratihāraṇārtham
GE09ram_02_u:030.024a: pitur nideśena tu dharmavatsalo; vanapraveśe kṛtabuddhiniścayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:030.024c: sa rāghavaḥ prekṣya sumantram abravīn; nivedayasvāgamanaṃ nṛpāya me
GE09ram_02_u:031.001c: praviśya nṛpatiṃ sūto niḥśvasantaṃ dadarśa ha
GE09ram_02_u:031.003a: ayaṃ sa puruṣavyāghra dvāri tiṣṭhati te sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:031.004a: sa tvā paśyatu bhadraṃ te rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:031.004c: sarvān suhṛda āpṛcchya tvām idānīṃ didṛkṣate
GE09ram_02_u:031.005c: vṛtaṃ rājaguṇaiḥ sarvair ādityam iva raśmibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:031.006c: ākāśa iva niṣpaṅko narendraḥ pratyuvāca tam
GE09ram_02_u:031.007a: sumantrānaya me dārān ye ke cid iha māmakāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:031.007c: dāraiḥ parivṛtaḥ sarvair draṣṭum icchāmi rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:031.008a: so 'ntaḥpuram atītyaiva striyas tā vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:031.008c: āryo hvayati vo rājā gamyatāṃ tatra māciram
GE09ram_02_u:031.009a: evam uktāḥ striyaḥ sarvāḥ sumantreṇa nṛpājñayā
GE09ram_02_u:031.009c: pracakramus tad bhavanaṃ bhartur ājñāya śāsanam
GE09ram_02_u:031.011c: uvāca rājā taṃ sūtaṃ sumantrānaya me sutam
GE09ram_02_u:031.012a: sa sūto rāmam ādāya lakṣmaṇaṃ maithilīṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:031.013a: sa rājā putram āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā dūrāt kṛtāñjalim
GE09ram_02_u:031.014a: so 'bhidudrāva vegena rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā viśāṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:031.014c: tam asaṃprāpya duḥkhārtaḥ papāta bhuvi mūrchitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:031.015a: taṃ rāmo 'bhyapātat kṣipraṃ lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:031.015c: visaṃjñam iva duḥkhena saśokaṃ nṛpatiṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:031.017a: taṃ pariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_02_u:031.019a: āpṛcche tvāṃ mahārāja sarveṣām īśvaro 'si naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:031.019c: prasthitaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ paśya tvaṃ kuśalena mām
GE09ram_02_u:031.020a: lakṣmaṇaṃ cānujānīhi sītā cānveti māṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:031.020c: kāraṇair bahubhis tathyair vāryamāṇau na cecchataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:031.021a: anujānīhi sarvān naḥ śokam utsṛjya mānada
GE09ram_02_u:031.021c: lakṣmaṇaṃ māṃ ca sītāṃ ca prajāpatir iva prajāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:031.023c: ayodhyāyās tvam evādya bhava rājā nigṛhya mām
GE09ram_02_u:031.024a: evam ukto nṛpatinā rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:031.025c: ahaṃ tv araṇye vatsyāmi na me kāryaṃ tvayānṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:031.027a: adya tv idānīṃ rajanīṃ putra mā gaccha sarvathā
GE09ram_02_u:031.027c: mātaraṃ māṃ ca saṃpaśyan vasemām adya śarvarīm
GE09ram_02_u:031.028a: atha rāmas tathā śrutvā pitur ārtasya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:031.028c: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā dīno vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:031.029a: prāpsyāmi yān adya guṇān ko me śvastān pradāsyati
GE09ram_02_u:031.031a: apagacchatu te duḥkhaṃ mā bhūr bāṣpapariplutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:031.031c: na hi kṣubhyati durdharṣaḥ samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:031.032a: naivāhaṃ rājyam icchāmi na sukhaṃ na ca maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:031.032c: tvām ahaṃ satyam icchāmi nānṛtaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:031.033a: puraṃ ca rāṣṭraṃ ca mahī ca kevalā; mayā nisṛṣṭā bharatāya dīyatām
GE09ram_02_u:031.033c: ahaṃ nideśaṃ bhavato 'nupālayan; vanaṃ gamiṣyāmi cirāya sevitum
GE09ram_02_u:031.034a: mayā nisṛṣṭāṃ bharato mahīm imāṃ; saśailakhaṇḍāṃ sapurāṃ sakānanām
GE09ram_02_u:031.034c: śivāṃ susīmām anuśāstu kevalaṃ; tvayā yad uktaṃ nṛpate yathāstu tat
GE09ram_02_u:031.035a: na me tathā pārthiva dhīyate mano; mahatsu kāmeṣu na cātmanaḥ priye
GE09ram_02_u:031.035c: yathā nideśe tava śiṣṭasaṃmate; vyapaitu duḥkhaṃ tava matkṛte 'nagha
GE09ram_02_u:031.036a: tad adya naivānagha rājyam avyayaṃ; na sarvakāmān na sukhaṃ na maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:031.036c: na jīvitaṃ tvām anṛtena yojayan; vṛṇīya satyaṃ vratam astu te tathā
GE09ram_02_u:031.037a: phalāni mūlāni ca bhakṣayan vane; girīṃś ca paśyan saritaḥ sarāṃsi ca
GE09ram_02_u:031.037c: vanaṃ praviśyaiva vicitrapādapaṃ; sukhī bhaviṣyāmi tavāstu nirvṛtiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:032.003a: rūpājīvā ca śālinyo vaṇijaś ca mahādhanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:032.004a: ye cainam upajīvanti ramate yaiś ca vīryataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:032.004c: teṣāṃ bahuvidhaṃ dattvā tān apy atra niyojaya
GE09ram_02_u:032.005a: nighnan mṛgān kuñjarāṃś ca pibaṃś cāraṇyakaṃ madhu
GE09ram_02_u:032.005c: nadīś ca vividhāḥ paśyan na rājyaṃ saṃsmariṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:032.006a: dhānyakośaś ca yaḥ kaś cid dhanakośaś ca māmakaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:032.006c: tau rāmam anugacchetāṃ vasantaṃ nirjane vane
GE09ram_02_u:032.007c: ṛṣibhiś ca samāgamya pravatsyati sukhaṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:032.008c: sarvakāmaiḥ punaḥ śrīmān rāmaḥ saṃsādhyatām iti
GE09ram_02_u:032.009a: evaṃ bruvati kākutsthe kaikeyyā bhayam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:032.009c: mukhaṃ cāpy agamāc cheṣaṃ svaraś cāpi nyarudhyata
GE09ram_02_u:032.010a: sā viṣaṇṇā ca saṃtrastā kaikeyī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:032.010c: rājyaṃ gatajanaṃ sādho pītamaṇḍāṃ surām iva
GE09ram_02_u:032.011e: vahantaṃ kiṃ tudasi māṃ niyujya dhuri māhite
GE09ram_02_u:032.012a: kaikeyī dviguṇaṃ kruddhā rājānam idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:032.012c: tavaiva vaṃśe sagaro jyeṣṭhaṃ putram upārudhat
GE09ram_02_u:032.012e: asamañja iti khyātaṃ tathāyaṃ gantum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:032.013a: evam ukto dhig ity eva rājā daśaratho 'bravīt
GE09ram_02_u:032.013c: vrīḍitaś ca janaḥ sarvaḥ sā ca tan nāvabudhyata
GE09ram_02_u:032.014a: tatra vṛddho mahāmātraḥ siddhārtho nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:032.014c: śucir bahumato rājñaḥ kaikeyīm idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:032.015a: asamañjo gṛhītvā tu krīḍitaḥ pathi dārakān
GE09ram_02_u:032.015c: sarayvāḥ prakṣipann apsu ramate tena durmatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:032.016a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā nāgaraḥ sarve kruddhā rājānam abruvan
GE09ram_02_u:032.017a: tān uvāca tato rājā kiṃnimittam idaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_02_u:032.017c: tāś cāpi rājñā saṃpṛṣṭā vākyaṃ prakṛtayo 'bruvan
GE09ram_02_u:032.018a: krīḍitas tv eṣa naḥ putrān bālān udbhrāntacetanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:032.018c: sarayvāṃ prakṣipan maurkhyād atulāṃ prītim aśnute
GE09ram_02_u:032.019a: sa tāsāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā prakṛtīnāṃ narādhipa
GE09ram_02_u:032.020a: ity evam atyajad rājā sagaro vai sudhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:032.020c: rāmaḥ kim akarot pāpaṃ yenaivam uparudhyate
GE09ram_02_u:032.022a: anuvrajiṣyāmy aham adya rāmaṃ; rājyaṃ parityajya sukhaṃ dhanaṃ ca
