GE09ram_02_u:032.022c: sahaiva rājñā bharatena ca tvaṃ; yathā sukhaṃ bhuṅkṣva cirāya rājyam
GE09ram_02_u:033.002a: tyaktabhogasya me rājan vane vanyena jīvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:033.003a: yo hi dattvā dvipaśreṣṭhaṃ kakṣyāyāṃ kurute manaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:033.004a: tathā mama satāṃ śreṣṭha kiṃ dhvajinyā jagatpate
GE09ram_02_u:033.005c: caturdaśa vane vāsaṃ varṣāṇi vasato mama
GE09ram_02_u:033.006a: atha cīrāṇi kaikeyī svayam āhṛtya rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:033.007a: sa cīre puruṣavyāghraḥ kaikeyyāḥ pratigṛhya te
GE09ram_02_u:033.008a: lakṣmaṇaś cāpi tatraiva vihāya vasane śubhe
GE09ram_02_u:033.008c: tāpasāc chādane caiva jagrāha pitur agrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:033.009c: samīkṣya cīraṃ saṃtrastā pṛṣatī vāgurām iva
GE09ram_02_u:033.010e: kathaṃ nu cīraṃ badhnanti munayo vanavāsinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:033.011a: kṛtvā kaṇṭhe ca sā cīram ekam ādāya pāṇinā
GE09ram_02_u:033.011c: tasthau hy akuṣalā tatra vrīḍitā janakātmaja
GE09ram_02_u:033.012a: tasyās tat kṣipram āgamya rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:033.013c: pracukrośa janaḥ sarvo dhik tvāṃ daśarathaṃ tv iti
GE09ram_02_u:033.014a: sa niḥśvasyoṣṇam aikṣvākas tāṃ bhāryām idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:033.014c: kaikeyi kuśacīreṇa na sītā gantum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:033.015a: nanu paryāptam etat te pāpe rāmavivāsanam
GE09ram_02_u:033.015c: kim ebhiḥ kṛpaṇair bhūyaḥ pātakair api te kṛtaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:033.016a: evaṃ bruvantaṃ pitaraṃ rāmaḥ saṃprasthito vanam
GE09ram_02_u:033.017a: iyaṃ dhārmika kausalyā mama mātā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:033.017c: vṛddhā cākṣudraśīlā ca na ca tvāṃ devagarhite
GE09ram_02_u:033.019a: imāṃ mahendropamajātagarbhiṇīṃ; tathā vidhātuṃ janamīṃ mamārhasi
GE09ram_02_u:033.019c: yathā vanasthe mayi śokakarśitā; na jīvitaṃ nyasya yamakṣayaṃ vrajet
GE09ram_02_u:034.001a: rāmasya tu vacaḥ śrutvā muniveṣadharaṃ ca tam
GE09ram_02_u:034.003a: sa muhūrtam ivāsaṃjño duḥkhitaś ca mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:034.004a: manye khalu mayā pūrvaṃ vivatsā bahavaḥ kṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:034.004c: prāṇino hiṃsitā vāpi tasmād idam upasthitam
GE09ram_02_u:034.005a: na tv evānāgate kāle dehāc cyavati jīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:034.005c: kaikeyyā kliśyamānasya mṛtyur mama na vidyate
GE09ram_02_u:034.007a: ekasyāḥ khalu kaikeyyāḥ kṛte 'yaṃ kliśyate janaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:034.007c: svārthe prayatamānāyāḥ saṃśritya nikṛtiṃ tv imām
GE09ram_02_u:034.008a: evam uktvā tu vacanaṃ bāṣpeṇa pihitekṣṇaha
GE09ram_02_u:034.008c: rāmeti sakṛd evoktvā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha
GE09ram_02_u:034.009a: saṃjñāṃ tu pratilabhyaiva muhūrtāt sa mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:034.010a: aupavāhyaṃ rathaṃ yuktvā tvam āyāhi hayottamaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:034.011a: evaṃ manye guṇavatāṃ guṇānāṃ phalam ucyate
GE09ram_02_u:034.011c: pitrā mātrā ca yat sādhur vīro nirvāsyate vanam
GE09ram_02_u:034.015a: vāsāṃsi ca mahārhāṇi bhūṣaṇāni varāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:034.015c: varṣāṇy etāni saṃkhyāya vaidehyāḥ kṣipram ānaya
GE09ram_02_u:034.016a: narendreṇaivam uktas tu gatvā kośagṛhaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:034.016c: prāyacchat sarvam āhṛtya sītāyai kṣipram eva tat
GE09ram_02_u:034.017a: sā sujātā sujātāni vaidehī prasthitā vanam
GE09ram_02_u:034.017c: bhūṣayām āsa gātrāṇi tair vicitrair vibhūṣaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:034.019a: tāṃ bhujābhyāṃ pariṣvajya śvaśrūr vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:034.021a: sa tvayā nāvamantavyaḥ putraḥ pravrājito mama
GE09ram_02_u:034.021c: tava daivatam astv eṣa nirdhanaḥ sadhano 'pi vā
GE09ram_02_u:034.023a: kariṣye sarvam evāham āryā yad anuśāsti mām
GE09ram_02_u:034.023c: abhijñāsmi yathā bhartur vartitavyaṃ śrutaṃ ca me
GE09ram_02_u:034.024c: dharmād vicalituṃ nāham alaṃ candrād iva prabhā
GE09ram_02_u:034.025a: nātantrī vādyate vīṇā nācakro vartate rathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:034.025c: nāpatiḥ sukham edhate yā syād api śatātmajā
GE09ram_02_u:034.026a: mitaṃ dadāti hi pitā mitaṃ mātā mitaṃ sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:034.026c: amitasya hi dātāraṃ bhartāraṃ kā na pūjayet
GE09ram_02_u:034.027c: ārye kim avamanyeyaṃ strīṇāṃ bhartā hi daivatam
GE09ram_02_u:034.030a: amba mā duḥkhitā bhūs tvaṃ paśya tvaṃ pitaraṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:034.030c: kṣayo hi vanavāsasya kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:034.031a: suptāyās te gamiṣyanti navavarṣāṇi pañca ca
GE09ram_02_u:034.031c: sā samagram iha prāptaṃ māṃ drakṣyasi suhṛdvṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:034.032a: etāvad abhinītārtham uktvā sa jananīṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:034.033a: tāś cāpi sa tathaivārtā mātṝr daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:034.034a: saṃvāsāt paruṣaṃ kiṃ cid ajñānād vāpi yat kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:034.034c: tan me samanujānīta sarvāś cāmantrayāmi vaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:034.035a: jajñe 'tha tāsāṃ saṃnādaḥ krauñcīnām iva niḥsvanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:034.036c: vilapita paridevanākulaṃ; vyasanagataṃ tad abhūt suduḥkhitam
GE09ram_02_u:035.001a: atha rāmaś ca sītā ca lakṣmaṇaś ca kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_02_u:035.002a: taṃ cāpi samanujñāpya dharmajñaḥ sītayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:035.003c: atha mātuḥ sumitrāyā jagrāha caraṇau punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:035.004a: taṃ vandamānaṃ rudatī mātā saumitrim abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:035.005c: rāme pramādaṃ mā kārṣīḥ putra bhrātari gacchati
GE09ram_02_u:035.006a: vyasanī vā samṛddho vā gatir eṣa tavānagha
GE09ram_02_u:035.006c: eṣa loke satāṃ dharmo yaj jyeṣṭhavaśago bhavet
GE09ram_02_u:035.007a: idaṃ hi vṛttam ucitaṃ kulasyāsya sanātanam
GE09ram_02_u:035.007c: dānaṃ dīkṣā ca yajñeṣu tanutyāgo mṛdheṣu ca
GE09ram_02_u:035.008a: rāmaṃ daśarathaṃ viddhi māṃ viddhi janakātmajām
GE09ram_02_u:035.008c: ayodhyām aṭavīṃ viddhi gaccha tāta yathāsukham
GE09ram_02_u:035.009a: tataḥ sumantraḥ kākutsthaṃ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:035.009c: vinīto vinayajñaś ca mātalir vāsavaṃ yathā
GE09ram_02_u:035.010a: ratham āroha bhadraṃ te rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:035.010c: kṣipraṃ tvāṃ prāpayiṣyāmi yatra māṃ rāma vakṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:035.011a: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vastavyāni vane tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:035.012a: taṃ rathaṃ sūryasaṃkāśaṃ sītā hṛṣṭena cetasā
GE09ram_02_u:035.015c: babhūva nagare mūrcchā balamūrcchā janasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:035.019a: saṃyaccha vājināṃ raśmīn sūta yāhi śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:035.019c: mukhaṃ drakṣyāmi rāmasya durdarśaṃ no bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:035.020c: yad devagarbhapratime vanaṃ yāti na bhidyate
GE09ram_02_u:035.021c: na jahāti ratā dharme merum arkaprabhā yathā
GE09ram_02_u:035.023a: mahaty eṣā hi te siddhir eṣa cābhyudayo mahān
GE09ram_02_u:035.023c: eṣa svargasya mārgaś ca yad enam anugacchasi
GE09ram_02_u:035.023e: evaṃ vadantas te soḍhuṃ na śekur bāṣpam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:035.024a: atha rājā vṛtaḥ strībhir dīnābhir dīnacetanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:035.024c: nirjagāma priyaṃ putraṃ drakṣyāmīti bruvan gṛhāt
GE09ram_02_u:035.025c: yathā nādaḥ kareṇūnāṃ baddhe mahati kuñjare
GE09ram_02_u:035.026a: pitā ca rājā kākutsthaḥ śrīmān sannas tadā babhau
GE09ram_02_u:035.028a: hā rāmeti janāḥ ke cid rāmamāteti cāpare
GE09ram_02_u:035.030c: dṛṣṭvā saṃcodayām āsa śīghraṃ yāhīti sārathim
GE09ram_02_u:035.031a: na hi tat puruṣavyāghro duḥkhadaṃ darśanaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:035.031c: mātuś ca sahituṃ śaktas totrārdita iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:035.032a: tathā rudantīṃ kausalyāṃ rathaṃ tam anudhāvatīm
GE09ram_02_u:035.032c: krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_02_u:035.032e: asakṛt praikṣata tadā nṛtyantīm iva mātaram
GE09ram_02_u:035.033a: tiṣṭheti rājā cukroṣa yāhi yāhīti rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:035.034c: ciraṃ duḥkhasya pāpiṣṭham iti rāmas tam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:035.035a: rāmasya sa vacaḥ kurvann anujñāpya ca taṃ janam
GE09ram_02_u:035.035c: vrajato 'pi hayāñ śīghraṃ codayām āsa sārathiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:035.036a: nyavartata jano rājño rāmaṃ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_02_u:035.036c: manasāpy aśruvegaiś ca na nyavartata mānuṣam
GE09ram_02_u:035.037a: yam icchet punar āyāntaṃ nainaṃ dūram anuvrajet
GE09ram_02_u:035.037c: ity amātyā mahārājam ūcur daśarathaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:035.038c: niśamya rājā kṛpaṇaḥ sabhāryo; vyavasthitas taṃ sutam īkṣamāṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:036.001c: ārtaśabdo hi saṃjajñe strīṇām antaḥpure mahān
GE09ram_02_u:036.002c: yo gatiṃ śaraṇaṃ cāsīt sa nāthaḥ kva nu gacchati
GE09ram_02_u:036.003c: kruddhān prasādayan sarvān samaduḥkhaḥ kva gacchati
GE09ram_02_u:036.004c: tathā yo vartate 'smāsu mahātmā kva nu gacchati
GE09ram_02_u:036.005c: paritrātā janasyāsya jagataḥ kva nu gacchati
GE09ram_02_u:036.007a: iti sarvā mahiṣyas tā vivatsā iva dhenavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:036.007c: ruruduś caiva duḥkhārtāḥ sasvaraṃ ca vicukruśuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:036.008a: sa tam antaḥpure ghoram ārtaśabdaṃ mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:036.009c: vyasṛjan kavalān nāgā gāvo vatsān na pāyayan
GE09ram_02_u:036.010c: dāruṇāḥ somam abhyetya grahāḥ sarve vyavasthitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:036.011c: viśākhāś ca sadhūmāś ca nabhasi pracakāśire
GE09ram_02_u:036.012a: akasmān nāgaraḥ sarvo jano dainyam upāgamat
GE09ram_02_u:036.012c: āhāre vā vihāre vā na kaś cid akaron manaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:036.013c: na hṛṣṭo lakṣyate kaś cit sarvaḥ śokaparāyaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:036.014a: na vāti pavanaḥ śīto na śaśī saumyadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:036.014c: na sūryas tapate lokaṃ sarvaṃ paryākulaṃ jagat
GE09ram_02_u:036.015a: anarthinaḥ sutāḥ strīṇāṃ bhartāro bhrātaras tathā
GE09ram_02_u:036.016a: ye tu rāmasya suhṛdaḥ sarve te mūḍhacetasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:036.016c: śokabhāreṇa cākrāntāḥ śayanaṃ na juhus tadā
GE09ram_02_u:036.017a: tatas tv ayodhyā rahitā mahātmanā; puraṃdareṇeva mahī saparvatā
GE09ram_02_u:036.017c: cacāla ghoraṃ bhayabhārapīḍitā; sanāgayodhāśvagaṇā nanāda ca
GE09ram_02_u:037.001a: yāvat tu niryatas tasya rajorūpam adṛśyata
GE09ram_02_u:037.002a: yāvad rājā priyaṃ putraṃ paśyaty atyantadhārmikam
GE09ram_02_u:037.003a: na paśyati rajo 'py asya yadā rāmasya bhūmipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:037.003c: tadārtaś ca viṣaṇṇaś ca papāta dharaṇītale
GE09ram_02_u:037.004a: tasya dakṣiṇam anvagāt kausalyā bāhum aṅganā
GE09ram_02_u:037.005a: tāṃ nayena ca saṃpanno dharmeṇa nivayena ca
GE09ram_02_u:037.006a: kaikeyi mā mamāṅgāni sprākṣīs tvaṃ duṣṭacāriṇī
GE09ram_02_u:037.006c: na hi tvāṃ draṣṭum icchāmi na bhāryā na ca bāndhavī
GE09ram_02_u:037.007a: ye ca tvām upajīvanti nāhaṃ teṣāṃ na te mama
GE09ram_02_u:037.007c: kevalārthaparāṃ hi tvāṃ tyaktadharmāṃ tyajāmy aham
GE09ram_02_u:037.008a: agṛhṇāṃ yac ca te pāṇim agniṃ paryaṇayaṃ ca yat
GE09ram_02_u:037.008c: anujānāmi tat sarvam asmiṃl loke paratra ca
GE09ram_02_u:037.009a: bharataś cet pratītaḥ syād rājyaṃ prāpyedam avyayam
GE09ram_02_u:037.009c: yan me sa dadyāt pitrarthaṃ mā mā tad dattam āgamat
GE09ram_02_u:037.011a: hatveva brāhmaṇaṃ kāmāt spṛṣṭvāgnim iva pāṇinā
GE09ram_02_u:037.013a: vilalāpa ca duḥkhārtaḥ priyaṃ putram anusmaran
GE09ram_02_u:037.014a: vāhanānāṃ ca mukhyānāṃ vahatāṃ taṃ mamātmajam
GE09ram_02_u:037.014c: padāni pathi dṛśyante sa mahātmā na dṛśyate
GE09ram_02_u:037.015a: sa nūnaṃ kva cid evādya vṛkṣamūlam upāśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:037.015c: kāṣṭhaṃ vā yadi vāśmānam upadhāya śayiṣyate
GE09ram_02_u:037.018a: sakāmā bhava kaikeyi vidhavā rājyam āvasa
GE09ram_02_u:037.018c: na hi taṃ puruṣavyāghraṃ vinā jīvitum utsahe
GE09ram_02_u:037.021a: tām avekṣya purīṃ sarvāṃ rāmam evānucintayan
GE09ram_02_u:037.021c: vilapan prāviśad rājā gṛhaṃ sūrya ivāmbudam
GE09ram_02_u:037.022c: rāmeṇa rahitaṃ veśma vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca
GE09ram_02_u:037.023a: kausalyāyā gṛhaṃ śīghraṃ rāma mātur nayantu mām
GE09ram_02_u:037.025a: tac ca dṛṣṭvā mahārājo bhujam udyamya vīryavān
GE09ram_02_u:037.025c: uccaiḥ svareṇa cukrośa hā rāghava jahāsi mām
GE09ram_02_u:037.026a: sukhitā bata taṃ kālaṃ jīviṣyanti narottamāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:037.026c: pariṣvajanto ye rāmaṃ drakṣyanti punar āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:037.027a: na tvāṃ paśyāmi kausalye sādhu māṃ pāṇinā spṛśa
GE09ram_02_u:037.027c: rāmaṃ me 'nugatā dṛṣṭir adyāpi na nivartate
GE09ram_02_u:037.028a: taṃ rāmam evānuvicintayantaṃ; samīkṣya devī śayane narendram
GE09ram_02_u:038.001a: tataḥ samīkṣya śayane sannaṃ śokena pārthivam
GE09ram_02_u:038.003c: trāsayiṣyati māṃ bhūyo duṣṭāhir iva veśmani
GE09ram_02_u:038.004a: atha sma nagare rāmaś caran bhaikṣaṃ gṛhe vaset
GE09ram_02_u:038.004c: kāmakāro varaṃ dātum api dāsaṃ mamātmajam
GE09ram_02_u:038.005a: pātayitvā tu kaikeyyā rāmaṃ sthānād yatheṣṭataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:038.007c: tyaktānāṃ vanavāsāya kā nv avasthā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:038.009a: apīdānīṃ sa kālaḥ syān mama śokakṣayaḥ śivaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:038.009c: sabhāryaṃ yat saha bhrātrā paśyeyam iha rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:038.011c: nandiṣyati purī hṛṣṭā samudra iva parvaṇi
GE09ram_02_u:038.012c: puraskṛtya rathe sītāṃ vṛṣabho govadhūm iva
GE09ram_02_u:038.014a: kadā sumanasaḥ kanyā dvijātīnāṃ phalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:038.015c: abhyupaiṣyati dharmajñas trivarṣa iva māṃ lalan
GE09ram_02_u:038.016a: niḥsaṃśayaṃ mayā manye purā vīra kadaryayā
GE09ram_02_u:038.016c: pātu kāmeṣu vatseṣu mātṝṇāṃ śātitāḥ stanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:038.017a: sāhaṃ gaur iva siṃhena vivatsā vatsalā kṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:038.018a: na hi tāvad guṇair juṣṭaṃ sarvaśāstraviśāradam
GE09ram_02_u:038.018c: ekaputrā vinā putram ahaṃ jīvitum utsahe
GE09ram_02_u:038.019a: na hi me jīvite kiṃ cit sāmartham iha kalpyate
GE09ram_02_u:038.020a: ayaṃ hi māṃ dīpayate samutthitas; tanūjaśokaprabhavo hutāśanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:038.020c: mahīm imāṃ raśmibhir uttamaprabho; yathā nidāghe bhagavān divākaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:039.001a: vilapantīṃ tathā tāṃ tu kausalyāṃ pramadottamām
GE09ram_02_u:039.001c: idaṃ dharme sthitā dharmyaṃ sumitrā vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:039.002a: tavārye sadguṇair yuktaḥ putraḥ sa puruṣottamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:039.002c: kiṃ te vilapitenaivaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ ruditena vā
GE09ram_02_u:039.003a: yas tavārye gataḥ putras tyaktvā rājyaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:039.004a: śiṣṭair ācarite samyak śaśvat pretya phalodaye
GE09ram_02_u:039.004c: rāmo dharme sthitaḥ śreṣṭho na sa śocyaḥ kadā cana
GE09ram_02_u:039.006a: araṇyavāse yad duḥkhaṃ jānatī vai sukhocitā
GE09ram_02_u:039.007a: kīrtibhūtāṃ patākāṃ yo loke bhrāmayati prabhuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:039.008a: vyaktaṃ rāmasya vijñāya śaucaṃ māhātmyam uttamam
GE09ram_02_u:039.008c: na gātram aṃśubhiḥ sūryaḥ saṃtāpayitum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:039.011a: dadau cāstrāṇi divyāni yasmai brahmā mahaujase
GE09ram_02_u:039.012a: pṛthivyā saha vaidehyā śriyā ca puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:039.013a: duḥkhajaṃ visṛjanty asraṃ niṣkrāmantam udīkṣya yam
GE09ram_02_u:039.015a: putras te varadaḥ kṣipram ayodhyāṃ punar āgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:039.016a: niśamya tal lakṣmaṇamātṛvākyaṃ; rāmasya mātur naradevapatnyāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:039.016c: sadyaḥ śarīre vinanāśa śokaḥ; śaradgato megha ivālpatoyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:040.002a: nivartite 'pi ca balāt suhṛdvarge ca rājini
GE09ram_02_u:040.004a: sa yācyamānaḥ kākutsthaḥ svābhiḥ prakṛtibhis tadā
GE09ram_02_u:040.005c: uvāca rāmaḥ snehena tāḥ prajāḥ svāḥ prajā iva
GE09ram_02_u:040.006a: yā prītir bahumānaś ca mayy ayodhyānivāsinām
GE09ram_02_u:040.007c: kariṣyati yathāvad vaḥ priyāṇi ca hitāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:040.008c: anurūpaḥ sa vo bhartā bhaviṣyati bhayāpahaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:040.009a: sa hi rājaguṇair yukto yuvarājaḥ samīkṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:040.009c: api cāpi mayā śiṣṭaiḥ kāryaṃ vo bhartṛśāsanam
GE09ram_02_u:040.010a: na ca tapyed yathā cāsau vanavāsaṃ gate mayi
GE09ram_02_u:040.011c: tathā tathā prakṛtayo rāmaṃ patim akāmayan
GE09ram_02_u:040.012a: bāṣpeṇa pihitaṃ dīnaṃ rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_02_u:040.012c: cakarṣeva guṇair baddhvā janaṃ punar ivāsanam
GE09ram_02_u:040.013a: te dvijās trividhaṃ vṛddhā jñānena vayasaujasā
GE09ram_02_u:040.014a: vahanto javanā rāmaṃ bho bho jātyās turaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:040.014c: nivartadhvaṃ na gantavyaṃ hitā bhavata bhartari
GE09ram_02_u:040.014e: upavāhyas tu vo bhartā nāpavāhyaḥ purād vanam
GE09ram_02_u:040.015a: evam ārtapralāpāṃs tān vṛddhān pralapato dvijān
GE09ram_02_u:040.015c: avekṣya sahasā rāmo rathād avatatāra ha
GE09ram_02_u:040.017a: dvijātīṃs tu padātīṃs tān rāmaś cāritravatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:040.017c: na śaśāka ghṛṇācakṣuḥ parimoktuṃ rathena saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:040.018a: gacchantam eva taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ saṃbhrāntamānasāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:040.018c: ūcuḥ paramasaṃtaptā rāmaṃ vākyam idaṃ dvijāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:040.019a: brāhmaṇyaṃ kṛtsnam etat tvāṃ brahmaṇyam anugacchati
GE09ram_02_u:040.021c: ebhiś chāyāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ svaiś chatrair vājapeyikaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:040.022a: yā hi naḥ satataṃ buddhir vedamantrānusāriṇī
GE09ram_02_u:040.023a: hṛdayeṣv avatiṣṭhante vedā ye naḥ paraṃ dhanam
GE09ram_02_u:040.023c: vatsyanty api gṛheṣv eva dārāś cāritrarakṣitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:040.024a: na punar niścayaḥ kāryas tvadgatau sukṛtā matiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:040.024c: tvayi dharmavyapekṣe tu kiṃ syād dharmam avekṣitum
GE09ram_02_u:040.026a: bahūnāṃ vitatā yajñā dvijānāṃ ya ihāgatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:040.026c: teṣāṃ samāptir āyattā tava vatsa nivartane
GE09ram_02_u:040.027c: yācamāneṣu teṣu tvaṃ bhaktiṃ bhakteṣu darśaya
GE09ram_02_u:041.001a: tatas tu tamasā tīraṃ ramyam āśritya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:041.001c: sītām udvīkṣya saumitrim idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:041.002a: iyam adya niśā pūrvā saumitre prasthitā vanam
GE09ram_02_u:041.002c: vanavāsasya bhadraṃ te sa notkaṇṭhitum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:041.004a: adyāyodhyā tu nagarī rājadhānī pitur mama
GE09ram_02_u:041.004c: sastrīpuṃsā gatān asmāñ śociṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:041.005a: bharataḥ khalu dharmātmā pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca me
GE09ram_02_u:041.007a: tvayā kāryaṃ naravyāghra mām anuvrajatā kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:041.008a: adbhir eva tu saumitre vatsyāmy adya niśām imām
GE09ram_02_u:041.008c: etad dhi rocate mahyaṃ vanye 'pi vividhe sati
GE09ram_02_u:041.009a: evam uktvā tu saumitraṃ sumantram api rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:041.009c: apramattas tvam aśveṣu bhava saumyety uvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:041.011a: upāsyatu śivāṃ saṃdhyāṃ dṛṣṭvā rātrim upasthitām
GE09ram_02_u:041.011c: rāmasya śayanaṃ cakre sūtaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_02_u:041.012a: tāṃ śayyāṃ tamasātīre vīkṣya vṛkṣadalaiḥ kṛtām
GE09ram_02_u:041.012c: rāmaḥ saumitriṇāṃ sārdhaṃ sabhāryaḥ saṃviveśa ha
GE09ram_02_u:041.013a: sabhāryaṃ saṃprasuptaṃ taṃ bhrātaraṃ vīkṣya lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:041.013c: kathayām āsa sūtāya rāmasya vividhān guṇān
GE09ram_02_u:041.014a: jāgrato hy eva tāṃ rātriṃ saumitrer udito raviḥ
GE09ram_02_u:041.015c: avasat tatra tāṃ rātriṃ rāmaḥ prakṛtibhiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:041.016a: utthāya tu mahātejāḥ prakṛtīs tā niśāmya ca
GE09ram_02_u:041.018c: api prāṇān asiṣyanti na tu tyakṣyanti niścayam
GE09ram_02_u:041.019a: yāvad eva tu saṃsuptās tāvad eva vayaṃ laghu
GE09ram_02_u:041.021a: paurā hy ātmakṛtād duḥkhād vipramocyā nṛpātmajaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:041.021c: na tu khalv ātmanā yojyā duḥkhena puravāsinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:041.022a: abravīl lakṣmaṇo rāmaṃ sākṣād dharmam iva sthitam
GE09ram_02_u:041.022c: rocate me mahāprājña kṣipram āruhyatām iti
GE09ram_02_u:041.023a: sūtas tataḥ saṃtvaritaḥ syandanaṃ tair hayottamaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:041.024a: mohanārthaṃ tu paurāṇāṃ sūtaṃ rāmo 'bravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:041.024c: udaṅmukhaḥ prayāhi tvaṃ ratham āsthāya sārathe
GE09ram_02_u:041.025a: muhūrtaṃ tvaritaṃ gatvā nirgataya rathaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:041.025c: yathā na vidyuḥ paurā māṃ tathā kuru samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:041.026a: rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā tathā cakre sa sārathiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:041.028a: sa saṃtīrya mahābāhuḥ śrīmāñ śivam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:041.029a: prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ paurās te rāghavo vinā
GE09ram_02_u:041.030c: ālokam api rāmasya na paśyanti sma duḥkhitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:041.031a: tato mārgānusāreṇa gatvā kiṃ cit kṣaṇaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:041.032c: kim idaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmo daivenopahatā iti
GE09ram_02_u:042.002a: svaṃ svaṃ nilayam āgamya putradāraiḥ samāvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:042.003a: na cāhṛṣyan na cāmodan vaṇijo na prasārayan
GE09ram_02_u:042.004a: naṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā nābhyanandan vipulaṃ vā dhanāgamam
GE09ram_02_u:042.005a: gṛhe gṛhe rudantyaś ca bhartāraṃ gṛham āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:042.005c: vyagarhayanto duḥkhārtā vāgbhis totrair iva dvipān
GE09ram_02_u:042.006a: kiṃ nu teṣāṃ gṛhaiḥ kāryaṃ kiṃ dāraiḥ kiṃ dhanena vā
GE09ram_02_u:042.006c: putrair vā kiṃ sukhair vāpi ye na paśyanti rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:042.007a: ekaḥ satpuruṣo loke lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:042.008a: āpagāḥ kṛtapuṇyās tāḥ padminyaś ca sarāṃsi ca
GE09ram_02_u:042.008c: yeṣu snāsyati kākutstho vigāhya salilaṃ śuci
GE09ram_02_u:042.009c: āpagāś ca mahānūpāḥ sānumantaś ca parvatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:042.010a: kānanaṃ vāpi śailaṃ vā yaṃ rāmo 'bhigamiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:042.010c: priyātithim iva prāptaṃ nainaṃ śakṣyanty anarcitum
GE09ram_02_u:042.011c: akāle cāpi mukhyāni puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:042.012a: vidarśayanto vividhān bhūyaś citrāṃś ca nirjharān
GE09ram_02_u:042.013a: yatra rāmo bhayaṃ nātra nāsti tatra parābhavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:042.013c: sa hi śūro mahābāhuḥ putro daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:042.014a: purā bhavati no dūrād anugacchāma rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:042.014e: sa hi nātho janasyāsya sa gatiḥ sa parāyaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:042.015a: vayaṃ paricariṣyāmaḥ sītāṃ yūyaṃ tu rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:042.015c: iti paurastriyo bhartṝn duḥkhārtās tat tad abruvan
GE09ram_02_u:042.018a: kaikeyyā yadi ced rājyaṃ syād adharmyam anāthavat
GE09ram_02_u:042.018c: na hi no jīvitenārthaḥ kutaḥ putraiḥ kuto dhanaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:042.019a: yayā putraś ca bhartā ca tyaktāv aiśvaryakāraṇāt
GE09ram_02_u:042.019c: kaṃ sā parihared anyaṃ kaikeyī kulapāṃsanī
GE09ram_02_u:042.020a: kaikeyyā na vayaṃ rājye bhṛtakā nivasemahi
GE09ram_02_u:042.020c: jīvantyā jātu jīvantyaḥ putrair api śapāmahe
GE09ram_02_u:042.021c: kas tāṃ prāpya sukhaṃ jīved adharmyāṃ duṣṭacāriṇīm
GE09ram_02_u:042.022a: na hi pravrajite rāme jīviṣyati mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:042.024c: bharate saṃniṣṛṣṭāḥ smaḥ saunike paśavo yathā
GE09ram_02_u:042.025a: tās tathā vilapantyas tu nagare nāgarastriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:042.026a: tathā striyo rāmanimittam āturā; yathā sute bhrātari vā vivāsite
GE09ram_02_u:042.026c: vilapya dīnā rurudur vicetasaḥ; sutair hi tāsām adhiko hi so 'bhavat
GE09ram_02_u:043.002a: tathaiva gacchatas tasya vyapāyād rajanī śivā
GE09ram_02_u:043.002c: upāsya sa śivāṃ saṃdhyāṃ viṣayāntaṃ vyagāhata
GE09ram_02_u:043.003a: grāmān vikṛṣṭasīmāṃs tān puṣpitāni vanāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:043.003c: paśyann atiyayau śīghraṃ śarair iva hayottamaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:043.004c: rājānaṃ dhig daśarathaṃ kāmasya vaśam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:043.006a: yā putram īdṛśaṃ rājñaḥ pravāsayati dhārmikam
GE09ram_02_u:043.009a: gatvā tu suciraṃ kālaṃ tataḥ śītajalāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:043.010a: gomatīṃ cāpy atikramya rāghavaḥ śīghragair hayaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:043.011a: sa mahīṃ manunā rājñā dattām ikṣvākave purā
GE09ram_02_u:043.012a: sūta ity eva cābhāṣya sārathiṃ tam abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:043.013a: kadāhaṃ punar āgamya sarayvāḥ puṣpite vane
GE09ram_02_u:043.013c: mṛgayāṃ paryāṭaṣyāmi mātrā pitrā ca saṃgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:043.015a: sa tam adhvānam aikṣvākaḥ sūtaṃ madhurayā girā
GE09ram_02_u:043.015c: taṃ tam artham abhipretya yayauvākyam udīrayan
GE09ram_02_u:044.003c: śiṃśumaraiś ca nakraiś ca bhujaṃgaiś ca niṣevitām
GE09ram_02_u:044.006a: lakṣaṇaś ca sumantraś ca bāḍham ity eva rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:044.009a: tatra rājā guho nāma rāmasyātmasamaḥ sakhā
GE09ram_02_u:044.010a: sa śrutvā puruṣavyāghraṃ rāmaṃ viṣayam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:044.011c: saha saumitriṇā rāmaḥ samāgacchad guhena saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:044.012a: tam ārtaḥ saṃpariṣvajya guho rāghavam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:044.012c: yathāyodhyā tathedaṃ te rāma kiṃ karavāṇi te
GE09ram_02_u:044.013c: arghyaṃ copānayat kṣipraṃ vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:044.014a: svāgataṃ te mahābāho taveyam akhilā mahī
GE09ram_02_u:044.014c: vayaṃ preṣyā bhavān bhartā sādhu rājyaṃ praśādhi naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:044.015a: bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca peyaṃ ca lehyaṃ cedam upasthitam
GE09ram_02_u:044.015c: śayanāni ca mukhyāni vājināṃ khādanaṃ ca te
GE09ram_02_u:044.016a: guham eva bruvāṇaṃ taṃ rāghavaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:044.016c: arcitāś caiva hṛṣṭāś ca bhavatā sarvathā vayam
GE09ram_02_u:044.018a: diṣṭyā tvāṃ guha paśyāmi arogaṃ saha bāndhavaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:044.018c: api te kūśalaṃ rāṣṭre mitreṣu ca dhaneṣu ca
GE09ram_02_u:044.019a: yat tv idaṃ bhavatā kiṃ cit prītyā samupakalpitam
GE09ram_02_u:044.019c: sarvaṃ tad anujānāmi na hi varte pratigrahe
GE09ram_02_u:044.021a: aśvānāṃ khādanenāham arthī nānyena kena cit
GE09ram_02_u:044.022a: ete hi dayitā rājñaḥ pitur daśarathasya me
GE09ram_02_u:044.022c: etaiḥ suvihitair aśvair bhaviṣyāmy aham arcitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:044.023a: aśvānāṃ pratipānaṃ ca khādanaṃ caiva so 'nvaśāt
GE09ram_02_u:044.023c: guhas tatraiva puruṣāṃs tvaritaṃ dīyatām iti
GE09ram_02_u:044.025a: tasya bhūmau śayānasya pādau prakṣālya lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:044.027a: tathā śayānasya tato 'sya dhīmato; yaśasvino dāśarather mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:044.027c: adṛṣṭaduḥkhasya sukhocitasya sā; tadā vyatīyāya cireṇa śarvarī
GE09ram_02_u:045.001a: taṃ jāgratam adambhena bhrātur arthāya lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:045.002a: iyaṃ tāta sukhā śayyā tvadartham upakalpitā
GE09ram_02_u:045.003a: ucito 'yaṃ janaḥ sarvaḥ kleśānāṃ tvaṃ sukhocitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:045.004a: na hi rāmāt priyataro mamāsti bhuvi kaś cana
GE09ram_02_u:045.004c: bravīmy etad ahaṃ satyaṃ satyenaiva ca te śape
GE09ram_02_u:045.005a: asya prasādād āśaṃse loke 'smin sumahad yaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:045.005c: dharmāvāptiṃ ca vipulām arthāvāptiṃ ca kevalām
GE09ram_02_u:045.006a: so 'haṃ priyasakhaṃ rāmaṃ śayānaṃ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:045.007a: na hi me 'viditaṃ kiṃ cid vane 'smiṃś carataḥ sadā
GE09ram_02_u:045.007c: caturaṅgaṃ hy api balaṃ sumahat prasahemahi
GE09ram_02_u:045.008c: nātra bhītā vayaṃ sarve dharmam evānupaśyatā
GE09ram_02_u:045.009a: kathaṃ dāśarathau bhūmau śayāne saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:045.009c: śakyā nidrā mayā labdhuṃ jīvitaṃ vā sukhāni vā
GE09ram_02_u:045.010a: yo na devāsuraiḥ sarvaiḥ śakyaḥ prasahituṃ yudhi
GE09ram_02_u:045.010c: taṃ paśya sukhasaṃviṣṭaṃ tṛṇeṣu saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:045.011a: yo mantra tapasā labdho vividhaiś ca pariśramaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:045.012a: asmin pravrajito rājā na ciraṃ vartayiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:045.012c: vidhavā medinī nūnaṃ kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:045.014a: kausalyā caiva rājā ca tathaiva jananī mama
GE09ram_02_u:045.014c: nāśaṃse yadi jīvanti sarve te śarvarīm imām
GE09ram_02_u:045.015a: jīved api hi me mātā śatrughnasyānvavekṣayā
GE09ram_02_u:045.015c: tad duḥkhaṃ yat tu kausalyā vīrasūr vinaśiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:045.017c: rājye rāmam anikṣipya pitā me vinaśiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:045.018a: siddhārthāḥ pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ tasmin kāle hy upasthite
GE09ram_02_u:045.024a: tathā hi satyaṃ bruvati prajāhite; narendraputre gurusauhṛdād guhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:045.024c: mumoca bāṣpaṃ vyasanābhipīḍito; jvarāturo nāga iva vyathāturaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.001a: prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ pṛthu vṛkṣā mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.002c: asau sukṛṣṇo vihagaḥ kokilas tāta kūjati
GE09ram_02_u:046.003a: barhiṇānāṃ ca nirghoṣaḥ śrūyate nadatāṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:046.004c: guham āmantrya sūtaṃ ca so 'tiṣṭhad bhrātur agrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.005a: tataḥ kalāpān saṃnahya khaḍgau baddhvā ca dhanvinau
GE09ram_02_u:046.005c: jagmatur yena tau gaṅgāṃ sītayā saha rāghavau
GE09ram_02_u:046.006a: rāmam eva tu dharmajñam upagamya vinītavat
GE09ram_02_u:046.006c: kim ahaṃ karavāṇīti sūtaḥ prāñjalir abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:046.007a: nivartasvety uvācainam etāvad dhi kṛtaṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:046.007c: yānaṃ vihāya padbhyāṃ tu gamiṣyāmo mahāvanam
GE09ram_02_u:046.008a: ātmānaṃ tv abhyanujñātam avekṣyārtaḥ sa sārathiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.009a: nātikrāntam idaṃ loke puruṣeṇeha kena cit
GE09ram_02_u:046.010a: na manye brahmacarye 'sti svadhīte vā phalodayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.010c: mārdavārjavayor vāpi tvāṃ ced vyasanam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:046.011a: saha rāghava vaidehyā bhrātrā caiva vane vasan
GE09ram_02_u:046.011c: tvaṃ gatiṃ prāpsyase vīra trīṃl lokāṃs tu jayann iva
GE09ram_02_u:046.012a: vayaṃ khalu hatā rāma ye tayāpy upavañcitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.013a: iti bruvann ātma samaṃ sumantraḥ sārathis tadā
GE09ram_02_u:046.013c: dṛṣṭvā dura gataṃ rāmaṃ duḥkhārto rurude ciram
GE09ram_02_u:046.014a: tatas tu vigate bāṣpe sūtaṃ spṛṣṭodakaṃ śucim
GE09ram_02_u:046.014c: rāmas tu madhuraṃ vākyaṃ punaḥ punar uvāca tam
GE09ram_02_u:046.015c: yathā daśaratho rājā māṃ na śocet tathā kuru
GE09ram_02_u:046.016a: śokopahata cetāś ca vṛddhaś ca jagatīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.016c: kāma bhārāvasannaś ca tasmād etad bravīmi te
GE09ram_02_u:046.017a: yad yad ājñāpayet kiṃ cit sa mahātmā mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.018c: yad eṣāṃ sarvakṛtyeṣu mano na pratihanyate
GE09ram_02_u:046.019a: tad yathā sa mahārājo nālīkam adhigacchati
GE09ram_02_u:046.019c: na ca tāmyati duḥkhena sumantra kuru tat tathā
GE09ram_02_u:046.020c: brūyās tvam abhivādyaiva mama hetor idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.021a: naivāham anuśocāmi lakṣmaṇo na ca maithilī
GE09ram_02_u:046.021c: ayodhyāyāś cyutāś ceti vane vatsyāmaheti vā
GE09ram_02_u:046.022c: lakṣmaṇaṃ māṃ ca sītāṃ ca drakṣyasi kṣipram āgatān
GE09ram_02_u:046.023a: evam uktvā tu rājānaṃ mātaraṃ ca sumantra me
GE09ram_02_u:046.023c: anyāś ca devīḥ sahitāḥ kaikeyīṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.024c: sītāyā mama cāryasya vacanāl lakṣmaṇasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:046.025a: brūyāś ca hi mahārājaṃ bharataṃ kṣipram ānaya
GE09ram_02_u:046.025c: āgataś cāpi bharataḥ sthāpyo nṛpamate pade
GE09ram_02_u:046.027a: bharataś cāpi vaktavyo yathā rājani vartase
GE09ram_02_u:046.028a: yathā ca tava kaikeyī sumitrā cāviśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.028c: tathaiva devī kausalyā mama mātā viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.029c: tat sarvaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā snehāt kākutstham abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:046.030a: yad ahaṃ nopacāreṇa brūyāṃ snehād aviklavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.030c: bhaktimān iti tat tāvad vākyaṃ tvaṃ kṣantum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:046.031a: kathaṃ hi tvadvihīno 'haṃ pratiyāsyāmi tāṃ purīm
GE09ram_02_u:046.032a: sarāmam api tāvan me rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā janaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.032c: vinā rāmaṃ rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidīryetāpi sā purī
GE09ram_02_u:046.033a: dainyaṃ hi nagarī gacched dṛṣṭvā śūnyam imaṃ ratham
GE09ram_02_u:046.034c: cintayantyo 'dya nūnaṃ tvāṃ nirāhārāḥ kṛtāḥ prajāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.035a: ārtanādo hi yaḥ paurair muktas tadvipravāsane
GE09ram_02_u:046.035c: rathasthaṃ māṃ niśāmyaiva kuryuḥ śataguṇaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.036a: ahaṃ kiṃ cāpi vakṣyāmi devīṃ tava suto mayā
GE09ram_02_u:046.036c: nīto 'sau mātulakulaṃ saṃtāpaṃ mā kṛthā iti
GE09ram_02_u:046.037a: asatyam api naivāhaṃ brūyāṃ vacanam īdṛśam
GE09ram_02_u:046.037c: katham apriyam evāhaṃ brūyāṃ satyam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.038c: kathaṃ rathaṃ tvayā hīnaṃ pravakṣyanti hayottamāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.039a: yadi me yācamānasya tyāgam eva kariṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:046.039c: saratho 'gniṃ pravekṣyāmi tyakta mātra iha tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:046.041a: tat kṛtena mayā prāptaṃ ratha caryā kṛtaṃ sukham
GE09ram_02_u:046.043a: tava śuśrūṣaṇaṃ mūrdhnā kariṣyāmi vane vasan
GE09ram_02_u:046.043c: ayodhyāṃ devalokaṃ vā sarvathā prajahāmy aham
GE09ram_02_u:046.044a: na hi śakyā praveṣṭuṃ sā mayāyodhyā tvayā vinā
GE09ram_02_u:046.045a: ime cāpi hayā vīra yadi te vanavāsinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.046a: vanavāse kṣayaṃ prāpte mamaiṣa hi manorathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.046c: yad anena rathenaiva tvāṃ vaheyaṃ purīṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.047a: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi sahitasya tvayā vane
GE09ram_02_u:046.048c: bhaktaṃ bhṛtyaṃ sthitaṃ sthityāṃ tvaṃ na māṃ hātum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:046.049a: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ dīnaṃ yācamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.049c: rāmo bhṛtyānukampī tu sumantram idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:046.050a: jānāmi paramāṃ bhaktiṃ mayi te bhartṛvatsala
GE09ram_02_u:046.050c: śṛṇu cāpi yadarthaṃ tvāṃ preṣayāmi purīm itaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.051a: nagarīṃ tvāṃ gataṃ dṛṣṭvā jananī me yavīyasī
GE09ram_02_u:046.051c: kaikeyī pratyayaṃ gacched iti rāmo vanaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.052a: parituṣṭā hi sā devi vanavāsaṃ gate mayi
GE09ram_02_u:046.053a: eṣa me prathamaḥ kalpo yad ambā me yavīyasī
GE09ram_02_u:046.054a: mama priyārthaṃ rājñaś ca sarathas tvaṃ purīṃ vraja
GE09ram_02_u:046.054c: saṃdiṣṭaś cāsi yānarthāṃs tāṃs tān brūyās tathātathā
GE09ram_02_u:046.055a: ity uktvā vacanaṃ sūtaṃ sāntvayitvā punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.055c: guhaṃ vacanam aklībaṃ rāmo hetumad abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:046.056a: tat kṣīraṃ rājaputrāya guhaḥ kṣipram upāharat
GE09ram_02_u:046.058c: vratam ādiṣṭavān rāmaḥ sahāyaṃ guham abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:046.059a: apramatto bale kośe durge janapade tathā
GE09ram_02_u:046.059c: bhavethā guha rājyaṃ hi durārakṣatamaṃ matam
GE09ram_02_u:046.061a: sa tu dṛṣṭvā nadītīre nāvam ikṣvākunandanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.061c: titīrṣuḥ śīghragāṃ gaṅgām idaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:046.062a: āroha tvaṃ nara vyāghra sthitāṃ nāvam imāṃ śanaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.063a: sa bhrātuḥ śāsanaṃ śrutvā sarvam apratikūlayan
GE09ram_02_u:046.065a: anujñāya sumantraṃ ca sabalaṃ caiva taṃ guham
GE09ram_02_u:046.065c: āsthāya nāvaṃ rāmas tu codayām āsa nāvikān
GE09ram_02_u:046.066a: tatas taiś coditā sā nauḥ karṇadhārasamāhitā
GE09ram_02_u:046.067a: madhyaṃ tu samanuprāpya bhāgīrathyās tv aninditā
GE09ram_02_u:046.067c: vaidehī prāñjalir bhūtvā tāṃ nadīm idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:046.069a: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi samagrāṇy uṣya kānane
GE09ram_02_u:046.069c: bhrātrā saha mayā caiva punaḥ pratyāgamiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:046.070a: tatas tvāṃ devi subhage kṣemeṇa punar āgatā
GE09ram_02_u:046.071a: tvaṃ hi tripathagā devi brahma lokaṃ samīkṣase
GE09ram_02_u:046.072a: sā tvāṃ devi namasyāmi praśaṃsāmi ca śobhane
GE09ram_02_u:046.072c: prāpta rājye naravyāghra śivena punar āgate
GE09ram_02_u:046.073a: gavāṃ śatasahasrāṇi vastrāṇy annaṃ ca peśalam
GE09ram_02_u:046.074a: tathā saṃbhāṣamāṇā sā sītā gaṅgām aninditā
GE09ram_02_u:046.075a: tīraṃ tu samanuprāpya nāvaṃ hitvā nararṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.075c: prātiṣṭhata saha bhrātrā vaidehyā ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:046.076c: agrato gaccha saumitre sītā tvām anugacchatu
GE09ram_02_u:046.077a: pṛṣṭhato 'haṃ gamiṣyāmi tvāṃ ca sītāṃ ca pālayan
GE09ram_02_u:046.077c: adya duḥkhaṃ tu vaidehī vanavāsasya vetsyati
GE09ram_02_u:046.078a: gataṃ tu gaṅgāparapāram āśu; rāmaṃ sumantraḥ pratataṃ nirīkṣya
GE09ram_02_u:046.078c: adhvaprakarṣād vinivṛttadṛṣṭir; mumoca bāṣpaṃ vyathitas tapasvī
GE09ram_02_u:046.079a: tau tatra hatvā caturo mahāmṛgān; varāham ṛśyaṃ pṛṣataṃ mahārurum
GE09ram_02_u:046.079c: ādāya medhyaṃ tvaritaṃ bubhukṣitau; vāsāya kāle yayatur vanaspatim
GE09ram_02_u:047.001a: sa taṃ vṛkṣaṃ samāsādya saṃdhyām anvāsya paścimām
GE09ram_02_u:047.001c: rāmo ramayatāṃ śreṣṭha iti hovāca lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:047.002a: adyeyaṃ prathamā rātrir yātā janapadād bahiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:047.002c: yā sumantreṇa rahitā tāṃ notkaṇṭhitum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:047.004a: rātriṃ kathaṃ cid evemāṃ saumitre vartayāmahe
GE09ram_02_u:047.005c: imāḥ saumitraye rāmo vyājahāra kathāḥ śubhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:047.006a: dhruvam adya mahārājo duḥkhaṃ svapiti lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:047.006c: kṛtakāmā tu kaikeyī tuṣṭā bhavitum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:047.007a: sā hi devī mahārājaṃ kaikeyī rājyakāraṇāt
GE09ram_02_u:047.007c: api na cyāvayet prāṇān dṛṣṭvā bharatam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:047.008a: anāthaś caiva vṛddhaś ca mayā caiva vinākṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:047.008c: kiṃ kariṣyati kāmātmā kaikeyyā vaśam āgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:047.009a: idaṃ vyasanam ālokya rājñaś ca mativibhramam
GE09ram_02_u:047.009c: kāma evārdhadharmābhyāṃ garīyān iti me matiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:047.010a: ko hy avidvān api pumān pramadāyāḥ kṛte tyajet
GE09ram_02_u:047.010c: chandānuvartinaṃ putraṃ tāto mām iva lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:047.011a: sukhī bata sabhāryaś ca bharataḥ kekayīsutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:047.011c: muditān kosalān eko yo bhokṣyaty adhirājavat
GE09ram_02_u:047.012a: sa hi sarvasya rājyasya mukham ekaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:047.012c: tāte ca vayasātīte mayi cāraṇyam āśrite
GE09ram_02_u:047.013c: evam āpadyate kṣipraṃ rājā daśaratho yathā
GE09ram_02_u:047.014c: kaikeyī saumya saṃprāptā rājyāya bharatasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:047.015c: kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca saṃprabādheta matkṛte
GE09ram_02_u:047.016a: mā sma matkāraṇād devī sumitrā duḥkham āvaset
GE09ram_02_u:047.016c: ayodhyām ita eva tvaṃ kāle praviśa lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:047.017a: aham eko gamiṣyāmi sītayā saha daṇḍakān
GE09ram_02_u:047.017c: anāthāyā hi nāthas tvaṃ kausalyāyā bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:047.018a: kṣudrakarmā hi kaikeyī dveṣād anyāyyam ācaret
GE09ram_02_u:047.018c: paridadyā hi dharmajñe bharate mama mātaram
GE09ram_02_u:047.019a: nūnaṃ jātyantare kasmiṃḥ striyaḥ putrair viyojitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:047.019c: jananyā mama saumitre tad apy etad upasthitam
GE09ram_02_u:047.020c: viprāyujyata kausalyā phalakāle dhig astu mām
GE09ram_02_u:047.021a: mā sma sīmantinī kā cij janayet putram īdṛśam
GE09ram_02_u:047.021c: saumitre yo 'ham ambāyā dadmi śokam anantakam
GE09ram_02_u:047.022c: yasyās tac chrūyate vākyaṃ śuka pādam arer daśa
GE09ram_02_u:047.023a: śocantyāś cālpabhāgyāyā na kiṃ cid upakurvatā
GE09ram_02_u:047.023c: purtreṇa kim aputrāyā mayā kāryam ariṃdama
GE09ram_02_u:047.024a: alpabhāgyā hi me mātā kausalyā rahitā mayā
GE09ram_02_u:047.025a: eko hy aham ayodhyāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:047.025c: tareyam iṣubhiḥ kruddho nanu vīryam akāraṇam
GE09ram_02_u:047.027a: etad anyac ca karuṇaṃ vilapya vijane bahu
GE09ram_02_u:047.029a: dhruvam adya purī rāma ayodhyā yudhināṃ vara
GE09ram_02_u:047.030a: naitad aupayikaṃ rāma yad idaṃ paritapyase
GE09ram_02_u:047.030c: viṣādayasi sītāṃ ca māṃ caiva puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:047.031a: na ca sītā tvayā hīnā na cāham api rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:047.031c: muhūrtam api jīvāvo jalān matsyāv ivoddhṛtau
GE09ram_02_u:047.032a: na hi tātaṃ na śatrughnaṃ na sumitrāṃ paraṃtapa
GE09ram_02_u:047.032c: draṣṭum iccheyam adyāhaṃ svargaṃ vāpi tvayā vinā
GE09ram_02_u:047.033a: sa lakṣmaṇasyottama puṣkalaṃ vaco; niśamya caivaṃ vanavāsam ādarāt
GE09ram_02_u:047.033c: samāḥ samastā vidadhe paraṃtapaḥ; prapadya dharmaṃ sucirāya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:048.001a: te tu tasmin mahāvṛkṣa uṣitvā rajanīṃ śivām
GE09ram_02_u:048.002c: jagmus taṃ deśam uddiśya vigāhya sumahad vanam
GE09ram_02_u:048.003a: te bhūmim āgān vividhān deśāṃś cāpi manoramān
GE09ram_02_u:048.004a: yathākṣemeṇa gacchan sa paśyaṃś ca vividhān drumān
GE09ram_02_u:048.005a: prayāgam abhitaḥ paśya saumitre dhūmam unnatam
GE09ram_02_u:048.005c: agner bhagavataḥ ketuṃ manye saṃnihito muniḥ
GE09ram_02_u:048.006a: nūnaṃ prāptāḥ sma saṃbhedaṃ gaṅgāyamunayor vayam
GE09ram_02_u:048.006c: tathā hi śrūyate śambdo vāriṇā vārighaṭṭitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:048.008a: dhanvinau tau sukhaṃ gatvā lambamāne divākare
GE09ram_02_u:048.009a: rāmas tv āśramam āsādya trāsayan mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:048.010a: tatas tv āśramam āsādya muner darśanakāṅkṣiṇau
GE09ram_02_u:048.014a: pitrā pravrājyamānaṃ māṃ saumitrir anujaḥ priyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:048.014c: ayam anvagamad bhrātā vanam eva dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:048.016c: upānayata dharmātmā gām arghyam udakaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:048.017c: rāmam āgatam abhyarcya svāgatenāha taṃ muniḥ
GE09ram_02_u:048.018a: pratigṛhya ca tām arcām upaviṣṭaṃ sarāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:048.019a: cirasya khalu kākutstha paśyāmi tvām ihāgatam
GE09ram_02_u:048.019c: śrutaṃ tava mayā cedaṃ vivāsanam akāraṇam
GE09ram_02_u:048.020c: puṇyaś ca ramaṇīyaś ca vasatv iha bhagān sukham
GE09ram_02_u:048.021a: evam uktas tu vacanaṃ bharadvājena rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:048.021c: pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ rāmaḥ sarvahite rataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:048.022c: āgamiṣyati vaidehīṃ māṃ cāpi prekṣako janaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:048.022e: anena kāraṇenāham iha vāsaṃ na rocaye
GE09ram_02_u:048.024a: etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharadvājo mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_02_u:048.024c: rāghavasya tato vākyam artha grāhakam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:048.025a: daśakrośa itas tāta girir yasmin nivatsyasi
GE09ram_02_u:048.027a: yāvatā citra kūṭasya naraḥ śṛṅgāṇy avekṣate
GE09ram_02_u:048.027c: kalyāṇāni samādhatte na pāpe kurute manaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:048.028a: ṛṣayas tatra bahavo vihṛtya śaradāṃ śatam
GE09ram_02_u:048.029a: praviviktam ahaṃ manye taṃ vāsaṃ bhavataḥ sukham
GE09ram_02_u:048.029c: iha vā vanavāsāya vasa rāma mayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:048.030a: sa rāmaṃ sarvakāmais taṃ bharadvājaḥ priyātithim
GE09ram_02_u:048.030c: sabhāryaṃ saha ca bhrātrā pratijagrāha dharmavit
GE09ram_02_u:048.031a: tasya prayāge rāmasya taṃ maharṣim upeyuṣaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:048.031c: prapannā rajanī puṇyā citrāḥ kathayataḥ kathāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:048.033c: uṣitāḥ smeha vasatim anujānātu no bhavān
GE09ram_02_u:048.034a: rātryāṃ tu tasyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ bharadvājo 'bravīd idam
GE09ram_02_u:048.036c: mṛgaiś ca mattair bahubhiś ca kuñjaraiḥ; suramyam āsādya samāvasāśramam
GE09ram_02_u:049.001c: maharṣim abhivādyātha jagmatus taṃ giriṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:049.002a: prasthitāṃś caiva tān prekṣya pitā putrān ivānvagāt
GE09ram_02_u:049.002c: tataḥ pracakrame vaktuṃ vacanaṃ sa mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_02_u:049.003c: tatra yūyaṃ plavaṃ kṛtvā taratāṃśumatīṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:049.005a: krośamātraṃ tato gatvā nīlaṃ drakṣyatha kānanam
GE09ram_02_u:049.006a: sa panthāś citrakūṭasya gataḥ subahuśo mayā
GE09ram_02_u:049.006e: iti panthānam āvedya maharṣiḥ sa nyavartata
GE09ram_02_u:049.007a: upāvṛtte munau tasmin rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:049.007c: kṛtapuṇyāḥ sma saumitre munir yan no 'nukampate
GE09ram_02_u:049.008c: sītām evāgrataḥ kṛtvā kālindīṃ jagmatur nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:049.010a: tatra śriyam ivācintyāṃ rāmo dāśarathiḥ priyām
GE09ram_02_u:049.011c: tīrajair bahubhir vṛkṣaiḥ saṃterur yamunāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:049.012a: te tīrṇāḥ plavam utsṛjya prasthāya yamunāvanāt
GE09ram_02_u:049.013a: kausalyāṃ caiva paśyeyaṃ sumitrāṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_02_u:049.014c: bahūn medhyān mṛgān hatvā ceratur yamunāvane
GE09ram_02_u:049.015a: vihṛtya te barhiṇapūganādite; śubhe vane vāraṇavānarāyute
GE09ram_02_u:049.015c: samaṃ nadīvapram upetya saṃmataṃ; nivāsam ājagmur adīnadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:050.002a: saumitre śṛṇu vanyānāṃ valgu vyāharatāṃ svanam
GE09ram_02_u:050.003a: sa suptaḥ samaye bhrātrā lakṣmaṇaḥ pratibodhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:050.003c: jahau nidrāṃ ca tandrīṃ ca prasaktaṃ ca pathi śramam
GE09ram_02_u:050.004a: tata utthāya te sarve spṛṣṭvā nadyāḥ śivaṃ jalam
GE09ram_02_u:050.005a: tataḥ saṃprasthitaḥ kāle rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_02_u:050.006a: ādīptān iva vaidehi sarvataḥ puṣpitān nagān
GE09ram_02_u:050.006c: svaiḥ puṣpaiḥ kiṃśukān paśya mālinaḥ śiśirātyaye
GE09ram_02_u:050.009a: eṣa krośati natyūhas taṃ śikhī pratikūjati
GE09ram_02_u:050.011a: tatas tau pādacāreṇa gacchantau saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:050.012c: ayaṃ vāso bhavet tāvad atra saumya ramemahi
GE09ram_02_u:050.013a: lakṣmaṇānaya dārūṇi dṛḍhāni ca varāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:050.014a: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā saumitrir vividhān drumān
GE09ram_02_u:050.014c: ājahāra tataś cakre parṇa śālām ariṃ dama
GE09ram_02_u:050.015c: aiṇeyaṃ māṃsam āhṛtya śālāṃ yakṣyāmahe vayam
GE09ram_02_u:050.016a: sa lakṣmaṇaḥ kṛṣṇamṛgaṃ hatvā medhyaṃ patāpavān
GE09ram_02_u:050.017a: taṃ tu pakvaṃ samājñāya niṣṭaptaṃ chinnaśoṇitam
GE09ram_02_u:050.018a: ayaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ samāptāṅgaḥ śṛtaḥ kṛṣṇa mṛgo yathā
GE09ram_02_u:050.018c: devatā devasaṃkāśa yajasva kuśalo hy asi
GE09ram_02_u:050.019a: rāmaḥ snātvā tu niyato guṇavāñ japyakovidaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:050.020a: tāṃ vṛkṣaparṇac chadanāṃ manojñāṃ; yathāpradeśaṃ sukṛtāṃ nivātām
GE09ram_02_u:050.020c: vāsāya sarve viviśuḥ sametāḥ; sabhāṃ yathā deva gaṇāḥ sudharmām
GE09ram_02_u:050.021c: vanottame vyālamṛgānunādite; tathā vijahruḥ susukhaṃ jitendriyāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:050.022a: suramyam āsādya tu citrakūṭaṃ; nadīṃ ca tāṃ mālyavatīṃ sutīrthām
GE09ram_02_u:050.022c: nananda hṛṣṭo mṛgapakṣijuṣṭāṃ; jahau ca duḥkhaṃ puravipravāsāt
GE09ram_02_u:051.001c: rāme dakṣiṇa kūlasthe jagāma svagṛhaṃ guhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:051.003a: sa vanāni sugandhīni saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca
GE09ram_02_u:051.003c: paśyann atiyayau śīghraṃ grāmāṇi nagarāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:051.005a: sa śūnyām iva niḥśabdāṃ dṛṣṭvā paramadurmanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:051.006a: kaccin na sagajā sāśvā sajanā sajanādhipā
GE09ram_02_u:051.006e: iti cintāparaḥ sūtas tvaritaḥ praviveśa ha
GE09ram_02_u:051.007c: kva rāma iti pṛcchantaḥ sūtam abhyadravan narāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:051.008a: teṣāṃ śaśaṃsa gaṅgāyām aham āpṛcchya rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:051.009c: aho dhig iti niḥśvasya hā rāmeti ca cukruśuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:051.010a: śuśrāva ca vacas teṣāṃ vṛndaṃ vṛndaṃ ca tiṣṭhatām
GE09ram_02_u:051.010c: hatāḥ sma khalu ye neha paśyāma iti rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:051.011c: na drakṣyāmaḥ punar jātu dhārmikaṃ rāmam antarā
GE09ram_02_u:051.012a: kiṃ samarthaṃ janasyāsya kiṃ priyaṃ kiṃ sukhāvaham
GE09ram_02_u:051.014c: yatra rājā daśarathas tad evopayayau gṛham
GE09ram_02_u:051.015a: so 'vatīrya rathāc chīghraṃ rājaveśma praviśya ca
GE09ram_02_u:051.017a: saha rāmeṇa niryāto vinā rāmam ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:051.017c: sūtaḥ kiṃ nāma kausalyāṃ śocantīṃ prativakṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:051.018a: yathā ca manye durjīvam evaṃ na sukaraṃ dhruvam
GE09ram_02_u:051.018c: ācchidya putre niryāte kausalyā yatra jīvati
GE09ram_02_u:051.019a: satya rūpaṃ tu tadvākyaṃ rājñaḥ strīṇāṃ niśāmayan
GE09ram_02_u:051.019c: pradīptam iva śokena viveśa sahasā gṛham
GE09ram_02_u:051.020a: sa praviśyāṣṭamīṃ kakṣyāṃ rājānaṃ dīnam ātulam
GE09ram_02_u:051.021a: abhigamya tam āsīnaṃ narendram abhivādya ca
GE09ram_02_u:051.022a: sa tūṣṇīm eva tac chrutvā rājā vibhrānta cetanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:051.023c: uddhṛtya bāhū cukrośa nṛpatau patite kṣitau
GE09ram_02_u:051.024a: sumitrayā tu sahitā kausalyā patitaṃ patim
GE09ram_02_u:051.024c: utthāpayām āsa tadā vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:051.026c: uttiṣṭha sukṛtaṃ te 'stu śoke na syāt sahāyatā
GE09ram_02_u:051.027a: deva yasyā bhayād rāmaṃ nānupṛcchasi sārathim
GE09ram_02_u:051.029a: evaṃ vilapatīṃ dṛṣṭvā kausalyāṃ patitāṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_02_u:051.029c: patiṃ cāvekṣya tāḥ sarvāḥ sasvaraṃ ruruduḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:051.030a: tatas tam antaḥpuranādam utthitaṃ; samīkṣya vṛddhās taruṇāś ca mānavāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:051.030c: striyaś ca sarvā ruruduḥ samantataḥ; puraṃ tadāsīt punar eva saṃkulam
GE09ram_02_u:052.001a: pratyāśvasto yadā rājā mohāt pratyāgataḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:052.003a: rājā tu rajasā sūtaṃ dhvastāṅgaṃ samupasthitam
GE09ram_02_u:052.004a: kva nu vatsyati dharmātmā vṛkṣamūlam upāśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:052.005a: yaṃ yāntam anuyānti sma padāti rathakuñjarāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:052.005c: sa vatsyati kathaṃ rāmo vijanaṃ vanam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:052.006c: kathaṃ kumārau vaidehyā sārdhaṃ vanam upasthitau
GE09ram_02_u:052.007c: rājaputrau kathaṃ pādair avaruhya rathād gatau
GE09ram_02_u:052.008a: siddhārthaḥ khalu sūta tvaṃ yena dṛṣṭau mamātmajau
GE09ram_02_u:052.008c: vanāntaṃ praviśantau tāv aśvināv iva mandaram
GE09ram_02_u:052.009a: kim uvāca vaco rāmaḥ kim uvāca ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:052.009c: sumantra vanam āsādya kim uvāca ca maithilī
GE09ram_02_u:052.009e: āsitaṃ śayitaṃ bhuktaṃ sūta rāmasya kīrtaya
GE09ram_02_u:052.013a: sarvam antaḥpuraṃ vācyaṃ sūta mad vacanāt tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:052.014a: mātā ca mama kausalyā kuśalaṃ cābhivādanam
GE09ram_02_u:052.014c: devi devasya pādau ca devavat paripālaya
GE09ram_02_u:052.015a: bharataḥ kuśalaṃ vācyo vācyo madvacanena ca
GE09ram_02_u:052.015c: sarvāsv eva yathānyāyaṃ vṛttiṃ vartasva mātṛṣu
GE09ram_02_u:052.017a: ity evaṃ māṃ mahārāja bruvann eva mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:052.018a: lakṣmaṇas tu susaṃkruddho niḥśvasan vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:052.019e: rāmasya tu parityāge na hetum upalakṣaye
GE09ram_02_u:052.021c: bhrātā bhartā ca bandhuś ca pitā ca mama rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:052.024c: tena duḥkhena rudatī naiva māṃ kiṃ cid abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:052.025c: mumoca sahasā bāṣpaṃ māṃ prayāntam udīkṣya sā
GE09ram_02_u:052.026c: tathaiva sītā rudatī tapasvinī; nirīkṣate rājarathaṃ tathaiva mām
GE09ram_02_u:053.001a: mama tv aśvā nivṛttasya na prāvartanta vartmani
GE09ram_02_u:053.001c: uṣṇam aśru vimuñcanto rāme saṃprasthite vanam
GE09ram_02_u:053.002c: prasthito ratham āsthāya tad duḥkham api dhārayan
GE09ram_02_u:053.003a: guheva sārdhaṃ tatraiva sthito 'smi divasān bahūn
GE09ram_02_u:053.003c: āśayā yadi māṃ rāmaḥ punaḥ śabdāpayed iti
GE09ram_02_u:053.005a: na ca sarpanti sattvāni vyālā na prasaranti ca
GE09ram_02_u:053.007a: jalajāni ca puṣpāṇi mālyāni sthalajāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:053.007c: nādya bhānty alpagandhīni phalāni ca yathā puram
GE09ram_02_u:053.008a: praviśantam ayodhyāṃ māṃ na kaś cid abhinandati
GE09ram_02_u:053.008c: narā rāmam apaśyanto niḥśvasanti muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:053.009a: harmyair vimānaiḥ prāsādair avekṣya ratham āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:053.011c: aham ārtatayā kaṃ cid viśeṣaṃ nopalakṣaye
GE09ram_02_u:053.013c: kausalyā putra hīneva ayodhyā pratibhāti mā
GE09ram_02_u:053.014c: bāṣpopahatayā rājā taṃ sūtam idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:053.015c: mayā na mantrakuśalair vṛddhaiḥ saha samarthitam
GE09ram_02_u:053.016a: na suhṛdbhir na cāmātyair mantrayitvā na naigamaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:053.016c: mayāyam arthaḥ saṃmohāt strīhetoḥ sahasā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:053.017a: bhavitavyatayā nūnam idaṃ vā vyasanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_02_u:053.018a: sūta yady asti te kiṃ cin mayāpi sukṛtaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:053.018c: tvaṃ prāpayāśu māṃ rāmaṃ prāṇāḥ saṃtvarayanti mām
GE09ram_02_u:053.019a: yad yad yāpi mamaivājñā nivartayatu rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:053.019c: na śakṣyāmi vinā rāma muhūrtam api jīvitum
GE09ram_02_u:053.020a: atha vāpi mahābāhur gato dūraṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:053.020c: mām eva ratham āropya śīghraṃ rāmāya darśaya
GE09ram_02_u:053.021c: yadi jīvāmi sādhv enaṃ paśyeyaṃ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:053.022c: rāmaṃ yadi na paśyāmi gamiṣyāmi yamakṣayam
GE09ram_02_u:053.023a: ato nu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yo 'ham ikṣvākunandanam
GE09ram_02_u:053.023c: imām avasthām āpanno neha paśyāmi rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:053.024a: hā rāma rāmānuja hā hā vaidehi tapasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:053.024c: na māṃ jānīta duḥkhena mriyamāṇam anāthavat
GE09ram_02_u:053.025a: aśobhanaṃ yo 'ham ihādya rāghavaṃ; didṛkṣamāṇo na labhe salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:053.025c: itīva rājā vilapan mahāyaśāḥ; papāta tūrṇaṃ śayane sa mūrchitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:053.026a: iti vilapati pārthive pranaṣṭe; karuṇataraṃ dviguṇaṃ ca rāmahetoḥ
GE09ram_02_u:053.026c: vacanam anuniśamya tasya devī; bhayam agamat punar eva rāmamātā
GE09ram_02_u:054.002a: naya māṃ yatra kākutsthaḥ sītā yatra ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:054.002c: tān vinā kṣaṇam apy atra jīvituṃ notsahe hy aham
GE09ram_02_u:054.003a: nivartaya rathaṃ śīghraṃ daṇḍakān naya mām api
GE09ram_02_u:054.004c: idam āśvāsayan devīṃ sūtaḥ prāñjalir abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:054.005a: tyaja śokaṃ ca mohaṃ ca saṃbhramaṃ duḥkhajaṃ tathā
GE09ram_02_u:054.005c: vyavadhūya ca saṃtāpaṃ vane vatsyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:054.006a: lakṣmaṇaś cāpi rāmasya pādau paricaran vane
GE09ram_02_u:054.007a: vijane 'pi vane sītā vāsaṃ prāpya gṛheṣv iva
GE09ram_02_u:054.008a: nāsyā dainyaṃ kṛtaṃ kiṃ cit susūkṣmam api lakṣaye
GE09ram_02_u:054.009a: nagaropavanaṃ gatvā yathā sma ramate purā
GE09ram_02_u:054.009c: tathaiva ramate sītā nirjaneṣu vaneṣv api
GE09ram_02_u:054.010c: rāmā rāme hy adīnātmā vijane 'pi vane satī
GE09ram_02_u:054.011a: tadgataṃ hṛdayaṃ hy asyās tad adhīnaṃ ca jīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:054.011c: ayodhyāpi bhavet tasyā rāma hīnā tathā vanam
GE09ram_02_u:054.012a: pathi pṛcchati vaidehī grāmāṃś ca nagarāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:054.012c: gatiṃ dṛṣṭvā nadīnāṃ ca pādapān vividhān api
GE09ram_02_u:054.013c: na hi gacchati vaidehyāś candrāṃśusadṛśī prabhā
GE09ram_02_u:054.017a: gajaṃ vā vīkṣya siṃhaṃ vā vyāghraṃ vā vanam āśritā
GE09ram_02_u:054.018a: na śocyās te na cātmā te śocyo nāpi janādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:054.018c: idaṃ hi caritaṃ loke pratiṣṭhāsyati śāśvatam
GE09ram_02_u:054.019a: vidhūya śokaṃ parihṛṣṭamānasā; maharṣiyāte pathi suvyavasthitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:054.019c: vane ratā vanyaphalāśanāḥ pituḥ; śubhāṃ pratijñāṃ paripālayanti te
GE09ram_02_u:054.020c: na caiva devī virarāma kūjitāt; priyeti putreti ca rāghaveti ca
GE09ram_02_u:055.001a: vanaṃ gate dharmapare rāme ramayatāṃ vare
GE09ram_02_u:055.001c: kausalyā rudatī svārtā bhartāram idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:055.002a: yady apitriṣu lokeṣu prathitaṃ te mayad yaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:055.002c: sānukrośo vadānyaś ca priyavādī ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:055.003a: kathaṃ naravaraśreṣṭha putrau tau saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:055.004a: sā nūnaṃ taruṇī śyāmā sukumārī sukhocitā
GE09ram_02_u:055.004c: katham uṣṇaṃ ca śītaṃ ca maithilī prasahiṣyate
GE09ram_02_u:055.009a: vajrasāramayaṃ nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ me na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:055.009c: apaśyantyā na taṃ yad vai phalatīdaṃ sahasradhā
GE09ram_02_u:055.010a: yadi pañcadaśe varṣe rāghavaḥ punar eṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:055.010c: jahyād rājyaṃ ca kośaṃ ca bharatenopabhokṣyate
GE09ram_02_u:055.011a: evaṃ kanīyasā bhrātrā bhuktaṃ rājyaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE09ram_02_u:055.011c: bhrātā jyeṣṭhā variṣṭhāś ca kimarthaṃ nāvamaṃsyate
GE09ram_02_u:055.012a: na pareṇāhṛtaṃ bhakṣyaṃ vyāghraḥ khāditum icchati
GE09ram_02_u:055.012c: evam eva naravyāghraḥ paralīḍhaṃ na maṃsyate
GE09ram_02_u:055.013a: havir ājyaṃ puroḍāśāḥ kuśā yūpāś ca khādirāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:055.014a: tathā hy āttam idaṃ rājyaṃ hṛtasārāṃ surām iva
GE09ram_02_u:055.016c: svayam eva hataḥ pitrā jalajenātmajo yathā
GE09ram_02_u:055.017c: yadi te dharmanirate tvayā putre vivāsite
GE09ram_02_u:055.018a: gatir evāk patir nāryā dvitīyā gatir ātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:055.018c: tṛtīyā jñātayo rājaṃś caturthī neha vidyate
GE09ram_02_u:055.019a: tatra tvaṃ caiva me nāsti rāmaś ca vanam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:055.019c: na vanaṃ gantum icchāmi sarvathā hi hatā tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:055.020a: hataṃ tvayā rājyam idaṃ sarāṣṭraṃ; hatas tathātmā saha mantribhiś ca
GE09ram_02_u:055.020c: hatā saputrāsmi hatāś ca paurāḥ; sutaś ca bhāryā ca tava prahṛṣṭau
GE09ram_02_u:055.021a: imāṃ giraṃ dāruṇaśabdasaṃśritāṃ; niśamya rājāpi mumoha duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:055.021c: tataḥ sa śokaṃ praviveśa pārthivaḥ; svaduṣkṛtaṃ cāpi punas tadāsmarat
GE09ram_02_u:056.001a: evaṃ tu kruddhayā rājā rāmamātrā saśokayā
GE09ram_02_u:056.001c: śrāvitaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ cintayām āsa duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:056.002c: yad anena kṛtaṃ pūrvam ajñānāc chabdavedhinā
GE09ram_02_u:056.003a: amanās tena śokena rāmaśokena ca prabhuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:056.003c: dahyamānas tu śokābhyāṃ kausalyām āha bhūpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:056.004c: vatsalā cānṛśaṃsā ca tvaṃ hi nityaṃ pareṣv api
GE09ram_02_u:056.005a: bhartā tu khalu nārīṇāṃ guṇavān nirguṇo 'pi vā
GE09ram_02_u:056.007a: tad vākyaṃ karuṇaṃ rājñaḥ śrutvā dīnasya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:056.008a: sa mūdrhṇi baddhvā rudatī rājñaḥ padmam ivāñjalim
GE09ram_02_u:056.009a: prasīda śirasā yāce bhūmau nitatitāsmi te
GE09ram_02_u:056.009c: yācitāsmi hatā deva hantavyāhaṃ na hi tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:056.010a: naiṣā hi sā strī bhavati ślāghanīyena dhīmatā
GE09ram_02_u:056.010c: ubhayor lokayor vīra patyā yā saṃprasādyate
GE09ram_02_u:056.011a: jānāmi dharmaṃ dharmajña tvāṃ jāne satyavādinam
GE09ram_02_u:056.011c: putraśokārtayā tat tu mayā kim api bhāṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:056.012a: śoko nāśayate dhairyaṃ śoko nāśayate śrutam
GE09ram_02_u:056.012c: śoko nāśayate sarvaṃ nāsti śokasamo ripuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:056.013c: soḍhum āpatitaḥ śokaḥ susūkṣmo 'pi na śakyate
GE09ram_02_u:056.015a: taṃ hi cintayamānāyāḥ śoko 'yaṃ hṛdi vardhate
GE09ram_02_u:056.016a: evaṃ hi kathayantyās tu kausalyāyāḥ śubhaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:056.017a: atha prahlādito vākyair devyā kausalyayā nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:056.017c: śokena ca samākrānto nidrāyā vaśam eyivān
GE09ram_02_u:057.001c: atha rājā daśarathaḥ sa cintām abhyapadyata
GE09ram_02_u:057.003a: sa rājā rajanīṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ rāme pravrajite vanam
GE09ram_02_u:057.004a: yad ācarati kalyāṇi śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
GE09ram_02_u:057.004c: tad eva labhate bhadre kartā karmajam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:057.005a: guru lāghavam arthānām ārambhe karmaṇāṃ phalam
GE09ram_02_u:057.005c: doṣaṃ vā yo na jānāti sa bāla iti hocyate
GE09ram_02_u:057.006a: kaś cid āmravaṇaṃ chittvā palāśāṃś ca niṣiñcati
GE09ram_02_u:057.006c: puṣpaṃ dṛṣṭvā phale gṛdhnuḥ sa śocati phalāgame
GE09ram_02_u:057.007a: so 'ham āmravaṇaṃ chittvā palāśāṃś ca nyaṣecayam
GE09ram_02_u:057.007c: rāmaṃ phalāgame tyaktvā paścāc chocāmi durmatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:057.008c: kumāraḥ śabdavedhīti mayā pāpam idaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:057.008e: tad idaṃ me 'nusaṃprāptaṃ devi duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:057.009a: saṃmohād iha bālena yathā syād bhakṣitaṃ viṣam
GE09ram_02_u:057.010a: devy anūḍhā tvam abhavo yuvarājo bhavāmy aham
GE09ram_02_u:057.011a: upāsyahi rasān bhaumāṃs taptvā ca jagad aṃśubhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:057.012a: uṣṇam antardadhe sadyaḥ snigdhā dadṛśire ghanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:057.014a: tasminn atisukhe kāle dhanuṣmān iṣumān rathī
GE09ram_02_u:057.015a: nipāne mahiṣaṃ rātrau gajaṃ vābhyāgataṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:057.015c: anyaṃ vā śvāpadaṃ kaṃ cij jighāṃsur ajitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:057.016a: athāndhakāre tv aśrauṣaṃ jale kumbhasya paryataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:057.018c: hā heti patatas toye vāg abhūt tatra mānuṣī
GE09ram_02_u:057.018e: katham asmadvidhe śastraṃ nipatet tu tapasvini
GE09ram_02_u:057.019c: iṣuṇābhihataḥ kena kasya vā kiṃ kṛtaṃ mayā
GE09ram_02_u:057.020a: ṛṣer hi nyasta daṇḍasya vane vanyena jīvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:057.020c: kathaṃ nu śastreṇa vadho madvidhasya vidhīyate
GE09ram_02_u:057.021c: ko vadhena mamārthī syāt kiṃ vāsyāpakṛtaṃ mayā
GE09ram_02_u:057.022c: na kaś cit sādhu manyeta yathaiva gurutalpagam
GE09ram_02_u:057.024a: tad etān mithunaṃ vṛddhaṃ cirakālabhṛtaṃ mayā
GE09ram_02_u:057.024c: mayi pañcatvam āpanne kāṃ vṛttiṃ vartayiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:057.025a: vṛddhau ca mātāpitarāv ahaṃ caikeṣuṇā hataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:057.026a: taṃ giraṃ karuṇāṃ śrutvā mama dharmānukāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:057.027a: taṃ deśam aham āgamya dīnasattvaḥ sudurmanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:057.027c: apaśyam iṣuṇā tīre sarayvās tāpasaṃ hatam
GE09ram_02_u:057.028a: sa mām udvīkṣya netrābhyāṃ trastam asvasthacetasaṃ
GE09ram_02_u:057.028c: ity uvāca vacaḥ krūraṃ didhakṣann iva tejasā
GE09ram_02_u:057.029a: kiṃ tavāpakṛtaṃ rājan vane nivasatā mayā
GE09ram_02_u:057.029c: jihīrṣiur ambho gurvarthaṃ yad ahaṃ tāḍitas tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:057.030a: ekena khalu bāṇena marmaṇy abhihate mayi
GE09ram_02_u:057.030c: dvāv andhau nihatau vṛddhau mātā janayitā ca me
GE09ram_02_u:057.031a: tau nūnaṃ durbalāv andhau matpratīkṣau pipāsitau
GE09ram_02_u:057.032a: na nūnaṃ tapaso vāsti phalayogaḥ śrutasya vā
GE09ram_02_u:057.032c: pitā yan māṃ na jānāti śayānaṃ patitaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_02_u:057.033a: jānann api ca kiṃ kuryād aśaktir aparikramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:057.033c: bhidyamānam ivāśaktas trātum anyo nago nagam
GE09ram_02_u:057.034a: pitus tvam eva me gatvā śīghram ācakṣva rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:057.034c: na tvām anudahet kruddho vanaṃ vahnir ivaidhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:057.035a: iyam ekapadī rājan yato me pitur āśramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:057.035c: taṃ prasādaya gatvā tvaṃ na tvāṃ sa kupitaḥ śapet
GE09ram_02_u:057.036a: viśalyaṃ kuru māṃ rājan marma me niśitaḥ śaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:057.036c: ruṇaddhi mṛdu sotsedhaṃ tīram amburayo yathā
GE09ram_02_u:057.037a: na dvijātir ahaṃ rājan mā bhūt te manaso vyathā
GE09ram_02_u:057.038c: tasya tv ānamyamānasya taṃ bāṇam aham uddharam
GE09ram_02_u:057.039a: jalārdragātraṃ tu vilapya kṛcchān; marmavraṇaṃ saṃtatam ucchasantam
GE09ram_02_u:057.039c: tataḥ sarayvāṃ tam ahaṃ śayānaṃ; samīkṣya bhadre subhṛśaṃ viṣaṇṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:058.001a: tad ajñānān mahat pāpaṃ kṛtvā saṃkulitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:058.001c: ekas tv acintayaṃ buddhyā kathaṃ nu sukṛtaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_02_u:058.002a: tatas taṃ ghaṭam ādaya pūrṇaṃ paramavāriṇā
GE09ram_02_u:058.002c: āśramaṃ tam ahaṃ prāpya yathākhyātapathaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:058.003c: apaśyaṃ tasya pitarau lūnapakṣāv iva dvijau
GE09ram_02_u:058.004c: tām āśāṃ matkṛte hīnāv udāsīnāv anāthavat
GE09ram_02_u:058.005a: padaśabdaṃ tu me śrutvā munir vākyam abhāṣata
GE09ram_02_u:058.005c: kiṃ cirāyasi me putra pānīyaṃ kṣipram ānaya
GE09ram_02_u:058.006a: yannimittam idaṃ tāta salile krīḍitaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:058.006c: utkaṇṭhitā te māteyaṃ praviśa kṣipram āśramam
GE09ram_02_u:058.007a: yad vyalīkaṃ kṛtaṃ putra mātrā te yadi vā mayā
GE09ram_02_u:058.007c: na tan manasi kartavyaṃ tvayā tāta tapasvinā
GE09ram_02_u:058.008a: tvaṃ gatis tv agatīnāṃ ca cakṣus tvaṃ hīnacakṣuṣām
GE09ram_02_u:058.008c: samāsaktās tvayi prāṇāḥ kiṃ cin nau nābhibhāṣase
GE09ram_02_u:058.009a: munim avyaktayā vācā tam ahaṃ sajjamānayā
GE09ram_02_u:058.010c: ācacakṣe tv ahaṃ tasmai putravyasanajaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_02_u:058.012c: jighāṃsuḥ śvāpadaṃ kiṃ cin nipāne vāgataṃ gajam
GE09ram_02_u:058.013a: tatra śruto mayā śabdo jale kumbhasya pūryataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:058.013c: dvipo 'yam iti matvā hi bāṇenābhihato mayā
GE09ram_02_u:058.014a: gatvā nadyās tatas tīram apaśyam iṣuṇā hṛdi
GE09ram_02_u:058.015c: visṛṣṭo 'mbhasi nārācas tena te nihataḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:058.016a: sa coddhṛtena bāṇena tatraiva svargam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:058.016c: bhagavantāv ubhau śocann andhāv iti vilapya ca
GE09ram_02_u:058.017c: śeṣam evaṃgate yat syāt tat prasīdatu me muniḥ
GE09ram_02_u:058.018a: sa tac chrutvā vacaḥ krūraṃ niḥśvasañ śokakarśitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:058.019a: yady etad aśubhaṃ karma na sma me kathayeḥ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:058.019c: phalen mūrdhā sma te rājan sadyaḥ śatasahasradhā
GE09ram_02_u:058.020c: jñānapūrvaṃ kṛtaḥ sthānāc cyāvayed api vajriṇam
GE09ram_02_u:058.021a: ajñānād dhi kṛtaṃ yasmād idaṃ tenaiva jīvasi
GE09ram_02_u:058.021c: api hy adya kulaṃ nasyād rāghavāṇāṃ kuto bhavān
GE09ram_02_u:058.022a: naya nau nṛpa taṃ deśam iti māṃ cābhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_02_u:058.022c: adya taṃ draṣṭum icchāvaḥ putraṃ paścimadarśanam
GE09ram_02_u:058.024a: athāham ekas taṃ deśaṃ nītvā tau bhṛśaduḥkhitau
GE09ram_02_u:058.024c: asparśayam ahaṃ putraṃ taṃ muniṃ saha bhāryayā
GE09ram_02_u:058.025a: tau putram ātmanaḥ spṛṣṭvā tam āsādya tapasvinau
GE09ram_02_u:058.026a: na nv ahaṃ te priyaḥ putra mātaraṃ paśya dhārmika
GE09ram_02_u:058.026c: kiṃ nu nāliṅgase putra sukumāra vaco vada
GE09ram_02_u:058.028a: ko māṃ saṃdhyām upāsyaiva snātvā hutahutāśanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:058.029a: kandamūlaphalaṃ hṛtvā ko māṃ priyam ivātithim
GE09ram_02_u:058.030a: imām andhāṃ ca vṛddhāṃ ca mātaraṃ te tapasvinīm
GE09ram_02_u:058.031a: tiṣṭha mā mā gamaḥ putra yamasya sadanaṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:058.031c: śvo mayā saha gantāsi jananyā ca samedhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:058.032a: ubhāv api ca śokārtāv anāthau kṛpaṇau vane
GE09ram_02_u:058.032c: kṣipram eva gamiṣyāvas tvayā hīnau yamakṣayam
GE09ram_02_u:058.033a: tato vaivasvataṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ pravakṣyāmi bhāratīm
GE09ram_02_u:058.033c: kṣamatāṃ dharmarājo me bibhṛyāt pitarāv ayam
GE09ram_02_u:058.034c: tena satyena gacchāśu ye lokāḥ śastrayodhinām
GE09ram_02_u:058.035a: yānti śūrā gatiṃ yāṃ ca saṃgrāmeṣv anivartinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:058.035c: hatās tv abhimukhāḥ putra gatiṃ tāṃ paramāṃ vraja
GE09ram_02_u:058.036a: yāṃ gatiṃ sagaraḥ śaibyo dilīpo janamejayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:058.036c: nahuṣo dhundhumāraś ca prāptās tāṃ gaccha putraka
GE09ram_02_u:058.037a: yā gatiḥ sarvasādhūnāṃ svādhyāyāt patasaś ca yā
GE09ram_02_u:058.038c: dehanyāsakṛtāṃ yā ca tāṃ gatiṃ gaccha putraka
GE09ram_02_u:058.038e: na hi tv asmin kule jāto gacchaty akuśalāṃ gatim
GE09ram_02_u:058.039c: tato 'smai kartum udakaṃ pravṛttaḥ saha bhāryayā
GE09ram_02_u:058.040a: sa tu divyena rūpeṇa muniputraḥ svakarmabhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:058.040c: āśvāsya ca muhūrtaṃ tu pitarau vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:058.041a: sthānam asmi mahat prāpto bhavatoḥ paricāraṇāt
GE09ram_02_u:058.041c: bhavantāv api ca kṣipraṃ mama mūlam upaiṣyataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:058.042a: evam uktvā tu divyena vimānena vapuṣmatā
GE09ram_02_u:058.043a: sa kṛtvā tūdakaṃ tūrṇaṃ tāpasaḥ saha bhāryayā
GE09ram_02_u:058.044a: adyaiva jahi māṃ rājan maraṇe nāsti me vyathā
GE09ram_02_u:058.044c: yac chareṇaikaputraṃ māṃ tvam akārṣīr aputrakam
GE09ram_02_u:058.045a: tvayā tu yad avijñānān nihato me sutaḥ śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:058.046a: putravyasanajaṃ duḥkhaṃ yad etan mama sāmpratam
GE09ram_02_u:058.046c: evaṃ tvaṃ putraśokena rājan kālaṃ kariṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:058.047a: tasmān mām āgataṃ bhadre tasyodārasya tadvacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:058.047c: yad ahaṃ putraśokena saṃtyakṣyāmy adya jīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:058.048a: yadi māṃ saṃspṛśed rāmaḥ sakṛd adyālabheta vā
GE09ram_02_u:058.048c: na tan me sadṛśaṃ devi yan mayā rāghave kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:058.049a: cakṣuṣā tvāṃ na paśyāmi smṛtir mama vilupyate
GE09ram_02_u:058.050a: atas tu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yad ahaṃ jīvitakṣaye
GE09ram_02_u:058.050c: na hi paśyāmi dharmajñaṃ rāmaṃ satyaparākyamam
GE09ram_02_u:058.051a: na te manuṣyā devās te ye cāruśubhakuṇḍalam
GE09ram_02_u:058.051c: mukhaṃ drakṣyanti rāmasya varṣe pañcadaśe punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:058.053c: sugandhi mama nāthasya dhanyā drakṣyanti tanmukham
GE09ram_02_u:058.054c: drakṣyanti sukhino rāmaṃ śukraṃ mārgagataṃ yathā
GE09ram_02_u:058.055a: ayam ātmabhavaḥ śoko mām anātham acetanam
GE09ram_02_u:058.057a: tathā tu dīnaṃ kathayan narādhipaḥ; priyasya putrasya vivāsanāturaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:058.057c: gate 'rdharātre bhṛśaduḥkhapīḍitas; tadā jahau prāṇam udāradarśanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:059.004c: upaninyus tathāpy anyāḥ kumārī bahulāḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:059.005c: tāḥ striyas tu samāgamya bhartāraṃ pratyabodhayan
GE09ram_02_u:059.006a: tā vepathuparītāś ca rājñaḥ prāṇeṣu śaṅkitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:059.007a: atha saṃvepamanānāṃ strīṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca pārthivam
GE09ram_02_u:059.007c: yat tad āśaṅkitaṃ pāpaṃ tasya jajñe viniścayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:059.008a: tataḥ pracukruśur dīnāḥ sasvaraṃ tā varāṅganāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:059.010a: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā ca pārthivam
GE09ram_02_u:059.014a: atītam ājñāya tu pārthivarṣabhaṃ; yaśasvinaṃ saṃparivārya patnayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:059.014c: bhṛśaṃ rudantyaḥ karuṇaṃ suduḥkhitāḥ; pragṛhya bāhū vyalapann anāthavat
GE09ram_02_u:060.001a: tam agnim iva saṃśāntam ambuhīnam ivārṇavam
GE09ram_02_u:060.003a: sakāmā bhava kaikeyi bhuṅkṣva rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:060.004a: vihāya māṃ gato rāmo bhartā ca svargato mama
GE09ram_02_u:060.005a: bhartāraṃ taṃ parityajya kā strī daivatam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:060.006a: na lubdho budhyate doṣān kiṃ pākam iva bhakṣayan
GE09ram_02_u:060.007c: sabhāryaṃ janakaḥ śrutvā patitapsyaty ahaṃ yathā
GE09ram_02_u:060.012c: rājñaḥ sarvāṇy athādiṣṭāś cakruḥ karmāṇy anantaram
GE09ram_02_u:060.013a: na tu saṃkalanaṃ rājño vinā putreṇa mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:060.013c: sarvajñāḥ kartum īṣus te tato rakṣanti bhūmipam
GE09ram_02_u:060.014a: tailadroṇyāṃ tu sacivaiḥ śāyitaṃ taṃ narādhipam
GE09ram_02_u:060.014c: hā mṛto 'yam iti jñātvā striyas tāḥ paryadevayan
GE09ram_02_u:060.018a: gataprabhā dyaur iva bhāskaraṃ vinā; vyapetanakṣatragaṇeva śarvarī
GE09ram_02_u:060.018c: purī babhāse rahitā mahātmanā; na cāsrakaṇṭhākulamārgacatvarā
GE09ram_02_u:060.019a: narāś ca nāryaś ca sametya saṃghaśo; vigarhamāṇā bharatasya mātaram
GE09ram_02_u:060.019c: tadā nagaryāṃ naradevasaṃkṣaye; babhūvur ārtā na ca śarma lebhire
GE09ram_02_u:061.002c: kātyayano gautamaś ca jābāliś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:061.003a: ete dvijāḥ sahāmātyaiḥ pṛthag vācam udīrayan
GE09ram_02_u:061.004a: atītā śarvarī duḥkhaṃ yā no varṣaśatopamā
GE09ram_02_u:061.005a: svargataś ca mahārājo rāmaś cāraṇyam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:061.005c: lakṣmaṇaś cāpi tejasvī rāmeṇaiva gataḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:061.007a: ikṣvākūṇām ihādyaiva kaś cid rājā vidhīyatām
GE09ram_02_u:061.007c: arājakaṃ hi no rāṣṭraṃ na vināśam avāpnuyāt
GE09ram_02_u:061.009c: nārākake pituḥ putro bhāryā vā vartate vaśe
GE09ram_02_u:061.010a: arājake dhanaṃ nāsti nāsti bhāryāpy arājake
GE09ram_02_u:061.010c: idam atyāhitaṃ cānyat kutaḥ satyam arājake
GE09ram_02_u:061.011c: udyānāni ca ramyāṇi hṛṣṭāḥ puṇyagṛhāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:061.013c: utsavāś ca samājāś ca vardhante rāṣṭravardhanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:061.015c: narā niryānty araṇyāni nārībhiḥ saha kāminaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:061.019c: na cāpy arājake senā śatrūn viṣahate yudhi
GE09ram_02_u:061.020a: yathā hy anudakā nadyo yathā vāpy atṛṇaṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:061.020c: agopālā yathā gāvas tathā rāṣṭram arājakam
GE09ram_02_u:061.021a: nārājake janapade svakaṃ bhavati kasya cit
GE09ram_02_u:061.021c: matsyā iva narā nityaṃ bhakṣayanti parasparam
GE09ram_02_u:061.023a: aho tama ivedaṃ syān na prajñāyeta kiṃ cana
GE09ram_02_u:061.023c: rājā cen na bhaveṃl loke vibhajan sādhvasādhunī
GE09ram_02_u:061.024a: jīvaty api mahārāje tavaiva vacanaṃ vayam
GE09ram_02_u:061.025a: sa naḥ samīkṣya dvijavaryavṛttaṃ; nṛpaṃ vinā rājyam araṇyabhūtam
GE09ram_02_u:061.025c: kumāram ikṣvākusutaṃ vadānyaṃ; tvam eva rājānam ihābhiṣiñcaya
GE09ram_02_u:062.001a: teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:062.001c: mitrāmātyagaṇān sarvān brāhmaṇāṃs tān idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:062.002a: yad asau mātulakule pure rājagṛhe sukhī
GE09ram_02_u:062.003a: tac chīghraṃ javanā dūtā gacchantu tvaritair hayaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:062.003c: ānetuṃ bhrātarau vīrau kiṃ samīkṣāmahe vayam
GE09ram_02_u:062.004a: gacchantv iti tataḥ sarve vasiṣṭhaṃ vākyam abruvan
GE09ram_02_u:062.004c: teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:062.005c: śrūyatām itikartavyaṃ sarvān eva bravīmi vaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:062.006a: puraṃ rājagṛhaṃ gatvā śīghraṃ śīghrajavair hayaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:062.006c: tyaktaśokair idaṃ vācyaḥ śāsanād bharato mama
GE09ram_02_u:062.007a: purohitas tvāṃ kuśalaṃ prāha sarve ca mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:062.007c: tvaramāṇaś ca niryāhi kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:062.008a: mā cāsmai proṣitaṃ rāmaṃ mā cāsmai pitaraṃ mṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:062.008c: bhavantaḥ śaṃsiṣur gatvā rāghavāṇām imaṃ kṣayam
GE09ram_02_u:062.009a: kauśeyāni ca vastrāṇi bhūṣaṇāni varāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:062.009c: kṣipram ādāya rājñaś ca bharatasya ca gacchata
GE09ram_02_u:062.010a: te hastina pure gaṅgāṃ tīrtvā pratyaṅmukhā yayuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:062.013c: yayur madhyena bāhlīkān sudāmānaṃ ca parvatam
GE09ram_02_u:062.013e: viṣṇoḥ padaṃ prekṣamāṇā vipāśāṃ cāpi śālmalīm
GE09ram_02_u:062.014a: te śrāntavāhanā dūtā vikṛṣṭena satā pathā
GE09ram_02_u:062.014c: giri vrajaṃ pura varaṃ śīghram āsedur añjasā
GE09ram_02_u:062.015a: bhartuḥ priyārthaṃ kularakṣaṇārthaṃ; bhartuś ca vaṃśasya parigrahārtham
GE09ram_02_u:062.015c: aheḍamānās tvarayā sma dūtā; rātryāṃ tu te tat puram eva yātāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:063.001a: yām eva rātriṃ te dūtāḥ praviśanti sma tāṃ purīm
GE09ram_02_u:063.001c: bharatenāpi tāṃ rātriṃ svapno dṛṣṭo 'yam apriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:063.002a: vyuṣṭām eva tu tāṃ rātriṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ svapnam apriyam
GE09ram_02_u:063.003c: āyāsaṃ hi vineṣyantaḥ sabhāyāṃ cakrire kathāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:063.004a: vādayanti tathā śāntiṃ lāsayanty api cāpare
GE09ram_02_u:063.004c: nāṭakāny apare prāhur hāsyāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:063.005a: sa tair mahātmā bharataḥ sakhibhiḥ priya vādibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:063.006a: tam abravīt priyasakho bharataṃ sakhibhir vṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:063.007a: evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ suhṛdaṃ bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:063.007c: śṛṇu tvaṃ yan nimittaṃme dainyam etad upāgatam
GE09ram_02_u:063.009a: plavamānaś ca me dṛṣṭaḥ sa tasmin gomayahrade
GE09ram_02_u:063.009c: pibann añjalinā tailaṃ hasann iva muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:063.010a: tatas tilodanaṃ bhuktvā punaḥ punar adhaḥśirāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:063.011a: svapne 'pi sāgaraṃ śuṣkaṃ candraṃ ca patitaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_02_u:063.012a: avadīrṇāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ śuṣkāṃś ca vividhān drumān
GE09ram_02_u:063.012c: ahaṃ paśyāmi vidhvastān sadhūmāṃś caiva pārvatān
GE09ram_02_u:063.015a: evam etan mayā dṛṣṭam imāṃ rātriṃ bhayāvahām
GE09ram_02_u:063.015c: ahaṃ rāmo 'tha vā rājā lakṣmaṇo vā mariṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:063.016a: naro yānena yaḥ svapne kharayuktena yāti hi
GE09ram_02_u:063.016e: etannimittaṃ dīno 'haṃ tan na vaḥ pratipūjaye
GE09ram_02_u:063.017a: śuṣyatīva ca me kaṇṭho na svastham iva me manaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:063.017c: jugupsann iva cātmānaṃ na ca paśyāmi kāraṇam
GE09ram_02_u:063.018a: imāṃ hi duḥsvapnagatiṃ niśāmya tām; anekarūpām avitarkitāṃ purā
GE09ram_02_u:063.018c: bhayaṃ mahat tad dhṛdayān na yāti me; vicintya rājānam acintyadarśanam
GE09ram_02_u:064.001a: bharate bruvati svapnaṃ dūtās te klāntavāhanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:064.002a: samāgamya tu rājñā ca rājaputreṇa cārcitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:064.002c: rājñaḥ pādau gṛhītvā tu tam ūcur bharataṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:064.003a: purohitas tvā kuśalaṃ prāha sarve ca mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:064.003c: tvaramāṇaś ca niryāhi kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:064.004a: atra viṃśatikoṭyas tu nṛpater mātulasya te
GE09ram_02_u:064.004c: daśakoṭyas tu saṃpūrṇās tathaiva ca nṛpātmaja
GE09ram_02_u:064.005a: pratigṛhya ca tat sarvaṃ svanuraktaḥ suhṛjjane
GE09ram_02_u:064.005c: dūtān uvāca bharataḥ kāmaiḥ saṃpratipūjya tān
GE09ram_02_u:064.006a: kaccit sukuśalī rājā pitā daśaratho mama
GE09ram_02_u:064.006c: kaccic cārāgatā rāme lakṣmaṇe vā mahātmani
GE09ram_02_u:064.007c: arogā cāpi kausalyā mātā rāmasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:064.008a: kaccit sumitrā dharmajñā jananī lakṣmaṇasya yā
GE09ram_02_u:064.008c: śatrughnasya ca vīrasya sārogā cāpi madhyamā
GE09ram_02_u:064.009c: arogā cāpi kaikeyī mātā me kim uvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:064.010a: evam uktās tu te dūtā bharatena mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:064.010c: ūcuḥ saṃpraśritaṃ vākyam idaṃ taṃ bharataṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:064.010e: kuśalās te naravyāghra yeṣāṃ kuśalam icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:064.011a: bharataś cāpi tān dūtān evam ukto 'bhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_02_u:064.012a: evam uktvā tu tān dūtān bharataḥ pārthivātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:064.012c: dūtaiḥ saṃcodito vākyaṃ mātāmaham uvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:064.013c: punar apy aham eṣyāmi yadā me tvaṃ smariṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:064.014a: bharatenaivam uktas tu nṛpo mātāmahas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:064.014c: tam uvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ śirasy āghrāya rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:064.015a: gaccha tātānujāne tvāṃ kaikeyī suprajās tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:064.015c: mātaraṃ kuśalaṃ brūyāḥ pitaraṃ ca paraṃtapa
GE09ram_02_u:064.016a: purohitaṃ ca kuśalaṃ ye cānye dvijasattamāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:064.016c: tau ca tāta maheṣvāsau bhrātaru rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_02_u:064.017a: tasmai hastyuttamāṃś citrān kambalān ajināni ca
GE09ram_02_u:064.018c: satkṛtya kaikeyī putraṃ kekayo dhanam ādiśat
GE09ram_02_u:064.020c: kharāñ śīghrān susaṃyuktān mātulo 'smai dhanaṃ dadau
GE09ram_02_u:064.022a: sa mātāmaham āpṛcchya mātulaṃ ca yudhājitam
GE09ram_02_u:064.024a: balena gupto bharato mahātmā; sahāryakasyātmasamair amātyaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:064.024c: ādāya śatrughnam apetaśatrur; gṛhād yayau siddha ivendralokāt
GE09ram_02_u:065.003c: atyayāt sa mahāśailān vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:065.004c: yamunāṃ prāpya saṃtīrṇo balam āśvāsayat tadā
GE09ram_02_u:065.005a: śītīkṛtya tu gātrāṇi klāntān āśvāsya vājinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:065.005c: tatra snātvā ca pītvā ca prāyād ādāya codakam
GE09ram_02_u:065.006c: bhadro bhadreṇa yānena mārutaḥ kham ivātyayāt
GE09ram_02_u:065.007c: varūthaṃ ca yayau ramyaṃ grāmaṃ daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:065.008a: tatra ramye vane vāsaṃ kṛtvāsau prāṅmukho yayau
GE09ram_02_u:065.009a: sālāṃs tu priyakān prāpya śīghrān āsthāya vājinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:065.010a: vāsaṃ kṛtvā sarvatīrthe tīrtvā cottānakāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:065.010c: anyā nadīś ca vividhāḥ pārvatīyais turaṃgamaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:065.011c: tatāra ca naravyāghro lauhitye sa kapīvatīm
GE09ram_02_u:065.012a: kaliṅga nagare cāpi prāpya sālavanaṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:065.013c: ayodhyāṃ manunā rājñā nirmitāṃ sa dadarśa ha
GE09ram_02_u:065.014c: ayodhyām agrato dṛṣṭvā rathe sārathim abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:065.017c: samantān naranārīṇāṃ tam adya na śṛṇomy aham
GE09ram_02_u:065.020a: na hy atra yānair dṛśyante na gajair na ca vājibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:065.021a: aniṣṭāni ca pāpāni paśyāmi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:065.021c: nimittāny amanojñāni tena sīdati te manaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:065.022c: dvāḥsthair utthāya vijayaṃ pṛṣṭas taiḥ sahito yayau
GE09ram_02_u:065.023a: sa tv anekāgrahṛdayo dvāḥsthaṃ pratyarcya taṃ janam
GE09ram_02_u:065.023c: sūtam aśvapateḥ klāntam abravīt tatra rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:065.024a: śrutā no yādṛśāḥ pūrvaṃ nṛpatīnāṃ vināśane
GE09ram_02_u:065.024c: ākārās tān ahaṃ sarvān iha paśyāmi sārathe
GE09ram_02_u:065.025c: sastrī puṃsaṃ ca paśyāmi janam utkaṇṭhitaṃ pure
GE09ram_02_u:065.026a: ity evam uktvā bharataḥ sūtaṃ taṃ dīnamānasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:065.026c: tāny aniṣṭāny ayodhyāyāṃ prekṣya rājagṛhaṃ yayau
GE09ram_02_u:065.027c: dṛṣṭvā purīm indrapurī prakāśāṃ; duḥkhena saṃpūrṇataro babhūva
GE09ram_02_u:065.028a: bahūni paśyan manaso 'priyāṇi; yāny annyadā nāsya pure babhūvuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:065.028c: avākśirā dīnamanā nahṛṣṭaḥ; pitur mahātmā praviveśa veśma
GE09ram_02_u:066.001a: apaśyaṃs tu tatas tatra pitaraṃ pitur ālaye
GE09ram_02_u:066.001c: jagāma bharato draṣṭuṃ mātaraṃ mātur ālaye
GE09ram_02_u:066.002a: anuprāptaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā kaikeyī proṣitaṃ sutam
GE09ram_02_u:066.003c: bharataḥ prekṣya jagrāha jananyāś caraṇau śubhau
GE09ram_02_u:066.005a: adya te kati cid rātryaś cyutasyāryakaveśmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:066.006a: āryakas te sukuśalo yudhājin mātulas tava
GE09ram_02_u:066.006c: pravāsāc ca sukhaṃ putra sarvaṃ me vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:066.007a: evaṃ pṛṣṭhas tu kaikeyyā priyaṃ pārthivanandanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:066.008c: ambāyāḥ kuśalī tāto yudhājin mātulaś ca me
GE09ram_02_u:066.009a: yan me dhanaṃ ca ratnaṃ ca dadau rājā paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:066.009c: pariśrāntaṃ pathy abhavat tato 'haṃ pūrvam āgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:066.010c: yad ahaṃ praṣṭum icchāmi tad ambā vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:066.011c: na cāyam ikṣvākujanaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ pratibhāti me
GE09ram_02_u:066.012c: tam ahaṃ nādya paśyāmi draṣṭum icchann ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:066.013a: pitur grahīṣye caraṇau taṃ mamākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:066.014a: taṃ pratyuvāca kaikeyī priyavad ghoram apriyam
GE09ram_02_u:066.014e: yā gatiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ te pitā gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:066.015a: tac chrutvā bharato vākyaṃ dharmābhijanavāñ śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:066.017a: etat suruciraṃ bhāti pitur me śayanaṃ purā
GE09ram_02_u:066.017c: tad idaṃ na vibhāty adya vihīnaṃ tena dhīmatā
GE09ram_02_u:066.018a: tam ārtaṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ samīkṣya patitaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_02_u:066.019c: tvadvidhā na hi śocanti santaḥ sadasi saṃmatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:066.020a: sa rudatyā ciraṃ kālaṃ bhūmau viparivṛtya ca
GE09ram_02_u:066.021a: abhiṣekṣyati rāmaṃ tu rājā yajñaṃ nu yakṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:066.021c: ity ahaṃ kṛtasaṃkalpo hṛṣṭo yātrām ayāsiṣam
GE09ram_02_u:066.022a: tad idaṃ hy anyathā bhūtaṃ vyavadīrṇaṃ mano mama
GE09ram_02_u:066.022c: pitaraṃ yo na paśyāmi nityaṃ priyahite ratam
GE09ram_02_u:066.023a: amba kenātyagād rājā vyādhinā mayy anāgate
GE09ram_02_u:066.023c: dhanyā rāmādayaḥ sarve yaiḥ pitā saṃskṛtaḥ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:066.024a: na nūnaṃ māṃ mahārājaḥ prāptaṃ jānāti kīrtimān
GE09ram_02_u:066.024c: upajighred dhi māṃ mūrdhni tātaḥ saṃnamya satvaram
GE09ram_02_u:066.025c: yena māṃ rajasā dhvastam abhīkṣṇaṃ parimārjati
GE09ram_02_u:066.026a: yo me bhrātā pitā bandhur yasya dāso 'smi dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:066.026c: tasya māṃ śīghram ākhyāhi rāmasyākliṣṭa karmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:066.027a: pitā hi bhavati jyeṣṭho dharmam āryasya jānataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:066.027c: tasya pādau grahīṣyāmi sa hīdānīṃ gatir mama
GE09ram_02_u:066.028a: ārye kim abravīd rājā pitā me satyavikramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:066.029a: iti pṛṣṭā yathātattvaṃ kaikeyī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:066.029c: rāmeti rājā vilapan hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_02_u:066.029e: sa mahātmā paraṃ lokaṃ gato gatimatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:066.030a: imāṃ tu paścimāṃ vācaṃ vyājahāra pitā tava
GE09ram_02_u:066.031a: siddhārthās tu narā rāmam āgataṃ sītayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:066.031c: lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābāhuṃ drakṣyanti punar āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:066.033c: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā ca samaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:066.035a: sa hi rājasutaḥ putra cīravāsā mahāvanam
GE09ram_02_u:066.036a: tac chrutvā bharatas trasto bhrātuś cāritraśaṅkayā
GE09ram_02_u:066.037a: kaccin na brāhmaṇavadhaṃ hṛtaṃ rāmeṇa kasya cit
GE09ram_02_u:066.037c: kaccin nāḍhyo daridro vā tenāpāpo vihiṃsitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:066.039a: athāsya capalā mātā tat svakarma yathātatham
GE09ram_02_u:066.040a: na brāhmaṇa dhanaṃ kiṃcid dhṛtaṃ rāmeṇa kasya cit
GE09ram_02_u:066.040c: kaś cin nāḍhyo daridro vā tenāpāpo vihiṃsitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:066.040e: na rāmaḥ paradārāṃś ca cakṣurbhyām api paśyati
GE09ram_02_u:066.041c: yācitas te pitā rājyaṃ rāmasya ca vivāsanam
GE09ram_02_u:066.042a: sa svavṛttiṃ samāsthāya pitā te tat tathākarot
GE09ram_02_u:066.042c: rāmaś ca sahasaumitriḥ preṣitaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:066.043a: tam apaśyan priyaṃ putraṃ mahīpālo mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:066.044a: tvayā tv idānīṃ dharmajña rājatvam avalambyatām
GE09ram_02_u:066.044c: tvatkṛte hi mayā sarvam idam evaṃvidhaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:066.045a: tat putra śīghraṃ vidhinā vidhijñair; vasiṣṭhamukhyaiḥ sahito dvijendraiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:066.045c: saṃkālya rājānam adīnasattvam; ātmānam urvyām abhiṣecayasva
GE09ram_02_u:067.001a: śrutvā tu pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ bhrātaru ca vivāsitau
GE09ram_02_u:067.002a: kiṃ nuṇkāryaṃ hatasyeha mama rājyena śocataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:067.002c: vihīnasyātha pitrā ca bhrātrā pitṛsamena ca
GE09ram_02_u:067.003a: duḥkhe me duḥkham akaror vraṇe kṣāram ivādadhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:067.003c: rājānaṃ pretabhāvasthaṃ kṛtvā rāmaṃ ca tāpasaṃ
GE09ram_02_u:067.004c: aṅgāram upagūhya sma pitā me nāvabuddhavān
GE09ram_02_u:067.005c: duṣkaraṃ yadi jīvetāṃ prāpya tvāṃ jananīṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:067.006a: nanu tv āryo 'pi dharmātmā tvayi vṛttim anuttamām
GE09ram_02_u:067.007a: tathā jyeṣṭhā hi me mātā kausalyā dīrghadarśinī
GE09ram_02_u:067.007c: tvayi dharmaṃ samāsthāya bhaginyām iva vartate
GE09ram_02_u:067.008c: prasthāpya vanavāsāya kathaṃ pāpe na śocasi
GE09ram_02_u:067.009c: pravrājya cīravasanaṃ kiṃ nu paśyasi kāraṇam
GE09ram_02_u:067.010a: lubdhāyā vidito manye na te 'haṃ rāghavaṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:067.010c: tathā hy anartho rājyārthaṃ tvayā nīto mahān ayam
GE09ram_02_u:067.012a: taṃ hi nityaṃ mahārājo balavantaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:067.013c: damyo dhuram ivāsādya saheyaṃ kena caujasā
