GE09ram_02_u:067.014a: atha vā me bhavec chaktir yogair buddhibalena vā
GE09ram_02_u:067.014c: sakāmāṃ na kariṣyāmi tvām ahaṃ putragardhinīm
GE09ram_02_u:067.015a: ity evam uktvā bharato mahātmā; priyetarair vākyagaṇais tudaṃs tām
GE09ram_02_u:067.015c: śokāturaś cāpi nanāda bhūyaḥ; siṃho yathā parvatagahvarasthaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:068.001a: tāṃ tathā garhayitvā tu mātaraṃ bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:068.002c: parityaktā ca dharmeṇa mā mṛtaṃ rudatī bhava
GE09ram_02_u:068.003a: kiṃ nu te 'dūṣayad rājā rāmo vā bhṛśadhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:068.003c: yayor mṛtyur vivāsaś ca tvatkṛte tulyam āgatau
GE09ram_02_u:068.004c: kaikeyi narakaṃ gaccha mā ca bhartuḥ salokatām
GE09ram_02_u:068.005a: yat tvayā hīdṛśaṃ pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ ghoreṇa karmaṇā
GE09ram_02_u:068.006a: tvatkṛte me pitā vṛtto rāmaś cāraṇyam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:068.008a: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca yāś cānyā mama mātaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:068.009a: na tvam aśvapateḥ kanyā dharmarājasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:068.010a: yat tvayā dhārmiko rāmo nityaṃ satyaparāyaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:068.010c: vanaṃ prasthāpito duḥkhāt pitā ca tridivaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:068.011a: yat pradhānāsi tat pāpaṃ mayi pitrā vinākṛte
GE09ram_02_u:068.012c: kṛtvā kaṃ prāpsyase tv adya lokaṃ nirayagāminī
GE09ram_02_u:068.014c: tasmāt priyataro mātuḥ priyatvān na tu bāndhavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:068.016a: tāv ardhadivase śrāntau dṛṣṭvā putrau mahītale
GE09ram_02_u:068.019a: bhayaṃ kaccin na cāsmāsu kutaś cid vidyate mahat
GE09ram_02_u:068.019c: kuto nimittaḥ śokas te brūhi sarvahitaiṣiṇi
GE09ram_02_u:068.020a: evam uktā tu surabhiḥ surarājena dhīmatā
GE09ram_02_u:068.021a: śāntaṃ pātaṃ na vaḥ kiṃ cit kutaś cid amarādhipa
GE09ram_02_u:068.021c: ahaṃ tu magnau śocāmi svaputrau viṣame sthitau
GE09ram_02_u:068.023a: mama kāyāt prasūtau hi duḥkhitau bhāra pīḍitau
GE09ram_02_u:068.023c: yau dṛṣṭvā paritapye 'haṃ nāsti putrasamaḥ priyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:068.024a: yasyāḥ putra sahasrāṇi sāpi śocati kāmadhuk
GE09ram_02_u:068.024c: kiṃ punar yā vinā rāmaṃ kausalyā vartayiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:068.025a: ekaputrā ca sādhvī ca vivatseyaṃ tvayā kṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:068.025c: tasmāt tvaṃ satataṃ duḥkhaṃ pretya ceha ca lapsyase
GE09ram_02_u:068.026a: ahaṃ hy apacitiṃ bhrātuḥ pituś ca sakalām imām
GE09ram_02_u:068.026c: vardhanaṃ yaśasaś cāpi kariṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:068.028c: papāta bhuvi saṃkruddho niḥśvasann iva pannagaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:068.029c: babhūva bhūmau patito nṛpātmajaḥ; śacīpateḥ ketur ivotsavakṣaye
GE09ram_02_u:069.001c: kausalyā śabdam ājñāya sumitrām idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:069.002c: tam ahaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi bharataṃ dīrghadarśinam
GE09ram_02_u:069.003a: evam uktvā sumitrāṃ sā vivarṇā malināmbarā
GE09ram_02_u:069.005a: tataḥ śatrughna bharatau kausalyāṃ prekṣya duḥkhitau
GE09ram_02_u:069.006c: idaṃ te rājyakāmasya rājyaṃ prāptam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:069.006e: saṃprāptaṃ bata kaikeyyā śīghraṃ krūreṇa karmaṇā
GE09ram_02_u:069.007c: kaikeyī kaṃ guṇaṃ tatra paśyati krūradarśinī
GE09ram_02_u:069.008a: kṣipraṃ mām api kaikeyī prasthāpayitum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:069.010a: kāmaṃ vā svayam evādya tatra māṃ netum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:069.010c: yatrāsau puruṣavyāghras tapyate me tapaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:069.012a: evaṃ vilapamānāṃ tāṃ bharataḥ prāñjalis tadā
GE09ram_02_u:069.013a: ārye kasmād ajānantaṃ garhase mām akilbiṣam
GE09ram_02_u:069.013c: vipulāṃ ca mama prītiṃ sthirāṃ jānāsi rāghave
GE09ram_02_u:069.014a: kṛtā śāstrānugā buddhir mā bhūt tasya kadā cana
GE09ram_02_u:069.015a: praiṣyaṃ pāpīyasāṃ yātu sūryaṃ ca prati mehatu
GE09ram_02_u:069.015c: hantu pādena gāṃ suptāṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:069.016a: kārayitvā mahat karma bhartā bhṛtyam anarthakam
GE09ram_02_u:069.016c: adharmo yo 'sya so 'syās tu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:069.017c: tatas tu druhyatāṃ pāpaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:069.019a: saṃśrutya ca tapasvibhyaḥ satre vai yajñadakṣiṇām
GE09ram_02_u:069.020c: mā sma kārṣīt satāṃ dharmaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:069.022a: pāyasaṃ kṛsaraṃ chāgaṃ vṛthā so 'śnātu nirghṛṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:069.023a: putrair dāraiś ca bhṛtyaiś ca svagṛhe parivāritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:069.023c: sa eko mṛṣṭam aśnātu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:069.024c: bhṛtyatyāge ca yat pāpaṃ tat pāpaṃ pratipadyatām
GE09ram_02_u:069.025a: ubhe saṃdhye śayānasya yat pāpaṃ parikalpyate
GE09ram_02_u:069.025c: tac ca pāpaṃ bhavet tasya yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:069.026a: yad agnidāyake pāpaṃ yat pāpaṃ gurutalpage
GE09ram_02_u:069.026c: mitradrohe ca yat pāpaṃ tat pāpaṃ pratipadyatām
GE09ram_02_u:069.027a: devatānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca mātā pitros tathaiva ca
GE09ram_02_u:069.027c: mā sma kārṣīt sa śuśrūṣāṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:069.028a: satāṃ lokāt satāṃ kīrtyāḥ sajjuṣṭāt karmaṇas tathā
GE09ram_02_u:069.029c: evam āśvasayann eva duḥkhārto nipapāta ha
GE09ram_02_u:069.030a: tathā tu śapathaiḥ kaṣṭaiḥ śapamānam acetanam
GE09ram_02_u:069.031a: mama duḥkham idaṃ putra bhūyaḥ samupajāyate
GE09ram_02_u:069.031c: śapathaiḥ śapamāno hi prāṇān uparuṇatsi me
GE09ram_02_u:069.032a: diṣṭyā na calito dharmād ātmā te sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:069.032c: vatsa satyapratijño me satāṃ lokān avāpsyasi
GE09ram_02_u:069.033c: mohāc ca śokasaṃrodhād babhūva lulitaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:069.034c: muhur muhur niḥśvasataś ca dīrghaṃ; sā tasya śokena jagāma rātriḥ
GE09ram_02_u:070.001c: uvāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭho vasiṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhavāg ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:070.002a: alaṃ śokena bhadraṃ te rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:070.003a: vasiṣṭhasya vacaḥ śrutvā bharato dhāraṇāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:070.004a: uddhṛtaṃ tailasaṃkledāt sa tu bhūmau niveśitam
GE09ram_02_u:070.006a: kiṃ te vyavasitaṃ rājan proṣite mayy anāgate
GE09ram_02_u:070.006c: vivāsya rāmaṃ dharmajñaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_02_u:070.007a: kva yāsyasi mahārāja hitvemaṃ duḥkhitaṃ janam
GE09ram_02_u:070.008a: yogakṣemaṃ tu te rājan ko 'smin kalpayitā pure
GE09ram_02_u:070.008c: tvayi prayāte svas tāta rāme ca vanam āśrite
GE09ram_02_u:070.009a: vidhavā pṛthivī rājaṃs tvayā hīnā na rājate
GE09ram_02_u:070.010c: abravīd vacanaṃ bhūyo vasiṣṭhas tu mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:070.013a: ye tv agrato narendrasya agny agārād bahiṣkṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:070.013c: ṛtvigbhir yājakaiś caiva te hriyante yathāvidhi
GE09ram_02_u:070.015a: hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:070.015c: prakiranto janā mārgaṃ nṛpater agrato yayuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:070.017a: gandhān uccāvacāṃś cānyāṃs tatra dattvātha bhūmipam
GE09ram_02_u:070.017c: tataḥ saṃveśayām āsuś citāmadhye tam ṛtvijaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:070.018a: tathā hutāśanaṃ hutvā jepus tasya tadartvijaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:070.018c: jaguś ca te yathāśāstraṃ tatra sāmāni sāmagāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:070.019a: śibikābhiś ca yānaiś ca yathārhaṃ tasya yoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:070.019c: nagarān niryayus tatra vṛddhaiḥ parivṛtās tadā
GE09ram_02_u:070.020a: prasavyaṃ cāpi taṃ cakrur ṛtvijo 'gnicitaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_02_u:070.020c: striyaś ca śokasaṃtaptāḥ kausalyā pramukhās tadā
GE09ram_02_u:070.021a: krauñcīnām iva nārīṇāṃ ninādas tatra śuśruve
GE09ram_02_u:070.022a: tato rudantyo vivaśā vilapya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:070.023a: kṛtodakaṃ te bharatena sārdhaṃ; nṛpāṅganā mantripurohitāś ca
GE09ram_02_u:070.023c: puraṃ praviśyāśruparītanetrā; bhūmau daśāhaṃ vyanayanta duḥkham
GE09ram_02_u:071.002a: brāhmaṇebhyo dadau ratnaṃ dhanam annaṃ ca puṣkalam
GE09ram_02_u:071.002c: bāstikaṃ bahuśuklaṃ ca gāś cāpi śataśas tathā
GE09ram_02_u:071.003a: dāsīdāsaṃ ca yānaṃ ca veśmāni sumahānti ca
GE09ram_02_u:071.005c: citāmūle pitur vākyam idam āha suduḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:071.006a: tāta yasmin niṣṛṣṭo 'haṃ tvayā bhrātari rāghave
GE09ram_02_u:071.006c: tasmin vanaṃ pravrajite śūnye tyakto 'smy ahaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:071.007c: tām ambāṃ tāta kausalyāṃ tyaktvā tvaṃ kva gato nṛpa
GE09ram_02_u:071.008c: pituḥ śarīra nirvāṇaṃ niṣṭanan viṣasāda ha
GE09ram_02_u:071.009a: sa tu dṛṣṭvā rudan dīnaḥ papāta dharaṇītale
GE09ram_02_u:071.009c: utthāpyamānaḥ śakrasya yantra dhvaja iva cyutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:071.012c: smṛtvā pitur guṇāṅgāni tāni tāni tadā tadā
GE09ram_02_u:071.014a: sukumāraṃ ca bālaṃ ca satataṃ lālitaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:071.014c: kva tāta bharataṃ hitvā vilapantaṃ gato bhavān
GE09ram_02_u:071.015a: nanu bhojyeṣu pāneṣu vastreṣv ābharaṇeṣu ca
GE09ram_02_u:071.015c: pravārayasi naḥ sarvāṃs tan naḥ ko 'dya kariṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:071.017a: pitari svargam āpanne rāme cāraṇyam āśrite
GE09ram_02_u:071.017c: kiṃ me jīvita sāmarthyaṃ pravekṣyāmi hutāśanam
GE09ram_02_u:071.018a: hīno bhrātrā ca pitrā ca śūnyām ikṣvākupālitām
GE09ram_02_u:071.019a: tayor vilapitaṃ śrutvā vyasanaṃ cānvavekṣya tat
GE09ram_02_u:071.020a: tato viṣaṇṇau śrāntau ca śatrughna bharatāv ubhau
GE09ram_02_u:071.021a: tataḥ prakṛtimān vaidyaḥ pitur eṣāṃ purohitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:071.021c: vasiṣṭho bharataṃ vākyam utthāpya tam uvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:071.025c: amātyās tvarayanti sma tanayau cāparāḥ kriyāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:072.002a: gatir yaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ duḥkhe kiṃ punar ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:072.002c: sa rāmaḥ sattva saṃpannaḥ striyā pravrājito vanam
GE09ram_02_u:072.003a: balavān vīrya saṃpanno lakṣmaṇo nāma yo 'py asau
GE09ram_02_u:072.003c: kiṃ na mocayate rāmaṃ kṛtvāpi pitṛnigraham
GE09ram_02_u:072.004a: pūrvam eva tu nigrāhyaḥ samavekṣya nayānayau
GE09ram_02_u:072.004c: utpathaṃ yaḥ samārūḍho nāryā rājā vaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:072.007a: tāṃ samīkṣya tadā dvāḥstho bhṛśaṃ pāpasya kāriṇīm
GE09ram_02_u:072.008a: yasyāḥ kṛte vane rāmo nyastadehaś ca vaḥ pitā
GE09ram_02_u:072.008c: seyaṃ pāpā nṛśaṃsā ca tasyāḥ kuru yathāmati
GE09ram_02_u:072.009a: śatrughnaś ca tad ājñāya vacanaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:072.010a: tīvram utpāditaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ me tathā pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:072.010c: yayā seyaṃ nṛśaṃsasya karmaṇaḥ phalam aśnutām
GE09ram_02_u:072.011a: evam uktā ca tenāśu sakhī janasamāvṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:072.011c: gṛhītā balavat kubjā sā tadgṛham anādayat
GE09ram_02_u:072.012a: tataḥ subhṛśa saṃtaptas tasyāḥ sarvaḥ sakhījanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:072.014a: sānukrośāṃ vadānyāṃ ca dharmajñāṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_02_u:072.014c: kausalyāṃ śaraṇaṃ yāmaḥ sā hi no 'stu dhruvā gatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:072.015a: sa ca roṣeṇa tāmrākṣaḥ śatrughnaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:072.016a: tasyā hy ākṛṣyamāṇāyā mantharāyās tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:072.016c: citraṃ bahuvidhaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ pṛthivyāṃ tad vyaśīryata
GE09ram_02_u:072.017c: aśobhata tadā bhūyaḥ śāradaṃ gaganaṃ yathā
GE09ram_02_u:072.018a: sa balī balavat krodhād gṛhītvā puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:072.019a: tair vākyaiḥ paruṣair duḥkhaiḥ kaikeyī bhṛśaduḥkhitā
GE09ram_02_u:072.020a: tāṃ prekṣya bharataḥ kruddhaṃ śatrughnam idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:072.021a: hanyām aham imāṃ pāpāṃ kaikeyīṃ duṣṭacāriṇīm
GE09ram_02_u:072.021c: yadi māṃ dhārmiko rāmo nāsūyen mātṛghātakam
GE09ram_02_u:072.022a: imām api hatāṃ kubjāṃ yadi jānāti rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:072.022c: tvāṃ ca māṃ caiva dharmātmā nābhibhāṣiṣyate dhruvam
GE09ram_02_u:072.023c: nyavartata tato roṣāt tāṃ mumoca ca mantharām
GE09ram_02_u:072.024a: sā pādamūle kaikeyyā mantharā nipapāta ha
GE09ram_02_u:072.025c: śanaiḥ samāśvāsayad ārtarūpāṃ; krauñcīṃ vilagnām iva vīkṣamāṇām
GE09ram_02_u:073.002a: gato daśarathaḥ svargaṃ yo no gurutaro guruḥ
GE09ram_02_u:073.002c: rāmaṃ pravrājya vai jyeṣṭhaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam
GE09ram_02_u:073.003a: tvam adya bhava no rājā rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:073.004c: pratīkṣate tvāṃ svajanaḥ śreṇayaś ca nṛpātmaja
GE09ram_02_u:073.006c: bharatas taṃ janaṃ sarvaṃ pratyuvāca dhṛtavrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:073.007a: jyeṣṭhasya rājatā nityam ucitā hi kulasya naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:073.007c: naivaṃ bhavanto māṃ vaktum arhanti kuśalā janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:073.008a: rāmaḥ pūrvo hi no bhrātā bhaviṣyati mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:073.008c: ahaṃ tv araṇye vatsyāmi varṣāṇi nava pañca ca
GE09ram_02_u:073.009c: ānayiṣyāmy ahaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaraṃ rāghavaṃ vanāt
GE09ram_02_u:073.011c: āneṣyāmi tu vai rāmaṃ havyavāham ivādhvarāt
GE09ram_02_u:073.012a: na sakāmā kariṣyāmi svam imāṃ mātṛgandhinīm
GE09ram_02_u:073.012c: vane vatsyāmy ahaṃ durge rāmo rājā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:073.013a: kriyatāṃ śilpibhiḥ panthāḥ samāni viṣamāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:073.015a: evaṃ te bhāṣamāṇasya padmā śrīr upatiṣṭhatām
GE09ram_02_u:073.015c: yas tvaṃ jyeṣṭhe nṛpasute pṛthivīṃ dātum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:073.016a: anuttamaṃ tad vacanaṃ nṛpātmaja; prabhāṣitaṃ saṃśravaṇe niśamya ca
GE09ram_02_u:073.016c: praharṣajās taṃ prati bāṣpabindavo; nipetur āryānananetrasaṃbhavāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:073.017a: ūcus te vacanam idaṃ niśamya hṛṣṭāḥ; sāmātyāḥ sapariṣado viyātaśokāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:073.017c: panthānaṃ naravarabhaktimāñ janaś ca; vyādiṣṭas tava vacanāc ca śilpivargaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:074.003c: samarthā ye ca draṣṭāraḥ puratas te pratasthire
GE09ram_02_u:074.004a: sa tu harṣāt tam uddeśaṃ janaugho vipulaḥ prayān
GE09ram_02_u:074.006a: latāvallīś ca gulmāṃś ca sthāṇūn aśmana eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:074.006c: janās te cakrire mārgaṃ chindanto vividhān drumān
GE09ram_02_u:074.007a: avṛkṣeṣu ca deśeṣu ke cid vṛkṣān aropayan
GE09ram_02_u:074.007c: ke cit kuṭhāraiṣ ṭaṅkaiś ca dātraiś chindan kva cit kva cit
GE09ram_02_u:074.008c: vidhamanti sma durgāṇi sthalāni ca tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:074.009c: nimnabhāgāṃs tathā ke cit samāṃś cakruḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:074.010a: babandhur bandhanīyāṃś ca kṣodyān saṃcukṣudus tadā
GE09ram_02_u:074.010c: bibhidur bhedanīyāṃś ca tāṃs tān deśān narās tadā
GE09ram_02_u:074.015a: yo niveśas tv abhipreto bharatasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:074.015c: bhūyas taṃ śobhayām āsur bhūṣābhir bhūṣaṇopamam
GE09ram_02_u:074.021c: narendramārgaḥ sa tathā vyarājata; krameṇa ramyaḥ śubhaśilpinirmitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:075.002c: dadhmuḥ śaṅkhāṃś ca śataśo vādyāṃś coccāvacasvarān
GE09ram_02_u:075.003a: sa tūrya ghoṣaḥ sumahān divam āpūrayann iva
GE09ram_02_u:075.004a: tato prabuddho bharatas taṃ ghoṣaṃ saṃnivartya ca
GE09ram_02_u:075.004c: nāhaṃ rājeti cāpy uktvā śatrughnam idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:075.005c: visṛjya mayi duḥkhāni rājā daśaratho gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:075.007a: ity evaṃ bharataṃ prekṣya vilapantaṃ vicetanam
GE09ram_02_u:075.007c: kṛpaṇaṃ ruruduḥ sarvāḥ sasvaraṃ yoṣitas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:075.011c: kṣipram ānayatāvyagrāḥ kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ hi naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:075.012c: rathair aśvair gajaiś cāpi janānām upagacchatām
GE09ram_02_u:075.014c: daśarathasutaśobhitā sabhā; sadaśaratheva babhau yathā purā
GE09ram_02_u:076.003a: rājñas tu prakṛtīḥ sarvāḥ samagrāḥ prekṣya dharmavit
GE09ram_02_u:076.003c: idaṃ purohito vākyaṃ bharataṃ mṛdu cābravīt
GE09ram_02_u:076.004a: tāta rājā daśarathaḥ svargato dharmam ācaran
GE09ram_02_u:076.004c: dhana dhānyavatīṃ sphītāṃ pradāya pṛthivīṃ tava
GE09ram_02_u:076.005a: rāmas tathā satyadhṛtiḥ satāṃ dharmam anusmaran
GE09ram_02_u:076.005c: nājahāt pitur ādeśaṃ śaśī jyotsnām ivoditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:076.006a: pitrā bhrātrā ca te dattaṃ rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:076.007a: udīcyāś ca pratīcyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca kevalāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:076.010c: dharme prayatamānasya ko rājyaṃ madvidho haret
GE09ram_02_u:076.011c: rājyaṃ cāhaṃ ca rāmasya dharmaṃ vaktum ihārhasi
GE09ram_02_u:076.012c: labdhum arhati kākutstho rājyaṃ daśaratho yathā
GE09ram_02_u:076.013a: anāryajuṣṭam asvargyaṃ kuryāṃ pāpam ahaṃ yadi
GE09ram_02_u:076.014a: yad dhi mātrā kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ nāhaṃ tad abhirocaye
GE09ram_02_u:076.015a: rāmam evānugacchāmi sa rājā dvipadāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:076.015c: trayāṇām api lokānāṃ rāghavo rājyam arhati
GE09ram_02_u:076.016a: tad vākyaṃ dharmasaṃyuktaṃ śrutvā sarve sabhāsadaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:076.017a: yadi tv āryaṃ na śakṣyāmi vinivartayituṃ vanāt
GE09ram_02_u:076.017c: vane tatraiva vatsyāmi yathāryo lakṣmaṇas tathā
GE09ram_02_u:076.019a: evam uktvā tu dharmātmā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:076.020a: tūrṇam utthāya gaccha tvaṃ sumantra mama śāsanāt
GE09ram_02_u:076.020c: yātrām ājñāpaya kṣipraṃ balaṃ caiva samānaya
GE09ram_02_u:076.021a: evam uktaḥ sumantras tu bharatena mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:076.021c: prahṛṣṭaḥ so 'diśat sarvaṃ yathā saṃdiṣṭam iṣṭavat
GE09ram_02_u:076.022a: tāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ prakṛtayo balādhyakṣā balasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:076.023a: tato yodhāṅganāḥ sarvā bhartṝn sarvān gṛhegṛhe
GE09ram_02_u:076.023c: yātrā gamanam ājñāya tvarayanti sma harṣitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:076.024a: te hayair gorathaiḥ śīghraiḥ syandanaiś ca manojavaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:076.024c: saha yodhair balādhyakṣā balaṃ sarvam acodayan
GE09ram_02_u:076.025a: sajjaṃ tu tad balaṃ dṛṣṭvā bharato gurusaṃnidhau
GE09ram_02_u:076.027a: sa rāghavaḥ satyadhṛtiḥ pratāpavān; bruvan suyuktaṃ dṛḍhasatyavikramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:076.027c: guruṃ mahāraṇyagataṃ yaśasvinaṃ; prasādayiṣyan bharato 'bravīt tadā
GE09ram_02_u:076.028a: tūṇa samutthāya sumantra gaccha; balasya yogāya balapradhānān
GE09ram_02_u:076.028c: ānetum icchāmi hi taṃ vanasthaṃ; prasādya rāmaṃ jagato hitāya
GE09ram_02_u:076.029a: sa sūtaputro bharatena samyag; ājñāpitaḥ saṃparipūrṇakāmaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:076.029c: śaśāsa sarvān prakṛtipradhānān; balasya mukhyāṃś ca suhṛjjanaṃ ca
GE09ram_02_u:076.030a: tataḥ samutthāya kule kule te; rājanyavaiśyā vṛṣalāś ca viprāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:076.030c: ayūyujann uṣṭrarathān kharāṃś ca; nāgān hayāṃś caiva kulaprasūtān
GE09ram_02_u:077.006a: kaikeyī ca sumitrā ca kausalyā ca yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:077.007c: tasyaiva ca kathāś citrāḥ kurvāṇā hṛṣṭamānasāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:077.009a: dṛṣṭa eva hi naḥ śokam apaneṣyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:077.009c: tamaḥ sarvasya lokasya samudyann iva bhāskaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:077.010a: ity evaṃ kathayantas te saṃprahṛṣṭāḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:077.011a: ye ca tatrāpare sarve saṃmatā ye ca naigamāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:077.011c: rāmaṃ prati yayur hṛṣṭāḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:077.012a: maṇi kārāś ca ye ke cit kumbhakārāś ca śobhanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:077.015c: śailūṣāś ca saha strībhir yānti kaivartakās tathā
GE09ram_02_u:077.017c: sarve te vividhair yānaiḥ śanair bharatam anvayuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:077.019a: nirīkṣyānugatāṃ senāṃ tāṃ ca gaṅgāṃ śivodakām
GE09ram_02_u:077.021a: dātuṃ ca tāvad icchāmi svar gatasya mahīpateḥ
GE09ram_02_u:077.022c: nyaveśayaṃs tāṃś chandena svena svena pṛthakpṛthak
GE09ram_02_u:077.023a: niveśya gaṅgām anu tāṃ mahānadīṃ; camūṃ vidhānaiḥ paribarha śobhinīm
GE09ram_02_u:077.023c: uvāsa rāmasya tadā mahātmano; vicintayāno bharato nivartanam
GE09ram_02_u:078.001a: tato niviṣṭāṃ dhvajinīṃ gaṅgām anvāśritāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:078.003a: sa eṣa hi mahākāyaḥ kovidāradhvajo rathe
GE09ram_02_u:078.003c: bandhayiṣyati vā dāśān atha vāsmān vadhiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:078.004a: atha dāśarathiṃ rāmaṃ pitrā rājyād vivāsitam
GE09ram_02_u:078.005a: bhartā caiva sakhā caiva rāmo dāśarathir mama
GE09ram_02_u:078.006a: tiṣṭhantu sarvadāśāś ca gaṅgām anvāśritā nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:078.007a: nāvāṃ śatānāṃ pañcānāṃ kaivartānāṃ śataṃ śatam
GE09ram_02_u:078.008a: yadā tuṣṭas tu bharato rāmasyeha bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:078.008c: seyaṃ svastimayī senā gaṅgām adya tariṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:078.010a: tam āyāntaṃ tu saṃprekṣya sūtaputraḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_02_u:078.011c: kuśalo daṇḍakāraṇye vṛddho bhrātuś ca te sakhā
GE09ram_02_u:078.012a: tasmāt paśyatu kākutstha tvāṃ niṣādādhipo guhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:078.013a: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sumantrād bharataḥ śubham
GE09ram_02_u:078.013c: uvāca vacanaṃ śīghraṃ guhaḥ paśyatu mām iti
GE09ram_02_u:078.014c: āgamya bharataṃ prahvo guho vacanam abravīit
GE09ram_02_u:078.015a: niṣkuṭaś caiva deśo 'yaṃ vañcitāś cāpi te vayam
GE09ram_02_u:078.015c: nivedayāmas te sarve svake dāśakule vasa
GE09ram_02_u:078.016a: asti mūlaṃ phalaṃ caiva niṣādaiḥ samupāhṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:078.016c: ārdraṃ ca māṃsaṃ śuṣkaṃ ca vanyaṃ coccāvacaṃ mahat
GE09ram_02_u:078.017c: arcito vividhaiḥ kāmaiḥ śvaḥ sasainyo gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:079.001a: evam uktas tu bharato niṣādādhipatiṃ guham
GE09ram_02_u:079.002a: ūrjitaḥ khalu te kāmaḥ kṛto mama guroḥ sakhe
GE09ram_02_u:079.002c: yo me tvam īdṛśīṃ senām eko 'bhyarcitum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:079.003a: ity uktvā tu mahātejā guhaṃ vacanam uttamam
GE09ram_02_u:079.007c: iyaṃ te mahatī senā śaṅkāṃ janayatīva me
GE09ram_02_u:079.008a: tam evam abhibhāṣantam ākāśa iva nirmalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:079.008c: bharataḥ ślakṣṇayā vācā guhaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:079.009a: mā bhūt sa kālo yat kaṣṭaṃ na māṃ śaṅkitum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:079.009c: rāghavaḥ sa hi me bhrātā jyeṣṭhaḥ pitṛsamo mama
GE09ram_02_u:079.010c: buddhir anyā na te kāryā guha satyaṃ bravīmi te
GE09ram_02_u:079.011c: punar evābravīd vākyaṃ bharataṃ prati harṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:079.012a: dhanyas tvaṃ na tvayā tulyaṃ paśyāmi jagatītale
GE09ram_02_u:079.012c: ayatnād āgataṃ rājyaṃ yas tvaṃ tyaktum ihecchasi
GE09ram_02_u:079.013a: śāśvatī khalu te kīrtir lokān anucariṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:079.013c: yas tvaṃ kṛcchragataṃ rāmaṃ pratyānayitum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:079.015a: saṃniveśya sa tāṃ senāṃ guhena paritoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:079.015c: śatrughnena saha śrīmāñ śayanaṃ punar āgamat
GE09ram_02_u:079.021a: guhena sārdhaṃ bharataḥ samāgato; mahānubhāvaḥ sajanaḥ samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:079.021c: sudurmanās taṃ bharataṃ tadā punar; guhaḥ samāśvāsayad agrajaṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:080.002c: bhrātṛ guptyartham atyantam ahaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravam
GE09ram_02_u:080.003a: iyaṃ tāta sukhā śayyā tvadartham upakalpitā
GE09ram_02_u:080.004a: ucito 'yaṃ janaḥ sarve duḥkhānāṃ tvaṃ sukhocitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:080.005a: na hi rāmāt priyataro mamāsti bhuvi kaś cana
GE09ram_02_u:080.005c: motsuko bhūr bravīmy etad apy asatyaṃ tavāgrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:080.006a: asya prasādād āśaṃse loke 'smin sumahad yaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:080.006c: dharmāvāptiṃ ca vipulām arthāvāptiṃ ca kevalām
GE09ram_02_u:080.007a: so 'haṃ priyasakhaṃ rāmaṃ śayānaṃ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:080.007c: rakṣiṣyāmi dhanuṣpāṇiḥ sarvaiḥ svair jñātibhiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:080.008a: na hi me 'viditaṃ kiṃ cid vane 'smiṃś carataḥ sadā
GE09ram_02_u:080.008c: caturaṅgaṃ hy api balaṃ prasahema vayaṃ yudhi
GE09ram_02_u:080.010a: kathaṃ dāśarathau bhūmau śayāne saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:080.010c: śakyā nidrāmayā labdhuṃ jīvitaṃ vā sukhāni vā
GE09ram_02_u:080.011a: yo na devāsuraiḥ sarvaiḥ śakyaḥ prasahituṃ yudhi
GE09ram_02_u:080.011c: taṃ paśya guha saṃviṣṭaṃ tṛṇeṣu saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:080.012a: mahatā tapasā labdho vividhaiś ca pariśramaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:080.013a: asmin pravrājite rājā na ciraṃ vartayiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:080.013c: vidhavā medinī nūnaṃ kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:080.015a: kausalyā caiva rājā ca tathaiva jananī mama
GE09ram_02_u:080.015c: nāśaṃse yadi te sarve jīveyuḥ śarvarīm imām
GE09ram_02_u:080.016a: jīved api hi me mātā śatrughnasyānvavekṣayā
GE09ram_02_u:080.016c: duḥkhitā yā tu kausalyā vīrasūr vinaśiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:080.017c: rājye rāmam anikṣipya pitā me vinaśiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:080.018a: siddhārthāḥ pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ tasmin kāle hy upasthite
GE09ram_02_u:080.022c: nivṛtte samaye hy asmin sukhitāḥ praviśemahi
GE09ram_02_u:080.024a: prabhāte vimale sūrye kārayitvā jaṭā ubhau
GE09ram_02_u:080.024c: asmin bhāgīrathī tīre sukhaṃ saṃtāritau mayā
GE09ram_02_u:080.025c: vareṣucāpāsidharau paraṃtapau; vyavekṣamāṇau saha sītayā gatau
GE09ram_02_u:081.001a: guhasya vacanaṃ śrutvā bharato bhṛśam apriyam
GE09ram_02_u:081.001c: dhyānaṃ jagāma tatraiva yatra tac chrutam apriyam
GE09ram_02_u:081.003c: papāta sahasā totrair hṛdi viddha iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:081.005a: tataḥ sarvāḥ samāpetur mātaro bharatasya tāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:081.006a: tāś ca taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau rudantyaḥ paryavārayan
GE09ram_02_u:081.007a: vatsalā svaṃ yathā vatsam upagūhya tapasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:081.008a: putravyādhir na te kaccic charīraṃ paribādhate
GE09ram_02_u:081.009a: tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā putra jīvāmi rāme sabhrātṛke gate
GE09ram_02_u:081.009c: vṛtte daśarathe rājñi nātha ekas tvam adya naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:081.010a: kaccin na lakṣmaṇe putra śrutaṃ te kiṃ cid apriyam
GE09ram_02_u:081.010c: putra vā hy ekaputrāyāḥ sahabhārye vanaṃ gate
GE09ram_02_u:081.011a: sa muhūrtaṃ samāśvasya rudann eva mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:081.012a: bhrātā me kvāvasad rātriṃ kva sītā kva ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:081.012c: asvapac chayane kasmin kiṃ bhuktvā guha śaṃsa me
GE09ram_02_u:081.013c: yad vidhaṃ pratipede ca rāme priyahite 'tithau
GE09ram_02_u:081.014a: annam uccāvacaṃ bhakṣyāḥ phalāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:081.015c: na hi tat pratyagṛhṇāt sa kṣatradharmam anusmaran
GE09ram_02_u:081.016a: na hy asmābhiḥ pratigrāhyaṃ sakhe deyaṃ tu sarvadā
GE09ram_02_u:081.016c: iti tena vayaṃ rājann anunītā mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:081.018a: tatas tu jalaśeṣeṇa lakṣmaṇo 'py akarot tadā
GE09ram_02_u:081.018c: vāg yatās te trayaḥ saṃdhyām upāsata samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:081.019a: saumitris tu tataḥ paścād akarot svāstaraṃ śubham
GE09ram_02_u:081.019c: svayam ānīya barhīṃṣi kṣipraṃ rāghava kāraṇāt
GE09ram_02_u:081.020a: tasmin samāviśad rāmaḥ svāstare saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:081.020c: prakṣālya ca tayoḥ pādāv apacakrāma lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:081.021a: etat tad iṅgudīmūlam idam eva ca tat tṛṇam
GE09ram_02_u:081.021c: yasmin rāmaś ca sītā ca rātriṃ tāṃ śayitāv ubhau
GE09ram_02_u:081.022a: niyamya pṛṣṭhe tu talāṅgulitravāñ; śaraiḥ supūrṇāv iṣudhī paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:081.022c: mahad dhanuḥ sajyam upohya lakṣmaṇo; niśām atiṣṭhat parito 'sya kevalam
GE09ram_02_u:081.023a: tatas tv ahaṃ cottamabāṇacāpadhṛk; sthito 'bhavaṃ tatra sa yatra lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:081.023c: atandribhir jñātibhir āttakārmukair; mahendrakalpaṃ paripālayaṃs tadā
GE09ram_02_u:082.001a: tac chrutvā nipuṇaṃ sarvaṃ bharataḥ saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:082.002a: abravīj jananīḥ sarvā iha tena mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:082.002c: śarvarī śayitā bhūmāv idam asya vimarditam
GE09ram_02_u:082.003c: jāto daśarathenorvyāṃ na rāmaḥ svaptum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:082.009a: aśraddheyam idaṃ loke na satyaṃ pratibhāti mā
GE09ram_02_u:082.009c: muhyate khalu me bhāvaḥ svapno 'yam iti me matiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:082.010a: na nūnaṃ daivataṃ kiṃ cit kālena balavattaram
GE09ram_02_u:082.010c: yatra dāśarathī rāmo bhūmāv evaṃ śayīta saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:082.011c: dayitā śayitā bhūmau snuṣā daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:082.012a: iyaṃ śayyā mama bhrātur idaṃ hi parivartitam
GE09ram_02_u:082.012c: sthaṇḍile kaṭhine sarvaṃ gātrair vimṛditaṃ tṛṇam
GE09ram_02_u:082.013a: manye sābharaṇā suptā sītāsmiñ śayane tadā
GE09ram_02_u:082.013c: tatra tatra hi dṛśyante saktāḥ kanakabindavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:082.014c: tathā hy ete prakāśante saktāḥ kauśeyatantavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:082.015a: manye bhartuḥ sukhā śayyā yena bālā tapasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:082.015c: sukumārī satī duḥkhaṃ na vijānāti maithilī
GE09ram_02_u:082.017c: sukhabhāgī ca duḥkhārhaḥ śayito bhuvi rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:082.018a: siddhārthā khalu vaidehī patiṃ yānugatā vanam
GE09ram_02_u:082.018c: vayaṃ saṃśayitāḥ sarve hīnās tena mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:082.019c: gate daśarathe svarge rāme cāraṇyam āśrite
GE09ram_02_u:082.020a: na ca prārthayate kaś cin manasāpi vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_02_u:082.023a: adya prabhṛti bhūmau tu śayiṣye 'haṃ tṛṇeṣu vā
GE09ram_02_u:082.024a: tasyārtham uttaraṃ kālaṃ nivatsyāmi sukhaṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:082.024c: taṃ pratiśravam āmucya nāsya mithyā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:082.025c: lakṣmaṇena saha tv āryo ayodhyāṃ pālayiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:082.026c: api me devatāḥ kuryur imaṃ satyaṃ manoratham
GE09ram_02_u:082.027a: prasādyamānaḥ śirasā mayā svayaṃ; bahuprakāraṃ yadi na prapatsyate
GE09ram_02_u:082.027c: tato 'nuvatsyāmi cirāya rāghavaṃ; vane vasan nārhati mām upekṣitum
GE09ram_02_u:083.001a: vyuṣya rātriṃ tu tatraiva gaṅgākūle sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:083.001c: bharataḥ kālyam utthāya śatrughnam idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:083.002c: śīghram ānaya bhadraṃ te tārayiṣyati vāhinīm
GE09ram_02_u:083.003c: ity evam abravīd bhrātrā śatrughno 'pi pracoditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:083.004c: āgamya prāñjaliḥ kāle guho bharatam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:083.005c: kaccic ca saha sainyasya tava sarvam anāmayam
GE09ram_02_u:083.006a: guhasya tat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā snehād udīritam
GE09ram_02_u:083.007a: sukhā naḥ śarvarī rājan pūjitāś cāpi te vayam
GE09ram_02_u:083.007c: gaṅgāṃ tu naubhir bahvībhir dāśāḥ saṃtārayantu naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:083.009a: uttiṣṭhata prabudhyadhvaṃ bhadram astu hi vaḥ sadā
GE09ram_02_u:083.010c: pañca nāvāṃ śatāny eva samāninyuḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:083.013a: tām āruroha bharataḥ śatrughnaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:083.013c: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca yāś cānyā rājayoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:083.014a: purohitaś ca tat pūrvaṃ gurave brāhmaṇāś ca ye
GE09ram_02_u:083.016a: patākinyas tu tā nāvaḥ svayaṃ dāśair adhiṣṭhitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:083.016c: vahantyo janam ārūḍhaṃ tadā saṃpetur āśugāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:083.017a: nārīṇām abhipūrṇās tu kāś cit kāś cit tu vājinām
GE09ram_02_u:083.017c: kaś cit tatra vahanti sma yānayugyaṃ mahādhanam
GE09ram_02_u:083.018a: tāḥ sma gatvā paraṃ tīram avaropya ca taṃ janam
GE09ram_02_u:083.019c: tarantaḥ sma prakāśante sadhvajā iva parvatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:083.020a: nāvaś cāruruhus tv anye plavais terus tathāpare
GE09ram_02_u:083.020c: anye kumbhaghaṭais terur anye teruś ca bāhubhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:083.021a: sā puṇyā dhvajinī gaṅgāṃ dāśaiḥ saṃtāritā svayam
GE09ram_02_u:083.022a: āśvāsayitvā ca camūṃ mahātmā; niveśayitvā ca yathopajoṣam
GE09ram_02_u:083.022c: draṣṭuṃ bharadvājam ṛṣipravaryam; ṛtvig vṛtaḥ san bharataḥ pratasthe
GE09ram_02_u:084.001c: balaṃ sarvam avasthāpya jagāma saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:084.004c: saṃcacālāsanāt tūrṇaṃ śiṣyān arghyam iti bruvan
GE09ram_02_u:084.006a: tābhyām arghyaṃ ca pādyaṃ ca dattvā paścāt phalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:084.006c: ānupūrvyāc ca dharmajñaḥ papraccha kuśalaṃ kule
GE09ram_02_u:084.007a: ayodhyāyāṃ bale kośe mitreṣv api ca mantriṣu
GE09ram_02_u:084.007c: jānan daśarathaṃ vṛttaṃ na rājānam udāharat
GE09ram_02_u:084.010a: kim ihāgamane kāryaṃ tava rājyaṃ praśāsataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:084.010c: etad ācakṣva me sarvaṃ na hi me śudhyate manaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:084.011c: bhrātrā saha sabhāryo yaś ciraṃ pravrājito vanam
GE09ram_02_u:084.013a: kaccin na tasyāpāpasya pāpaṃ kartum ihecchasi
GE09ram_02_u:084.014a: evam ukto bharadvājaṃ bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:084.015a: hato 'smi yadi mām evaṃ bhagavān api manyate
GE09ram_02_u:084.015c: matto na doṣam āśaṅker naivaṃ mām anuśādhi hi
GE09ram_02_u:084.016a: aṃś caitad iṣṭaṃ mātā me yad avocan madantare
GE09ram_02_u:084.016c: nāham etena tuṣṭaś ca na tad vacanam ādade
GE09ram_02_u:084.017a: ahaṃ tu taṃ naravyāghram upayātaḥ prasādakaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:084.018a: tvaṃ mām evaṃ gataṃ matvā prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:084.018c: śaṃsa me bhagavan rāmaḥ kva saṃprati mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:084.019a: uvāca taṃ bharadvājaḥ prasādād bharataṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:084.020a: jāne caitan manaḥsthaṃ te dṛḍhīkaraṇam astv iti
GE09ram_02_u:084.021a: asau vasati te bhrātā citrakūṭe mahāgirau
GE09ram_02_u:084.021c: śvas tu gantāsi taṃ deśaṃ vasādya saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:084.021e: etaṃ me kuru suprājña kāmaṃ kāmārthakovida
GE09ram_02_u:084.022a: tatas tathety evam udāradarśanaḥ; pratītarūpo bharato 'bravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:084.022c: cakāra buddhiṃ ca tadā mahāśrame; niśānivāsāya narādhipātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.001a: kṛtabuddhiṃ nivāsāya tathaiva sa munis tadā
GE09ram_02_u:085.002a: abravīd bharatas tv enaṃ nanv idaṃ bhavatā kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:085.002c: pādyam arghyaṃ tathātithyaṃ vane yad ūpapadyate
GE09ram_02_u:085.003c: jāne tvāṃ prīti saṃyuktaṃ tuṣyes tvaṃ yena kena cit
GE09ram_02_u:085.004a: senāyās tu tavaitasyāḥ kartum icchāmi bhojanam
GE09ram_02_u:085.004c: mama pritir yathā rūpā tvam arho manujarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:085.005a: kimarthaṃ cāpi nikṣipya dūre balam ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.007a: vāji mukhyā manuṣyāś ca mattāś ca vara vāraṇāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.007c: pracchādya mahatīṃ bhūmiṃ bhagavann anuyānti mām
GE09ram_02_u:085.008a: te vṛkṣān udakaṃ bhūmim āśrameṣūṭajāṃs tathā
GE09ram_02_u:085.008c: na hiṃsyur iti tenāham eka evāgatas tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.009c: tathā tu cakre bharataḥ senāyāḥ samupāgamam
GE09ram_02_u:085.011a: āhvaye viśvakarmāṇam ahaṃ tvaṣṭāram eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:085.011c: ātithyaṃ kartum icchāmi tatra me saṃvidhīyatām
GE09ram_02_u:085.012a: prāk srotasaś ca yā nadyaḥ pratyak srotasa eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:085.012c: pṛthivyām antarikṣe ca samāyāntv adya sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.013a: anyāḥ sravantu maireyaṃ surām anyāḥ suniṣṭhitām
GE09ram_02_u:085.015c: śakraṃ yāś copatiṣṭhanti brahmāṇaṃ yāś ca bhāminīḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.016a: vanaṃ kuruṣu yad divyaṃ vāso bhūṣaṇapatravat
GE09ram_02_u:085.016c: divyanārīphalaṃ śaśvat tat kauberam ihaiva tu
GE09ram_02_u:085.017a: iha me bhagavān somo vidhattām annam uttamam
GE09ram_02_u:085.017c: bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca coṣyaṃ ca lehyaṃ ca vividhaṃ bahu
GE09ram_02_u:085.018c: surādīni ca peyāni māṃsāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:085.021c: upaspṛśya vavau yuktyā supriyātmā sukhaḥ śivaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.024a: sa śabdo dyāṃ ca bhūmiṃ ca prāṇināṃ śravaṇāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:085.025a: tasminn uparate śabde divye śrotrasukhe nṛṇām
GE09ram_02_u:085.026a: babhūva hi samā bhūmiḥ samantāt pañcayojanam
GE09ram_02_u:085.027a: tasmin bilvāḥ kapitthāś ca panasā bījapūrakāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.027c: āmalakyo babhūvuś ca cūtāś ca phalabhūṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.028c: ājagāma nadī divyā tīrajair bahubhir vṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:085.034a: anujagmuś ca taṃ sarve mantriṇaḥ sapurohitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.034c: babhūvuś ca mudā yuktā taṃ dṛṣṭvā veśma saṃvidhim
GE09ram_02_u:085.035a: tatra rājāsanaṃ divyaṃ vyajanaṃ chatram eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:085.037c: tataḥ senāpatiḥ paścāt praśāstā ca niṣedatuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.039c: ramyāś cāvasathā divyā brahmaṇas tu prasādajāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.042a: yābhir gṛhītaḥ puruṣaḥ sonmāda iva lakṣyate
GE09ram_02_u:085.045a: yāni mālyāni deveṣu yāni caitrarathe vane
GE09ram_02_u:085.046a: bilvā mārdaṅgikā āsañ śamyā grāhā bibhītakāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.048a: śiṃśapāmalakī jambūr yāś cānyāḥ kānane latāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.049a: surāṃ surāpāḥ pibata pāyasaṃ ca bubhukśitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.049c: māṃsani ca sumedhyāni bhakṣyantāṃ yāvad icchatha
GE09ram_02_u:085.050c: apy ekam ekaṃ puruṣaṃ pramadāḥ satpa cāṣṭa ca
GE09ram_02_u:085.052a: hayān gajān kharān uṣṭrāṃs tathaiva surabheḥ sutān
GE09ram_02_u:085.052c: ikṣūṃś ca madhujālāṃś ca bhojayanti sma vāhanān
GE09ram_02_u:085.056c: anāthās taṃ vidhiṃ labdhvā vācam etām udairayan
GE09ram_02_u:085.057a: saṃprahṛṣṭā vinedus te narās tatra sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.058a: tato bhuktavatāṃ teṣāṃ tad annam amṛtopamam
GE09ram_02_u:085.058c: divyān udvīkṣya bhakṣyāṃs tān abhavad bhakṣaṇe matiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.059a: preṣyāś ceṭyaś ca vadhvaś ca balasthāś cāpi sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.059c: babhūvus te bhṛśaṃ tṛptāḥ sarve cāhatavāsasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.060a: kuñjarāś ca kharoṣṭraś ca go'śvāś ca mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.060c: babhūvuḥ subhṛtās tatra nānyo hy anyam akalpayat
GE09ram_02_u:085.061c: rajasā dhvastakeśo vā naraḥ kaś cid adṛśyata
GE09ram_02_u:085.063c: dadṛśur vismitās tatra narā lauhīḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.064c: tāś ca kāmadughā gāvo drumāś cāsan madhuścyutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.065a: vāpyo maireya pūrṇāś ca mṛṣṭamāṃsacayair vṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.066c: sthālyaḥ kumbhyaḥ karambhyaś ca dadhipūrṇāḥ susaṃskṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.067a: hradāḥ pūrṇā rasālasya dadhnaḥ śvetasya cāpare
GE09ram_02_u:085.068a: kalkāṃś cūrṇakaṣāyāṃś ca snānāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:085.070a: darpaṇān parimṛṣṭāṃś ca vāsasāṃ cāpi saṃcayān
GE09ram_02_u:085.071a: āñjanīḥ kaṅkatān kūrcāṃś chatrāṇi ca dhanūṃṣi ca
GE09ram_02_u:085.072c: avagāhya sutīrthāṃś ca hradān sotpala puṣkarān
GE09ram_02_u:085.073c: nirvāpārthaṃ paśūnāṃ te dadṛśus tatra sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.074a: vyasmayanta manuṣyās te svapnakalpaṃ tad adbhutam
GE09ram_02_u:085.075a: ity evaṃ ramamāṇānāṃ devānām iva nandane
GE09ram_02_u:085.076a: pratijagmuś ca tā nadyo gandharvāś ca yathāgatam
GE09ram_02_u:085.076c: bharadvājam anujñāpya tāś ca sarvā varāṅganāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.077a: tathaiva mattā madirotkaṭā narās; tathaiva divyāgurucandanokṣitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:085.077c: tathaiva divyā vividhāḥ sraguttamāḥ; pṛthakprakīrṇā manujaiḥ pramarditāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:086.001a: tatas tāṃ rajanīm uṣya bharataḥ saparicchadaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:086.002a: tam ṛṣiḥ puruṣavyāghraṃ prekṣya prāñjalim āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:086.003a: kaccid atra sukhā rātris tavāsmadviṣaye gatā
GE09ram_02_u:086.003c: samagras te janaḥ kaccid ātithye śaṃsa me 'nagha
GE09ram_02_u:086.005c: tarpitaḥ sarvakāmaiś ca sāmātyo balavat tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:086.006c: api preṣyān upādāya sarve sma susukhoṣitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:086.008c: ācakṣva katamo mārgaḥ kiyān iti ca śaṃsa me
GE09ram_02_u:086.011a: uttaraṃ pārśvam āsādya tasya mandākinī nadī
GE09ram_02_u:086.012a: anantaraṃ tat saritaś citrakūṭaś ca parvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:086.012c: tato parṇakuṭī tāta tatra tau vasato dhruvam
GE09ram_02_u:086.014a: prayāṇam iti ca śrutvā rājarājasya yoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:086.015a: vepamānā kṛśā dīnā saha devyā sumantriyā
GE09ram_02_u:086.015c: kausalyā tatra jagrāha karābhyāṃ caraṇau muneḥ
GE09ram_02_u:086.018c: viśeṣaṃ jñātum icchāmi mātṝṇāṃ tava rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:086.019a: evam uktas tu bharato bharadvājena dhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:086.020a: yām imāṃ bhagavan dīnāṃ śokān aśanakarśitām
GE09ram_02_u:086.020c: pitur hi mahiṣīṃ devīṃ devatām iva paśyasi
GE09ram_02_u:086.021c: kausalyā suṣuve rāmaṃ dhātāram aditir yathā
GE09ram_02_u:086.022a: asyā vāmabhujaṃ śliṣṭā yaiṣā tiṣṭhati durmanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:086.023a: etasyās tau sutau devyāḥ kumārau devavarṇinau
GE09ram_02_u:086.024a: yasyāḥ kṛte narayāghrau jīvanāśam ito gatau
GE09ram_02_u:086.024c: rājā putravihīnaś ca svargaṃ daśaratho gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:086.025e: yatomūlaṃ hi paśyāmi vyasanaṃ mahad ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:086.026c: sa niśaśvāsa tāmrākṣo kruddho nāga ivāsakṛt
GE09ram_02_u:086.027a: bharadvājo maharṣis taṃ bruvantaṃ bharataṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:086.029a: abhivādya tu saṃsiddhaḥ kṛtvā cainaṃ pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_02_u:086.029c: āmantrya bharataḥ sainyaṃ yujyatām ity acodayat
GE09ram_02_u:086.032a: vividhāny api yānāni mahāni ca laghūni ca
GE09ram_02_u:086.036c: mahad vanaṃ tat pravigāhamānā; rarāja senā bharatasya tatra
GE09ram_02_u:087.002a: ṛkṣāḥ pṛṣatasaṃghāś ca ruravaś ca samantataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:087.002c: dṛśyante vanarājīṣu giriṣv api nadīṣu ca
GE09ram_02_u:087.004c: mahīṃ saṃchādayām āsa prāvṛṣi dyām ivāmbudaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:087.005c: anālakṣyā ciraṃ kālaṃ tasmin kāle babhūva bhūḥ
GE09ram_02_u:087.006a: sa yātvā dūram adhvānaṃ supariśrānta vāhanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:087.006c: uvāca bharataḥ śrīmān vasiṣṭhaṃ mantriṇāṃ varam
GE09ram_02_u:087.007a: yādṛśaṃ lakṣyate rūpaṃ yathā caiva śrutaṃ mayā
GE09ram_02_u:087.007c: vyaktaṃ prāptāḥ sma taṃ deśaṃ bharadvājo yam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:087.008a: ayaṃ giriś citrakūṭas tathā mandākinī nadī
GE09ram_02_u:087.011c: hayaiḥ samantād ākīrṇaṃ makarair iva sāgaram
GE09ram_02_u:087.015a: khurair udīrito reṇur divaṃ pracchādya tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_02_u:087.015c: taṃ vahaty anilaḥ śīghraṃ kurvann iva mama priyam
GE09ram_02_u:087.016c: etān saṃpatataḥ śīghraṃ paśya śatrughna kānane
GE09ram_02_u:087.018a: atimātram ayaṃ deśo manojñaḥ pratibhāti mā
GE09ram_02_u:087.019a: mṛgā mṛgībhiḥ sahitā bahavaḥ pṛṣatā vane
GE09ram_02_u:087.019c: manojña rūpā lakṣyante kusumair iva citritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:087.020a: sādhu sainyāḥ pratiṣṭhantāṃ vicinvantu ca kānanam
GE09ram_02_u:087.021c: viviśus tad vanaṃ śūrā dhūmaṃ ca dadṛśus tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:087.022a: te samālokya dhūmāgram ūcur bharatam āgatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:087.022c: nāmanuṣye bhavaty agnir vyaktam atraiva rāghavau
GE09ram_02_u:087.023c: anye rāmopamāḥ santi vyaktam atra tapasvinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:087.024a: tac chrutvā bharatas teṣāṃ vacanaṃ sādhu saṃmatam
GE09ram_02_u:087.025a: yat tā bhavantas tiṣṭhantu neto gantavyam agrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:087.025c: aham eva gamiṣyāmi sumantro gurur eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:087.026a: evam uktās tataḥ sarve tatra tasthuḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:087.026c: bharato yatra dhūmāgraṃ tatra dṛṣṭiṃ samādadhat
GE09ram_02_u:087.027a: vyavasthitā yā bharatena sā camūr; nirīkṣamāṇāpi ca dhūmam agrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:087.027c: babhūva hṛṣṭā nacireṇa jānatī; priyasya rāmasya samāgamaṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:088.001c: videhyāḥ priyamākāṅkṣan svaṃ ca cittaṃ vilobhayan
GE09ram_02_u:088.003a: na rājyād bhraṃśanaṃ bhadre na suhṛdbhir vinābhavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:088.003c: mano me bādhate dṛṣṭvā ramaṇīyam imaṃ girim
GE09ram_02_u:088.005a: ke cid rajatasaṃkāśāḥ ke cit kṣatajasaṃnibhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:088.006a: puṣyārkaketukābhāś ca ke cij jyotī rasaprabhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:088.010c: evamādibhir ākīrṇaḥ śriyaṃ puṣyaty ayaṃ giriḥ
GE09ram_02_u:088.012a: śākhāvasaktān khaḍgāṃś ca pravarāṇy ambarāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:088.013a: jalaprapātair udbhedair niṣyandaiś ca kva cit kva cit
GE09ram_02_u:088.013c: sravadbhir bhāty ayaṃ śailaḥ sravan mada iva dvipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:088.014c: ghrāṇatarpaṇam abhyetya kaṃ naraṃ na praharṣayet
GE09ram_02_u:088.015c: lakṣmaṇena ca vatsyāmi na māṃ śokaḥ pradhakṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:088.016c: vicitraśikhare hy asmin ratavān asmi bhāmini
GE09ram_02_u:088.017c: pituś cānṛṇatā dharme bharatasya priyaṃ tathā
GE09ram_02_u:088.018a: vaidehi ramase kaccic citrakūṭe mayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:088.019a: idam evāmṛtaṃ prāhū rājñāṃ rājarṣayaḥ pare
GE09ram_02_u:088.022a: ke cit kṣayanibhā deśāḥ ke cid udyānasaṃnibhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:088.022c: ke cid ekaśilā bhānti parvatasyāsya bhāmini
GE09ram_02_u:088.025c: kāmibhir vanite paśya phalāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:088.027a: imaṃ tu kālaṃ vanite vijahrivāṃs; tvayā ca sīte saha lakṣmaṇena ca
GE09ram_02_u:088.027c: ratiṃ prapatsye kuladharmavardhinīṃ; satāṃ pathi svair niyamaiḥ paraiḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:089.006c: ṛṣayas tv avagāhante nadīṃ mandākinīṃ priye
GE09ram_02_u:089.012c: adhikaṃ puravāsāc ca manye ca tava darśanāt
GE09ram_02_u:089.014a: sakhīvac ca vigāhasva sīte mandakinīm imām
GE09ram_02_u:089.015a: tvaṃ paurajanavad vyālān ayodhyām iva parvatam
GE09ram_02_u:089.015c: manyasva vanite nityaṃ sarayūvad imāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:089.016c: tvaṃ cānukūlā vaidehi prītiṃ janayatho mama
GE09ram_02_u:089.017c: nāyodhyāyai na rājyāya spṛhaye 'dya tvayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:089.018a: imāṃ hi ramyāṃ gajayūthalolitāṃ; nipītatoyāṃ gajasiṃhavānaraiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:089.018c: supuṣpitaiḥ puṣpadharair alaṃkṛtāṃ; na so 'sti yaḥ syān na gatakramaḥ sukhī
GE09ram_02_u:089.019a: itīva rāmo bahusaṃgataṃ vacaḥ; priyā sahāyaḥ saritaṃ prati bruvan
GE09ram_02_u:089.019c: cacāra ramyaṃ nayanāñjanaprabhaṃ; sa citrakūṭaṃ raghuvaṃśavardhanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:090.001c: sainya reṇuś ca śabdaś ca prādurāstāṃ nabhaḥ spṛśau
GE09ram_02_u:090.002a: etasminn antare trastāḥ śabdena mahatā tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:090.002c: arditā yūthapā mattāḥ sayūthā dudruvur diśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:090.003a: sa taṃ sainyasamudbhūtaṃ śabdaṃ śuśrava rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:090.003c: tāṃś ca vipradrutān sarvān yūthapān anvavaikṣata
GE09ram_02_u:090.004a: tāṃś ca vidravato dṛṣṭvā taṃ ca śrutvā sa niḥsvanam
GE09ram_02_u:090.005a: hanta lakṣmaṇa paśyeha sumitrā suprajās tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:090.006a: rājā vā rājamātro vā mṛgayām aṭate vane
GE09ram_02_u:090.006c: anyad vā śvāpadaṃ kiṃ cit saumitre jñātum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:090.006e: sarvam etad yathātattvam acirāj jñātum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:090.007a: sa lakṣmaṇaḥ saṃtvaritaḥ sālam āruhya puṣpitam
GE09ram_02_u:090.007c: prekṣamāṇo diśaḥ sarvāḥ pūrvāṃ diśam avaikṣata
GE09ram_02_u:090.009c: śaśaṃsa senāṃ rāmāya vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:090.010a: agniṃ saṃśamayatv āryaḥ sītā ca bhajatāṃ guhām
GE09ram_02_u:090.010c: sajyaṃ kuruṣva cāpaṃ ca śarāṃś ca kavacaṃ tathā
GE09ram_02_u:090.011a: taṃ rāmaḥ puruṣavyāghro lakṣmaṇaṃ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:090.012a: evam ukktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmāṇo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:090.012c: didhakṣann iva tāṃ senāṃ ruṣitaḥ pāvako yathā
GE09ram_02_u:090.013a: saṃpannaṃ rājyam icchaṃs tu vyaktaṃ prāpyābhiṣecanam
GE09ram_02_u:090.013c: āvāṃ hantuṃ samabhyeti kaikeyyā bharataḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:090.014a: eṣa vai sumahāñ śrīmān viṭapī saṃprakāśate
GE09ram_02_u:090.015a: bhajanty ete yathākāmam aśvān āruhya śīghragān
GE09ram_02_u:090.015c: ete bhrājanti saṃhṛṣṭā jagān āruhya sādinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:090.016c: api nau vaśam āgacchet kovidāradhvajo raṇe
GE09ram_02_u:090.017a: api drakṣyāmi bharataṃ yatkṛte vyasanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_02_u:090.017c: tvayā rāghava saṃprāptaṃ sītayā ca mayā tathā
GE09ram_02_u:090.018a: yannimittaṃ bhavān rājyāc cyuto rāghava śāśvatīm
GE09ram_02_u:090.018c: saṃprāpto 'yam arir vīra bharato vadhya eva me
GE09ram_02_u:090.019a: bharatasya vadhe doṣaṃ nāhaṃ paśyāmi rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:090.019c: pūrvāpakariṇāṃ tyāge na hy adharmo vidhīyate
GE09ram_02_u:090.020a: adya putraṃ hataṃ saṃkhye kaikeyī rājyakāmukā
GE09ram_02_u:090.020c: mayā paśyet suduḥkhārtā hastibhagnam iva drumam
GE09ram_02_u:090.022a: adyemaṃ saṃyataṃ krodham asatkāraṃ ca mānada
GE09ram_02_u:090.024c: śvāpadāḥ parikarṣantu narāś ca nihatān mayā
GE09ram_02_u:090.025c: sasainyaṃ bharataṃ hatvā bhaviṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:091.001c: rāmas tu parisāntvyātha vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:091.002a: kim atra dhanuṣā kāryam asinā vā sacarmaṇā
GE09ram_02_u:091.003a: prāptakālaṃ yad eṣo 'smān bharato draṣṭum icchati
GE09ram_02_u:091.003c: asmāsu manasāpy eṣa nāhitaṃ kiṃ cid ācaret
GE09ram_02_u:091.004a: vipriyaṃ kṛtapūrvaṃ te bharatena kadā na kim
GE09ram_02_u:091.004c: īdṛśaṃ vā bhayaṃ te 'dya bharataṃ yo 'tra śaṅkase
GE09ram_02_u:091.005a: na hi te niṣṭhuraṃ vācyo bharato nāpriyaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:091.005c: ahaṃ hy apriyam uktaḥ syāṃ bharatasyāpriye kṛte
GE09ram_02_u:091.006a: kathaṃ nu putrāḥ pitaraṃ hanyuḥ kasyāṃ cid āpadi
GE09ram_02_u:091.006c: bhrātā vā bhrātaraṃ hanyāt saumitre prāṇam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:091.007a: yadi rājyasya hetos tvam imāṃ vācaṃ prabhāṣase
GE09ram_02_u:091.007c: vakṣyāmi bharataṃ dṛṣṭvā rājyam asmai pradīyatām
GE09ram_02_u:091.008a: ucyamāno hi bharato mayā lakṣmaṇa tattvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:091.008c: rājyam asmai prayaccheti bāḍham ity eva vakṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:091.009a: tathokto dharmaśīlena bhrātrā tasya hite rataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:091.010a: vrīḍitaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:091.010c: eṣa manye mahābāhur ihāsmān draṣṭum āgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:091.013c: nāgaḥ śatruṃjayo nāma vṛddhas tātasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:091.014a: avatīrya tu sālāgrāt tasmāt sa samitiṃjayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:091.014c: lakṣmaṇaḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā tasthau rāmasya pārśvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:091.015a: bharatenātha saṃdiṣṭā saṃmardo na bhaved iti
GE09ram_02_u:091.017a: sā citrakūṭe bharatena senā; dharmaṃ puraskṛtya vidhūya darpam
GE09ram_02_u:092.001a: niveśya senāṃ tu vibhuḥ padbhyāṃ pādavatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:092.002a: niviṣṭa mātre sainye tu yathoddeśaṃ vinītavat
GE09ram_02_u:092.002c: bharato bhrātaraṃ vākyaṃ śatrughnam idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:092.003a: kṣipraṃ vanam idaṃ saumya narasaṃghaiḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:092.003c: lubdhaiś ca sahitair ebhis tvam anveṣitum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:092.004a: yāvan na rāmaṃ drakṣyāmi lakṣmaṇaṃ vā mahābalam
GE09ram_02_u:092.004c: vaidehīṃ vā mahābhāgāṃ na me śāntir bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:092.005a: yāvan na candrasaṃkāśaṃ drakṣyāmi śubham ānanam
GE09ram_02_u:092.005c: bhrātuḥ padmapalāśākṣaṃ na me śāntir bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:092.006a: yāvan na caraṇau bhrātuḥ pārthiva vyañjanānvitau
GE09ram_02_u:092.006c: śirasā dhārayiṣyāmi na me śāntir bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:092.007a: yāvan na rājye rājyārhaḥ pitṛpaitāmahe sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:092.010c: yad adhyāste mahātejā rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:092.011c: padbhyām eva mahātejāḥ praviveśa mahad vanam
GE09ram_02_u:092.013a: sa gireś citrakūṭasya sālam āsādya puṣpitam
GE09ram_02_u:092.014a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bharataḥ śrīmān mumoda sahabāndhavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:092.014c: atra rāma iti jñātvā gataḥ pāram ivāmbhasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:092.015a: sa citrakūṭe tu girau niśāmya; rāmāśramaṃ puṇyajanopapannam
GE09ram_02_u:092.015c: guhena sārdhaṃ tvarito jagāma; punar niveśyaiva camūṃ mahātmā
GE09ram_02_u:093.001a: niviṣṭāyāṃ tu senāyām utsuko bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:093.002a: ṛṣiṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ saṃdiśya mātṝr me śīghram ānaya
GE09ram_02_u:093.002c: iti taritam agre sa jāgama guruvatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:093.003a: sumantras tv api śatughnam adūrād anvapadyata
GE09ram_02_u:093.004c: bhrātuḥ parṇakuṭīṃ śrīmān uṭajaṃ ca dadarśa ha
GE09ram_02_u:093.005a: śālāyās tv agratas tasyā dadarśa bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:093.006a: dadarśa ca vane tasmin mahataḥ saṃcayān kṛtān
GE09ram_02_u:093.007a: gacchan eva mahābāhur dyutimān bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:093.007c: śatrughnaṃ cābravīd dhṛṣṭas tān amātyāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:093.008a: manye prāptāḥ sma taṃ deśaṃ bharadvājo yam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:093.008c: nātidūre hi manye 'haṃ nadīṃ mandākinīm itaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:093.009a: uccair baddhāni cīrāṇi lakṣmaṇena bhaved ayam
GE09ram_02_u:093.011a: yam evādhātum icchanti tāpasāḥ satataṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:093.012c: āryaṃ drakṣyāmi saṃhṛṣṭo maharṣim iva rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:093.013a: atha gatvā muhūrtaṃ tu citrakūṭaṃ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:093.013c: mandākinīm anuprāptas taṃ janaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:093.014c: janendro nirjanaṃ prāpya dhin me janma sajīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:093.015c: sarān kāmān parityajya vane vasati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:093.016c: rāmasya nipatiṣyāmi sītāyāś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:093.017a: evaṃ sa vilapaṃs tasmin vane daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:093.018c: viśālāṃ mṛdubhis tīrṇāṃ kuśair vedim ivādhvare
GE09ram_02_u:093.024a: nirīkṣya sa muhūrtaṃ tu dadarśa bharato gurum
GE09ram_02_u:093.030a: yaḥ saṃsadi prakṛtibhir bhaved yukta upāsitum
GE09ram_02_u:093.030c: vanyair mṛgair upāsīnaḥ so 'yam āste mamāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:093.031c: mṛgājine so 'yam iha pravaste dharmam ācaran
GE09ram_02_u:093.032a: adhārayad yo vividhāś citrāḥ sumanasas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:093.032c: so 'yaṃ jaṭābhāram imaṃ sahate rāghavaḥ katham
GE09ram_02_u:093.033a: yasya yajñair yathādiṣṭair yukto dharmasya saṃcayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:093.034c: malena tasyāṅgam idaṃ katham āryasya sevyate
GE09ram_02_u:093.035a: mannimittam idaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpto rāmaḥ sukhocitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:093.036c: pādāv aprāpya rāmasya papāta bharato rudan
GE09ram_02_u:093.037c: uktvāryeti sakṛd dīnaṃ punar novāca kiṃ cana
GE09ram_02_u:093.038a: bāṣpāpihita kaṇṭhaś ca prekṣya rāmaṃ yaśasvinam
GE09ram_02_u:093.039a: śatrughnaś cāpi rāmasya vavande caraṇau rudan
GE09ram_02_u:093.039c: tāv ubhau sa samāliṅgya rāmo 'py aśrūṇy avartayat
GE09ram_02_u:093.040a: tataḥ sumantreṇa guhena caiva; samīyatū rājasutāv araṇye
GE09ram_02_u:093.040c: divākaraś caiva niśākaraś ca; yathāmbare śukrabṛhaspatibhyām
GE09ram_02_u:093.041a: tān pārthivān vāraṇayūthapābhān; samāgatāṃs tatra mahaty araṇye
GE09ram_02_u:093.041c: vanaukasas te 'pi samīkṣya sarve 'py; aśrūṇy amuñcan pravihāya harṣam
GE09ram_02_u:094.001a: āghrāya rāmas taṃ mūrdhni pariṣvajya ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.002a: kva nu te 'bhūt pitā tāta yad araṇyaṃ tvam āgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.002c: na hi tvaṃ jīvatas tasya vanam āgantum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:094.003a: cirasya bata paśyāmi dūrād bharatam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:094.003c: duṣpratīkam araṇye 'smin kiṃ tāta vanam āgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.005a: sa kaccid brāhmaṇo vidvān dharmanityo mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.006a: tāta kaccic ca kausalyā sumitrā ca prajāvatī
GE09ram_02_u:094.006c: sukhinī kaccid āryā ca devī nandati kaikayī
GE09ram_02_u:094.008a: kaccid agniṣu te yukto vidhijño matimān ṛjuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.008c: hutaṃ ca hoṣyamāṇaṃ ca kāle vedayate sadā
GE09ram_02_u:094.009c: sudhanvānam upādhyāyaṃ kaccit tvaṃ tāta manyase
GE09ram_02_u:094.010a: kaccid ātma samāḥ śūrāḥ śrutavanto jitendriyāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.010c: kulīnāś ceṅgitajñāś ca kṛtās te tāta mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.011a: mantro vijayamūlaṃ hi rājñāṃ bhavati rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:094.012a: kaccin nidrāvaśaṃ naiṣi kaccit kāle vibudhyase
GE09ram_02_u:094.013a: kaccin mantrayase naikaḥ kaccin na bahubhiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:094.013c: kaccit te mantrito mantro rāṣṭraṃ na paridhāvati
GE09ram_02_u:094.014c: kṣipram ārabhase kartuṃ na dīrghayasi rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:094.015a: kaccit tu sukṛtāny eva kṛtarūpāṇi vā punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.015c: vidus te sarvakāryāṇi na kartavyāni pārthivāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.016a: kaccin na tarkair yuktvā vā ye cāpy aparikīrtitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.016c: tvayā vā tava vāmātyair budhyate tāta mantritam
GE09ram_02_u:094.017a: kaccit sahasrān mūrkhāṇām ekam icchasi paṇḍitam
GE09ram_02_u:094.017c: paṇḍito hy arthakṛcchreṣu kuryān niḥśreyasaṃ mahat
GE09ram_02_u:094.018a: sahasrāṇy api mūrkhāṇāṃ yady upāste mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.018c: atha vāpy ayutāny eva nāsti teṣu sahāyatā
GE09ram_02_u:094.019a: eko 'py amātyo medhāvī śūro dakṣo vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.019c: rājānaṃ rājamātraṃ vā prāpayen mahatīṃ śriyam
GE09ram_02_u:094.020a: kaccin mukhyā mahatsv eva madhyameṣu ca madhyamāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.020c: jaghanyāś ca jaghanyeṣu bhṛtyāḥ karmasu yojitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.021c: śreṣṭhāñ śreṣṭheṣu kaccit tvaṃ niyojayasi karmasu
GE09ram_02_u:094.022a: kaccit tvāṃ nāvajānanti yājakāḥ patitaṃ yathā
GE09ram_02_u:094.023c: śūram aiśvaryakāmaṃ ca yo na hanti sa vadhyate
GE09ram_02_u:094.024a: kaccid dhṛṣṭaś ca śūraś ca dhṛtimān matimāñ śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.024c: kulīnaś cānuraktaś ca dakṣaḥ senāpatiḥ kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.025a: balavantaś ca kaccit te mukhyā yuddhaviśāradāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.026a: ka cid balasya bhaktaṃ ca vetanaṃ ca yathocitam
GE09ram_02_u:094.027a: kālātikramaṇe hy eva bhakta vetanayor bhṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.027c: bhartuḥ kupyanti duṣyanti so 'narthaḥ sumahān smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.029c: yathoktavādī dūtas te kṛto bharata paṇḍitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.030a: kaccid aṣṭādaśāny eṣu svapakṣe daśa pañca ca
GE09ram_02_u:094.030c: tribhis tribhir avijñātair vetsi tīrthāni cārakaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.031a: kaccid vyapāstān ahitān pratiyātāṃś ca sarvadā
GE09ram_02_u:094.032a: kaccin na lokāyatikān brāhmaṇāṃs tāta sevase
GE09ram_02_u:094.032c: anartha kuśalā hy ete bālāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.033c: buddhimān vīkṣikīṃ prāpya nirarthaṃ pravadanti te
GE09ram_02_u:094.034a: vīrair adhyuṣitāṃ pūrvam asmākaṃ tāta pūrvakaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.039c: kaccij janapadaḥ sphītaḥ sukhaṃ vasati rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:094.040c: vārtāyāṃ saṃśritas tāta loko hi sukham edhate
GE09ram_02_u:094.041a: teṣāṃ guptiparīhāraiḥ kaccit te bharaṇaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:094.041c: rakṣyā hi rājñā dharmeṇa sarve viṣayavāsinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.042a: kaccit striyaḥ sāntvayasi kaccit tāś ca surakṣitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.042c: kaccin na śraddadhāsyāsāṃ kaccid guhyaṃ na bhāṣase
GE09ram_02_u:094.043a: kaccin nāga vanaṃ guptaṃ kuñjarāṇaṃ ca tṛpyasi
GE09ram_02_u:094.045a: āyas te vipulaḥ kaccit kaccid alpataro vyayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.045c: apātreṣu na te kaccit kośo gacchati rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:094.046c: yodheṣu mitravargeṣu kaccid gacchati te vyayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.047c: apṛṣṭaḥ śāstrakuśalair na lobhād badhyate śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.048a: gṛhītaś caiva pṛṣṭaś ca kāle dṛṣṭaḥ sakāraṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.048c: kaccin na mucyate coro dhanalobhān nararṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:094.049a: vyasane kaccid āḍhyasya dugatasya ca rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:094.051a: kaccid vṛdhāṃś ca bālāṃś ca vaidyamukhyāṃś ca rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:094.051c: dānena manasā vācā tribhir etair bubhūṣase
GE09ram_02_u:094.052a: kaccid gurūṃś ca vṛddhāṃś ca tāpasān devatātithīn
GE09ram_02_u:094.052c: caityāṃś ca sarvān siddhārthān brāhmaṇāṃś ca namasyasi
GE09ram_02_u:094.053a: kaccid arthena vā dharmaṃ dharmaṃ dharmeṇa vā punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:094.053c: ubhau vā prītilobhena kāmena na vibādhase
GE09ram_02_u:094.054a: kaccid arthaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca jayatāṃ vara
GE09ram_02_u:094.054c: vibhajya kāle kālajña sarvān bharata sevase
GE09ram_02_u:094.058c: kaccit tvaṃ varjayasy etān rājadoṣāṃś caturdaśa
GE09ram_02_u:094.059a: kaccit svādukṛtaṃ bhojyam eko nāśnāsi rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:095.001a: rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:095.001c: kiṃ me dharmād vihīnasya rājadharmaḥ kariṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:095.002c: jyeṣṭha putre sthite rājan na kanīyān bhaven nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:095.003a: sa samṛddhāṃ mayā sārdham ayodhyāṃ gaccha rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:095.004a: rājānaṃ mānuṣaṃ prāhur devatve saṃmato mama
GE09ram_02_u:095.005a: kekayasthe ca mayi tu tvayi cāraṇyam āśrite
GE09ram_02_u:095.005c: divam ārya gato rājā yāyajūkaḥ satāṃ mataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:095.006c: ahaṃ cāyaṃ ca śatrughnaḥ pūrvam eva kṛtodakau
GE09ram_02_u:095.007a: priyeṇa kila dattaṃ hi pitṛlokeṣu rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:095.007c: akṣayyaṃ bhavatīty āhur bhavāṃś caiva pituḥ priyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:095.008a: tāṃ śrutvā karuṇāṃ vācaṃ pitur maraṇasaṃhitām
GE09ram_02_u:095.009c: pragṛhya bāhū rāmo vai puṣpitāgro yathā drumaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:095.009e: vane paraśunā kṛttas tathā bhuvi papāta ha
GE09ram_02_u:095.010a: tathā hi patitaṃ rāmaṃ jagatyāṃ jagatīpatim
GE09ram_02_u:095.011c: rudantaḥ saha vaidehyā siṣicuḥ salilena vai
GE09ram_02_u:095.012a: sa tu saṃjñāṃ punar labdhvā netrābhyām āsram utsṛjan
GE09ram_02_u:095.013a: kiṃ nu tasya mayā kāryaṃ durjātena mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:095.013c: yo mṛto mama śokena na mayā cāpi saṃskṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:095.014a: aho bharata siddhārtho yena rājā tvayānagha
GE09ram_02_u:095.016c: ko nu śāsiṣyati punas tāte lokāntaraṃ gate
GE09ram_02_u:095.017a: purā prekṣya suvṛttaṃ māṃ pitā yāny āha sāntvayan
GE09ram_02_u:095.017c: vākyāni tāni śroṣyāmi kutaḥ karṇasukhāny aham
GE09ram_02_u:095.018a: evam uktvā sa bharataṃ bhāryām abhyetya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:095.019a: sīte mṛtas te śvaśuraḥ pitrā hīno 'si lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:095.020a: sāntvayitvā tu tāṃ rāmo rudantīṃ janakātmajām
GE09ram_02_u:095.020c: uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ tatra duḥkhito duḥkhitaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:095.022a: sītā purastād vrajatu tvam enām abhito vraja
GE09ram_02_u:095.022c: ahaṃ paścād gamiṣyāmi gatir hy eṣā sudāruṇā
GE09ram_02_u:095.023c: mṛdur dāntaś ca śāntaś ca rāme ca dṛḍha bhaktimān
GE09ram_02_u:095.024a: sumantras tair nṛpasutaiḥ sārdham āśvāsya rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:095.025a: te sutīrthāṃ tataḥ kṛcchrād upāgamya yaśasvinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:095.026c: siṣicus tūdakaṃ rājñe tata etad bhavatv iti
GE09ram_02_u:095.027c: diśaṃ yāmyām abhimukho rudan vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:095.028a: etat te rājaśārdūla vimalaṃ toyam akṣayam
GE09ram_02_u:095.029a: tato mandākinī tīrāt pratyuttīrya sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:095.029c: pituś cakāra tejasvī nivāpaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:095.030c: nyasya rāmaḥ suduḥkhārto rudan vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:095.031a: idaṃ bhuṅkṣva mahārājaprīto yad aśanā vayam
GE09ram_02_u:095.031c: yadannaḥ puruṣo bhavati tadannās tasya devatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:095.034a: teṣāṃ tu rudatāṃ śabdāt pratiśrutkābhavad girau
GE09ram_02_u:095.034c: bhrātṝṇāṃ saha vaidehyā siṃhānāṃ nardatām iva
GE09ram_02_u:095.035c: abruvaṃś cāpi rāmeṇa bharataḥ saṃgato dhruvam
GE09ram_02_u:095.035e: teṣām eva mahāñ śabdaḥ śocatāṃ pitaraṃ mṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:095.036a: atha vāsān parityajya taṃ sarve 'bhimukhāḥ svanam
GE09ram_02_u:095.036c: apy eka manaso jagmur yathāsthānaṃ pradhāvitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:095.037a: hayair anye gajair anye rathair anye svalaṃkṛtaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:095.037c: sukumārās tathaivānye padbhir eva narā yayuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:095.039a: bhrātṝṇāṃ tvaritās te tu draṣṭukāmāḥ samāgamam
GE09ram_02_u:095.041c: āvāsayanto gandhena jagmur anyad vanaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:095.043c: tathā puṃskokilāḥ krauñcā visaṃjñā bhejire diśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:095.044a: tena śabdena vitrastair ākāśaṃ pakṣibhir vṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:095.044c: manuṣyair āvṛtā bhūmir ubhayaṃ prababhau tadā
GE09ram_02_u:095.045c: paryaṣvajata dharmajñaḥ pitṛvan mātṛvac ca saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:095.046a: sa tatra kāṃś cit pariṣasvaje narān; narāś ca ke cit tu tam abhyavādayan
GE09ram_02_u:095.046c: cakāra sarvān savayasyabāndhavān; yathārham āsādya tadā nṛpātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:095.047a: tataḥ sa teṣāṃ rudatāṃ mahātmanāṃ; bhuvaṃ ca khaṃ cānuvinādayan svanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:095.047c: guhā girīṇāṃ ca diśaś ca saṃtataṃ; mṛdaṅgaghoṣapratimo viśuśruve
GE09ram_02_u:096.001a: vasiṣṭhaḥ purataḥ kṛtvā dārān daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:096.002a: rājapatnyaś ca gacchantyo mandaṃ mandākinīṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:096.003c: sumitrām abravīd dīnā yāś cānyā rājayoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:096.004a: idaṃ teṣām anāthānāṃ kliṣṭam akliṣṭa karmaṇām
GE09ram_02_u:096.004c: vane prāk kevalaṃ tīrthaṃ ye te nirviṣayī kṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:096.005a: itaḥ sumitre putras te sadā jalam atandritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:096.005c: svayaṃ harati saumitrir mama putrasya kāraṇāt
GE09ram_02_u:096.007a: taṃ bhūmau pitur ārtena nyastaṃ rāmeṇa vīkṣya sā
GE09ram_02_u:096.010a: caturantāṃ mahīṃ bhuktvā mahendra sadṛśo bhuvi
GE09ram_02_u:096.011a: ato duḥkhataraṃ loke na kiṃ cit pratibhāti mā
GE09ram_02_u:096.011c: yatra rāmaḥ pitur dadyād iṅgudīkṣodam ṛddhimān
GE09ram_02_u:096.012c: kathaṃ duḥkhena hṛdayaṃ na sphoṭati sahasradhā
GE09ram_02_u:096.013a: evam ārtāṃ sapatnyas tā jagmur āśvāsya tāṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:096.013c: dadṛśuś cāśrame rāmaṃ svargāc cyutam ivāmaram
GE09ram_02_u:096.015a: tāsāṃ rāmaḥ samutthāya jagrāha caraṇāñ śubhān
GE09ram_02_u:096.017a: saumitrir api tāḥ sarvā mātṝh saṃprekṣya duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:096.018a: yathā rāme tathā tasmin sarvā vavṛtire striyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:096.020a: tāṃ pariṣvajya duḥkhārtāṃ mātā duhitaraṃ yathā
GE09ram_02_u:096.021c: rāmapatnī kathaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃprāptā nirjane vane
GE09ram_02_u:096.022c: kāñcanaṃ rajasā dhvastaṃ kliṣṭaṃ candram ivāmbudaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:096.023a: mukhaṃ te prekṣya māṃ śoko dahaty agnir ivāśrayam
GE09ram_02_u:096.024c: pādāv āsādya jagrāha vasiṣṭhasya sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:096.025a: purohitasyāgnisamasya tasya vai; bṛhaspater indra ivāmarādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:096.025c: pragṛhya pādau susamṛddhatejasaḥ; sahaiva tenopaviveśa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:096.026a: tato jaghanyaṃ sahitaiḥ sa mantribhiḥ; purapradhānaiś ca sahaiva sainikaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:096.026c: janena dharmajñatamena dharmavān; upopaviṣṭo bharatas tadāgrajam
GE09ram_02_u:096.027a: upopaviṣṭas tu tadā sa vīryavāṃs; tapasviveṣeṇa samīkṣya rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:096.027c: śriyā jvalantaṃ bharataḥ kṛtāñjalir; yathā mahendraḥ prayataḥ prajāpatim
GE09ram_02_u:096.028a: kim eṣa vākyaṃ bharato 'dya rāghavaṃ; praṇamya satkṛtya ca sādhu vakṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:096.028c: itīva tasyāryajanasya tattvato; babhūva kautūhalam uttamaṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:096.029a: sa rāghavaḥ satyadhṛtiś ca lakṣmaṇo; mahānubhāvo bharataś ca dhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:096.029c: vṛtāḥ suhṛdbhiś ca virejur adhvare; yathā sadasyaiḥ sahitās trayo 'gnayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:097.001a: taṃ tu rāmaḥ samāśvāsya bhrātaraṃ guruvatsalam
GE09ram_02_u:097.002a: kim etad iccheyam ahaṃ śrotuṃ pravyāhṛtaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:097.002c: yasmāt tvam āgato deśam imaṃ cīrajaṭājinī
GE09ram_02_u:097.003c: hitvā rājyaṃ praviṣṭas tvaṃ tat sarvaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:097.004c: pragṛhya balavad bhūyaḥ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:097.005a: āryaṃ tātaḥ parityajya kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_02_u:097.006a: striyā niyuktaḥ kaikeyyā mama mātrā paraṃtapa
GE09ram_02_u:097.008a: tasya me dāsabhūtasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:097.009a: imāḥ prakṛtayaḥ sarvā vidhavā māturaś ca yāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:097.009c: tvat sakāśam anuprāptāḥ prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:097.010a: tadānupūrvyā yuktaṃ ca yuktaṃ cātmani mānada
GE09ram_02_u:097.010c: rājyaṃ prāpnuhi dharmeṇa sakāmān suhṛdaḥ kuru
GE09ram_02_u:097.011a: bhavatv avidhavā bhūmiḥ samagrā patinā tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:097.012a: ebhiś ca sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ śirasā yācito mayā
GE09ram_02_u:097.012c: bhrātuḥ śiṣyasya dāsasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:097.013a: tad idaṃ śāśvataṃ pitryaṃ sarvaṃ sacivamaṇḍalam
GE09ram_02_u:097.014c: rāmasya śirasā pādau jagrāha bharataḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:097.015a: taṃ mattam iva mātaṅgaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:097.016c: rājyahetoḥ kathaṃ pāpam ācaret tvadvidho janaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:097.017a: na doṣaṃ tvayi paśyāmi sūkṣmam apy ari sūdana
GE09ram_02_u:097.017c: na cāpi jananīṃ bālyāt tvaṃ vigarhitum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:097.018c: tāvad dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha jananyām api gauravam
GE09ram_02_u:097.019c: mātā pitṛbhyām ukto 'haṃ katham anyat samācare
GE09ram_02_u:097.021c: vyādiśya ca mahātejā divaṃ daśaratho gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:097.022a: sa ca pramāṇaṃ dharmātmā rājā lokagurus tava
GE09ram_02_u:097.022c: pitrā dattaṃ yathābhāgam upabhoktuṃ tvam arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:097.023c: upabhokṣye tv ahaṃ dattaṃ bhāgaṃ pitrā mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:097.024a: yad abravīn māṃ naralokasatkṛtaḥ; pitā mahātmā vibudhādhipopamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:097.024c: tad eva manye paramātmano hitaṃ; na sarvalokeśvarabhāvam avyayam
GE09ram_02_u:098.002c: mandākinyāṃ hutaṃ japyaṃ kṛtvā rāmam upāgaman
GE09ram_02_u:098.003a: tūṣṇīṃ te samupāsīnā na kaś cit kiṃ cid abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:098.004a: sāntvitā māmikā mātā dattaṃ rājyam idaṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:098.004c: tad dadāmi tavaivāhaṃ bhuṅkṣva rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:098.006c: anugantuṃ na śaktir me gatiṃ tava mahīpate
GE09ram_02_u:098.007a: sujīvaṃ nityaśas tasya yaḥ parair upajīvyate
GE09ram_02_u:098.007c: rāma tena tu durjīvaṃ yaḥ parān upajīvati
GE09ram_02_u:098.008a: yathā tu ropito vṛkṣaḥ puruṣeṇa vivardhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.009a: sa yadā puṣpito bhūtvā phalāni na vidarśayet
GE09ram_02_u:098.009c: sa tāṃ nānubhavet prītiṃ yasya hetoḥ prabhāvitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.010a: eṣopamā mahābāho tvam arthaṃ vettum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:098.010c: yadi tvam asmān ṛṣabho bhartā bhṛtyān na śādhi hi
GE09ram_02_u:098.011a: śreṇayas tvāṃ mahārāja paśyantv agryāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.013a: tasya sādhv ity amanyanta nāgarā vividhā janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.014a: tam evaṃ duḥkhitaṃ prekṣya vilapantaṃ yaśasvinam
GE09ram_02_u:098.017a: yathā phalānaṃ pakvānāṃ nānyatra patanād bhayam
GE09ram_02_u:098.017c: evaṃ narasya jātasya nānyatra maraṇād bhayam
GE09ram_02_u:098.019c: āyūṃṣi kṣapayanty āśu grīṣme jalam ivāṃśavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.020a: ātmānam anuśoca tvaṃ kim anyam anuśocasi
GE09ram_02_u:098.020c: āyus te hīyate yasya sthitasya ca gatasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:098.021a: sahaiva mṛtyur vrajati saha mṛtyur niṣīdati
GE09ram_02_u:098.021c: gatvā sudīrgham adhvānaṃ saha mṛtyur nivartate
GE09ram_02_u:098.022a: gātreṣu valayaḥ prāptāḥ śvetāś caiva śiroruhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.022c: jarayā puruṣo jīrṇaḥ kiṃ hi kṛtvā prabhāvayet
GE09ram_02_u:098.023a: nandanty udita āditye nandanty astam ite ravau
GE09ram_02_u:098.024a: hṛṣyanty ṛtumukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā navaṃ navam ihāgatam
GE09ram_02_u:098.025a: yathā kāṣṭhaṃ ca kāṣṭhaṃ ca sameyātāṃ mahārṇave
GE09ram_02_u:098.025c: sametya ca vyapeyātāṃ kālam āsādya kaṃ cana
GE09ram_02_u:098.026a: evaṃ bhāryāś ca putrāś ca jñātayaś ca vasūni ca
GE09ram_02_u:098.026c: sametya vyavadhāvanti dhruvo hy eṣāṃ vinābhavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.027a: nātra kaś cid yathā bhāvaṃ prāṇī samabhivartate
GE09ram_02_u:098.027c: tena tasmin na sāmarthyaṃ pretasyāsty anuśocataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.028a: yathā hi sārthaṃ gacchantaṃ brūyāt kaś cit pathi sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.028c: aham apy āgamiṣyāmi pṛṣṭhato bhavatām iti
GE09ram_02_u:098.029a: evaṃ pūrvair gato mārgaḥ pitṛpaitāmaho dhruvaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.029c: tam āpannaḥ kathaṃ śoced yasya nāsti vyatikramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.030c: ātmā sukhe niyoktavyaḥ sukhabhājaḥ prajāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.031a: dharmātmā sa śubhaiḥ kṛtsnaiḥ kratubhiś cāptadakṣiṇaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.031c: dhūtapāpo gataḥ svargaṃ pitā naḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.032c: arthādānāc ca dhārmeṇa pitā nas tridivaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.033a: iṣṭvā bahuvidhair yajñair bhogāṃś cāvāpya puṣkalān
GE09ram_02_u:098.033c: uttamaṃ cāyur āsādya svar gataḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.034a: sa jīrṇaṃ mānuṣaṃ dehaṃ parityajya pitā hi naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.035a: taṃ tu naivaṃ vidhaḥ kaś cit prājñaḥ śocitum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:098.036a: ete bahuvidhāḥ śokā vilāpa rudite tathā
GE09ram_02_u:098.037a: sa svastho bhava mā śoco yātvā cāvasa tāṃ purīm
GE09ram_02_u:098.037c: tathā pitrā niyukto 'si vaśinā vadatāmv vara
GE09ram_02_u:098.039a: na mayā śāsanaṃ tasya tyaktuṃ nyāyyam ariṃdama
GE09ram_02_u:098.039c: tat tvayāpi sadā mānyaṃ sa vai bandhuḥ sa naḥ pitā
GE09ram_02_u:098.040a: evam uktvā tu virate rāme vacanam arthavat
GE09ram_02_u:098.040c: uvāca bharataś citraṃ dhārmiko dhārmikaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.041a: ko hi syād īdṛśo loke yādṛśas tvam ariṃdama
GE09ram_02_u:098.041c: na tvāṃ pravyathayed duḥkhaṃ prītir vā na praharṣayet
GE09ram_02_u:098.042a: saṃmataś cāsi vṛddhānāṃ tāṃś ca pṛcchasi saṃśayān
GE09ram_02_u:098.042c: yathā mṛtas tathā jīvan yathāsati tathā sati
GE09ram_02_u:098.043a: yasyaiṣa buddhilābhaḥ syāt paritapyeta kena saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.043c: sa evaṃ vyasanaṃ prāpya na viṣīditum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:098.044c: sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī ca buddhimāṃś cāsi rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:098.045a: na tvām evaṃ guṇair yuktaṃ prabhavābhavakovidam
GE09ram_02_u:098.046a: proṣite mayi yat pāpaṃ mātrā matkāraṇāt kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:098.046c: kṣudrayā tad aniṣṭaṃ me prasīdatu bhavān mama
GE09ram_02_u:098.048c: jānan dharmam adharmiṣṭhaṃ kuryāṃ karma jugupsitam
GE09ram_02_u:098.049a: guruḥ kriyāvān vṛddhaś ca rājā pretaḥ piteti ca
GE09ram_02_u:098.049c: tātaṃ na parigarheyaṃ daivataṃ ceti saṃsadi
GE09ram_02_u:098.050a: ko hi dharmārthayor hīnam īdṛśaṃ karma kilbiṣam
GE09ram_02_u:098.050c: striyāḥ priyacikīrṣuḥ san kuryād dharmajña dharmavit
GE09ram_02_u:098.051c: rājñaivaṃ kurvatā loke pratyakṣā sā śrutiḥ kṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:098.052a: sādhv artham abhisaṃdhāya krodhān mohāc ca sāhasāt
GE09ram_02_u:098.052c: tātasya yad atikrāntaṃ pratyāharatu tad bhavān
GE09ram_02_u:098.053a: pitur hi samatikrāntaṃ putro yaḥ sādhu manyate
GE09ram_02_u:098.053c: tad apatyaṃ mataṃ loke viparītam ato 'nyathā
GE09ram_02_u:098.054a: tad apatyaṃ bhavān astu mā bhavān duṣkṛtaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.054c: abhipat tat kṛtaṃ karma loke dhīravigarhitam
GE09ram_02_u:098.055a: kaikeyīṃ māṃ ca tātaṃ ca suhṛdo bāndhavāṃś ca naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.055c: paurajānapadān sarvāṃs trātu sarvam idaṃ bhavān
GE09ram_02_u:098.056a: kva cāraṇyaṃ kva ca kṣātraṃ kva jaṭāḥ kva ca pālanam
GE09ram_02_u:098.056c: īdṛśaṃ vyāhataṃ karma na bhavān kartum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:098.057a: atha kleśajam eva tvaṃ dharmaṃ caritum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:098.057c: dharmeṇa caturo varṇān pālayan kleśam āpnuhi
GE09ram_02_u:098.058a: caturṇām āśramāṇāṃ hi gārhasthyaṃ śreṣṭham āśramam
GE09ram_02_u:098.058c: āhur dharmajña dharmajñās taṃ kathaṃ tyaktum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:098.059a: śrutena bālaḥ sthānena janmanā bhavato hy aham
GE09ram_02_u:098.059c: sa kathaṃ pālayiṣyāmi bhūmiṃ bhavati tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_02_u:098.060a: hīnabuddhiguṇo bālo hīnaḥ sthānena cāpy aham
GE09ram_02_u:098.060c: bhavatā ca vinā bhūto na vartayitum utsahe
GE09ram_02_u:098.061a: idaṃ nikhilam avyagraṃ pitryaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:098.063a: abhiṣiktas tvam asmābhir ayodhyāṃ pālane vraja
GE09ram_02_u:098.063c: vijitya tarasā lokān marudbhir iva vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.064a: ṛṇāni trīṇy apākurvan durhṛdaḥ sādhu nirdahan
GE09ram_02_u:098.064c: suhṛdas tarpayan kāmais tvam evātrānuśādhi mām
GE09ram_02_u:098.065c: adya bhītāḥ pālayantāṃ durhṛdas te diśo daśa
GE09ram_02_u:098.066a: ākrośaṃ mama mātuś ca pramṛjya puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:098.066c: adya tatra bhavantaṃ ca pitaraṃ rakṣa kilbiṣāt
GE09ram_02_u:098.067c: bāndhaveṣu ca sarveṣu bhūteṣv iva maheśvaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.068a: atha vā pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā vanam eva bhavān itaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.068c: gamiṣyati gamiṣyāmi bhavatā sārdham apy aham
GE09ram_02_u:098.069a: tathāpi rāmo bharatena tāmyata; prasādyamānaḥ śirasā mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.069c: na caiva cakre gamanāya sattvavān; matiṃ pitus tadvacane pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.070a: tad adbhutaṃ sthairyam avekṣya rāghave; samaṃ jano harṣam avāpa duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.070c: na yāty ayodhyām iti duḥkhito 'bhavat; sthirapratijñatvam avekṣya harṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.071a: tam ṛtvijo naigamayūthavallabhās; tathā visaṃjñāśrukalāś ca mātaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:098.071c: tathā bruvāṇaṃ bharataṃ pratuṣṭuvuḥ; praṇamya rāmaṃ ca yayācire saha
GE09ram_02_u:099.001a: punar evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu bharataṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:099.002a: upapannam idaṃ vākyaṃ yat tvam evam abhāṣathāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:099.003a: purā bhrātaḥ pitā naḥ sa mātaraṃ te samudvahan
GE09ram_02_u:099.004a: devāsure ca saṃgrāme jananyai tava pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:099.004c: saṃprahṛṣṭo dadau rājā varam ārādhitaḥ prabhuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:099.005a: tataḥ sā saṃpratiśrāvya tava mātā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:099.006a: tava rājyaṃ naravyāghra mama pravrājanaṃ tathā
GE09ram_02_u:099.006c: tac ca rājā tathā tasyai niyuktaḥ pradadau varam
GE09ram_02_u:099.007a: tena pitrāham apy atra niyuktaḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:099.008a: so 'haṃ vanam idaṃ prāpto nirjanaṃ lakṣmaṇānvitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:099.009a: bhavān api tathety eva pitaraṃ satyavādinam
GE09ram_02_u:099.010a: ṛṇān mocaya rājānaṃ matkṛte bharata prabhum
GE09ram_02_u:099.011a: śrūyate hi purā tāta śrutir gītā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:099.011c: gayena yajamānena gayeṣv eva pitṝn prati
GE09ram_02_u:099.012a: puṃ nāmnā narakād yasmāt pitaraṃ trāyate sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:099.012c: tasmāt putra iti proktaḥ pitṝn yat pāti vā sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:099.013c: teṣāṃ vai samavetānām api kaś cid gayāṃ vrajet
GE09ram_02_u:099.014c: tasmāt trāhi naraśreṣṭha pitaraṃ narakāt prabho
GE09ram_02_u:099.015c: śatrughna sahito vīra saha sarvair dvijātibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:099.016c: ābhyāṃ tu sahito rājan vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca
GE09ram_02_u:099.017a: tvaṃ rājā bhava bharata svayaṃ narāṇāṃ; vanyānām aham api rājarāṇ mṛgāṇām
GE09ram_02_u:099.017c: gaccha tvaṃ puravaram adya saṃprahṛṣṭaḥ; saṃhṛṣṭas tv aham api daṇḍakān pravekṣye
GE09ram_02_u:099.018a: chāyāṃ te dinakarabhāḥ prabādhamānaṃ; varṣatraṃ bharata karotu mūrdhni śītām
GE09ram_02_u:099.018c: eteṣām aham api kānanadrumāṇāṃ; chāyāṃ tām atiśayinīṃ sukhaṃ śrayiṣye
GE09ram_02_u:099.019a: śatrughnaḥ kuśalamatis tu te sahāyaḥ; saumitrir mama viditaḥ pradhānamitram
GE09ram_02_u:099.019c: catvāras tanayavarā vayaṃ narendraṃ; satyasthaṃ bharata carāma mā viṣādam
GE09ram_02_u:100.001c: uvāca rāmaṃ dharmajñaṃ dharmāpetam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:100.002a: sādhu rāghava mā bhūt te buddhir evaṃ nirarthakā
GE09ram_02_u:100.003a: kaḥ kasya puruṣo bandhuḥ kim āpyaṃ kasya kena cit
GE09ram_02_u:100.003c: yad eko jāyate jantur eka eva vinaśyati
GE09ram_02_u:100.004a: tasmān mātā pitā ceti rāma sajjeta yo naraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:100.004c: unmatta iva sa jñeyo nāsti kācid dhi kasya cit
GE09ram_02_u:100.005a: yathā grāmāntaraṃ gacchan naraḥ kaś cit kva cid vaset
GE09ram_02_u:100.006a: evam eva manuṣyāṇāṃ pitā mātā gṛhaṃ vasu
GE09ram_02_u:100.007a: pitryaṃ rājyaṃ samutsṛjya sa nārhati narottama
GE09ram_02_u:100.009c: vihara tvam ayodhyāyāṃ yathā śakras triviṣṭape
GE09ram_02_u:100.010a: na te kaś cid daśarataḥs tvaṃ ca tasya na kaś cana
GE09ram_02_u:100.010c: anyo rājā tvam anyaś ca tasmāt kuru yad ucyate
GE09ram_02_u:100.011a: gataḥ sa nṛpatis tatra gantavyaṃ yatra tena vai
GE09ram_02_u:100.011c: pravṛttir eṣā martyānāṃ tvaṃ tu mithyā vihanyase
GE09ram_02_u:100.012a: arthadharmaparā ye ye tāṃs tāñ śocāmi netarān
GE09ram_02_u:100.012c: te hi duḥkham iha prāpya vināśaṃ pretya bhejire
GE09ram_02_u:100.013a: aṣṭakā pitṛdaivatyam ity ayaṃ prasṛto janaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:100.013c: annasyopadravaṃ paśya mṛto hi kim aśiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:100.014a: yadi bhuktam ihānyena deham anyasya gacchati
GE09ram_02_u:100.014c: dadyāt pravasataḥ śrāddhaṃ na tat pathy aśanaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_02_u:100.015a: dānasaṃvananā hy ete granthā medhāvibhiḥ kṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:100.015c: yajasva dehi dīkṣasva tapas tapyasva saṃtyaja
GE09ram_02_u:100.016a: sa nāsti param ity eva kuru buddhiṃ mahāmate
GE09ram_02_u:100.016c: pratyakṣaṃ yat tad ātiṣṭha parokṣaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kuru
GE09ram_02_u:101.001a: jābāles tu vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaḥ satyātmanāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:101.002a: bhavān me priyakāmārthaṃ vacanaṃ yad ihoktavān
GE09ram_02_u:101.004c: cāritram eva vyākhyāti śuciṃ vā yadi vāśucim
GE09ram_02_u:101.005a: anārays tv ārya saṃkāśaḥ śaucād dhīnas tathā śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:101.007c: bahu maṃsyati māṃ loke durvṛttaṃ lokadūṣaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:101.008a: kasya yāsyāmy ahaṃ vṛttaṃ kena vā svargam āpnuyām
GE09ram_02_u:101.009a: kāmavṛttas tv ayaṃ lokaḥ kṛtsnaḥ samupavartate
GE09ram_02_u:101.009c: yadvṛttāḥ santi rājānas tadvṛttāḥ santi hi prajāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:101.010c: tasmāt satyātmakaṃ rājyaṃ satye lokaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:101.011a: ṛṣayaś caiva devāś ca satyam eva hi menire
GE09ram_02_u:101.011c: satyavādī hi loke 'smin paramaṃ gacchati kṣayam
GE09ram_02_u:101.012c: dharmaḥ satyaṃ paro loke mūlaṃ svargasya cocyate
GE09ram_02_u:101.013a: satyam eveśvaro loke satyaṃ padmā samāśritā
GE09ram_02_u:101.013c: satyamūlāni sarvāṇi satyān nāsti paraṃ padam
GE09ram_02_u:101.014a: dattam iṣṭaṃ hutaṃ caiva taptāni ca tapāṃsi ca
GE09ram_02_u:101.015a: ekaḥ pālayate lokam ekaḥ pālayate kulam
GE09ram_02_u:101.015c: majjaty eko hi niraya ekaḥ svarge mahīyate
GE09ram_02_u:101.016a: so 'haṃ pitur nideśaṃ tu kimarthaṃ nānupālaye
GE09ram_02_u:101.017a: naiva lobhān na mohād vā na cājñānāt tamo'nvitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:101.018c: naiva devā na pitaraḥ pratīcchantīti naḥ śrutam
GE09ram_02_u:101.019a: pratyagātmam imaṃ dharmaṃ satyaṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:101.020a: kṣātraṃ dharmam ahaṃ tyakṣye hy adharmaṃ dharmasaṃhitam
GE09ram_02_u:101.020c: kṣudraur nṛśaṃsair lubdhaiś ca sevitaṃ pāpakarmabhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:101.021a: kāyena kurute pāpaṃ manasā saṃpradhārya ca
GE09ram_02_u:101.021c: anṛtaṃ jihvayā cāha trividhaṃ karma pātakam
GE09ram_02_u:101.022a: bhūmiḥ kīrtir yaśo lakṣmīḥ puruṣaṃ prārthayanti hi
GE09ram_02_u:101.022c: svargasthaṃ cānubadhnanti satyam eva bhajeta tat
GE09ram_02_u:101.023a: śreṣṭhaṃ hy anāryam eva syād yad bhavān avadhārya mām
GE09ram_02_u:101.023c: āha yuktikarair vākyair idaṃ bhadraṃ kuruṣva ha
GE09ram_02_u:101.024a: kathaṃ hy ahaṃ pratijñāya vanavāsam imaṃ guroḥ
GE09ram_02_u:101.024c: bharatasya kariṣyāmi vaco hitvā guror vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:101.026c: mūlaiḥ puṣpaiḥ phalaiḥ puṇyaiḥ pitṝn devāṃś ca tarpayan
GE09ram_02_u:101.028a: karmabhūmim imāṃ prāpya kartavyaṃ karma yac chubham
GE09ram_02_u:101.028c: agnir vāyuś ca somaś ca karmaṇāṃ phalabhāginaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:101.029a: śataṃ kratūnām āhṛtya devarāṭ tridivaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:101.029c: tapāṃsy ugrāṇi cāsthāya divaṃ yātā maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:101.030a: satyaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca parākramaṃ ca; bhūtānukampāṃ priyavāditāṃ ca
GE09ram_02_u:101.030c: dvijātidevātithipūjanaṃ ca; panthānam āhus tridivasya santaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:101.031a: dharme ratāḥ satpuruṣaiḥ sametās; tejasvino dānaguṇapradhānāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:101.031c: ahiṃsakā vītamalāś ca loke; bhavanti pūjyā munayaḥ pradhānāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:102.001a: kruddham ājñāya rāma tu vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:102.001e: nivartayitu kāmas tu tvām etad vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:102.002c: sarvaṃ salilam evāsīt pṛthivī yatra nirmitā
GE09ram_02_u:102.002e: tataḥ samabhavad brahmā svayambhūr daivataiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:102.003a: sa varāhas tato bhūtvā projjahāra vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_02_u:102.003c: asṛjac ca jagat sarvaṃ saha putraiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:102.004c: tasmān marīciḥ saṃjajñe marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:102.005a: vivasvān kaśyapāj jajñe manur vaivastavaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:102.005c: sa tu prajāpatiḥ pūrvam ikṣvākus tu manoḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:102.006a: yasyeyaṃ prathamaṃ dattā samṛddhā manunā mahī
GE09ram_02_u:102.006c: tam ikṣvākum ayodhyāyāṃ rājānaṃ viddhi pūrvakam
GE09ram_02_u:102.007a: ikṣvākos tu sutaḥ śrīmān kukṣir eveti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:102.008a: vikukṣes tu mahātejā bāṇaḥ putraḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_02_u:102.009a: nānā vṛṣṭir babhūvāsmin na durbhikṣaṃ satāṃ vare
GE09ram_02_u:102.009c: anaraṇye mahārāje taskaro vāpi kaś cana
GE09ram_02_u:102.010a: anaraṇyān mahābāhuḥ pṛthū rājā babhūva ha
GE09ram_02_u:102.010e: sa satyavacanād vīraḥ saśarīro divaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:102.013a: susaṃdher api putrau dvau dhruvasaṃdhiḥ prasenajit
GE09ram_02_u:102.014a: bharatāt tu mahābāhor asito nāma jāyata
GE09ram_02_u:102.014e: haihayās tālajaṅghāś ca śūrāś ca śaśabindavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:102.015a: tāṃs tu sarvān prativyūhya yuddhe rājā pravāsitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:102.015c: sa ca śailavare ramye babhūvābhirato muniḥ
GE09ram_02_u:102.015e: dve cāsya bhārye garbhiṇyau babhūvatur iti śrutiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:102.016c: tam ṛṣiṃ samupāgamya kālindī tv abhyavādayat
GE09ram_02_u:102.017a: sa tām abhyavadad vipro varepsuṃ putrajanmani
GE09ram_02_u:102.017c: tataḥ sā gṛham āgamya devī putraṃ vyajāyata
GE09ram_02_u:102.018a: sapatnyā tu garas tasyai datto garbhajighāṃsayā
GE09ram_02_u:102.018c: gareṇa saha tenaiva jātaḥ sa sagaro 'bhavat
GE09ram_02_u:102.019a: sa rājā sagaro nāma yaḥ samudram akhānayat
GE09ram_02_u:102.019c: iṣṭvā parvaṇi vegena trāsayantam imāḥ prajāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:102.020a: asamañjas tu putro 'bhūt sagarasyeti naḥ śrutam
GE09ram_02_u:102.020c: jīvann eva sa pitrā tu nirastaḥ pāpakarmakṛt
GE09ram_02_u:102.022a: bhagīrathāt kakutsthas tu kākutsthā yena tu smṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:102.022c: kakutsthasya tu putro 'bhūd raghur yena tu rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:102.023a: raghos tu putras tejasvī pravṛddhaḥ puruṣādakaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:102.023c: kalmāṣapādaḥ saudāsa ity evaṃ prathito bhuvi
GE09ram_02_u:102.024c: yas tu tad vīryam āsādya sahaseno vyanīnaśat
GE09ram_02_u:102.025a: śaṅkhaṇasya tu putro 'bhūc chūraḥ śrīmān sudarśanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:102.026a: śīghragasya maruḥ putro maroḥ putraḥ praśuśrukaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:102.028a: ajaś ca suvrataś caiva nābhāgasya sutāv ubhau
GE09ram_02_u:102.028c: ajasya caiva dharmātmā rājā daśarathaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:102.029a: tasya jyeṣṭho 'si dāyādo rāma ity abhiviśrutaḥ
