GE09ram_02_u:102.029c: tad gṛhāṇa svakaṃ rājyam avekṣasva jagan nṛpa
GE09ram_02_u:102.030a: ikṣvākūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ rājā bhavati pūrvajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:102.031a: sa rāghavāṇāṃ kuladharmam ātmanaḥ; sanātanaṃ nādya vihātum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:102.031c: prabhūtaratnām anuśādhi medinīṃ; prabhūtarāṣṭrāṃ pitṛvan mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:103.001a: vasiṣṭhas tu tadā rāmam uktvā rājapurohitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:103.002c: ācāryaś caiva kākutstha pitā mātā ca rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:103.003a: pitā hy enaṃ janayati puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:103.003c: prajñāṃ dadāti cācāryas tasmāt sa gurur ucyate
GE09ram_02_u:103.004a: sa te 'haṃ pitur ācāryas tava caiva paraṃtapa
GE09ram_02_u:103.004c: mama tvaṃ vacanaṃ kurvan nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim
GE09ram_02_u:103.005a: imā hi te pariṣadaḥ śreṇayaś ca samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:103.005c: eṣu tāta caran dharmaṃ nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim
GE09ram_02_u:103.006c: asyās tu vacanaṃ kurvan nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim
GE09ram_02_u:103.008a: evaṃ madhuram uktas tu guruṇā rāghavaḥ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:103.009a: yan mātāpitarau vṛttaṃ tanaye kurutaḥ sadā
GE09ram_02_u:103.009c: na supratikaraṃ tat tu mātrā pitrā ca yat kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:103.010c: nityaṃ ca priyavādena tathā saṃvardhanena ca
GE09ram_02_u:103.011a: sa hi rājā janayitā pitā daśaratho mama
GE09ram_02_u:103.011c: ājñātaṃ yan mayā tasya na tan mithyā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:103.012a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa bharataḥ pratyanantaram
GE09ram_02_u:103.013a: iha me sthaṇḍile śīghraṃ kuśān āstara sārathe
GE09ram_02_u:103.013c: āryaṃ pratyupavekṣyāmi yāvan me na prasīdati
GE09ram_02_u:103.014c: śeṣye purastāc chālāyā yāvan na pratiyāsyati
GE09ram_02_u:103.015a: sa tu rāmam avekṣantaṃ sumantraṃ prekṣya durmanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:103.016c: kiṃ māṃ bharata kurvāṇaṃ tāta pratyupavekṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:103.017a: brāhmaṇo hy ekapārśvena narān roddhum ihārhati
GE09ram_02_u:103.018c: puravaryām itaḥ kṣipram ayodhyāṃ yāhi rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:103.019a: āsīnas tv eva bharataḥ paurajānapadaṃ janam
GE09ram_02_u:103.019c: uvāca sarvataḥ prekṣya kim āryaṃ nānuśāsatha
GE09ram_02_u:103.020a: te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ paurajānapadā janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:103.021a: eṣo 'pi hi mahābhāgaḥ pitur vacasi tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_02_u:103.021c: ata eva na śaktāḥ smo vyāvartayitum añjasā
GE09ram_02_u:103.022a: teṣām ājñāya vacanaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:103.023a: etac caivobhayaṃ śrutvā samyak saṃpaśya rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:103.023c: uttiṣṭha tvaṃ mahābāho māṃ ca spṛśa tathodakam
GE09ram_02_u:103.024a: athotthāya jalaṃ spṛṣṭvā bharato vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:103.024c: śṛṇvantu me pariṣado mantriṇaḥ śreṇayas tathā
GE09ram_02_u:103.025a: na yāce pitaraṃ rājyaṃ nānuśāsāmi mātaram
GE09ram_02_u:103.026a: yadi tv avaśyaṃ vastavyaṃ kartavyaṃ ca pitur vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:103.026c: aham eva nivatsyāmi caturdaśa vane samāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:103.027a: dharmātmā tasya tathyena bhrātur vākyena vismitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:103.028a: vikrītam āhitaṃ krītaṃ yat pitrā jīvatā mama
GE09ram_02_u:103.028c: na tal lopayituṃ śakyaṃ mayā vā bharatena vā
GE09ram_02_u:103.029a: upadhir na mayā kāryo vanavāse jugupsitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:103.029c: yuktam uktaṃ ca kaikeyyā pitrā me sukṛtaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:103.031c: bhrātrā saha bhaviṣyāmi pṛthivyāḥ patir uttamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:103.032a: vṛto rājā hi kaikeyyā mayā tad vacanaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:104.002a: antarhitās tv ṛṣigaṇāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:104.003a: sa dhanyo yasya putrau dvau dharmajñau dharmavikramau
GE09ram_02_u:104.003c: śrutvā vayaṃ hi saṃbhāṣām ubhayoḥ spṛhayāmahe
GE09ram_02_u:104.004c: bharataṃ rājaśārdūlam ity ūcuḥ saṃgatā vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:104.005c: grāhyaṃ rāmasya vākyaṃ te pitaraṃ yady avekṣase
GE09ram_02_u:104.006a: sadānṛṇam imaṃ rāmaṃ vayam icchāmahe pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:104.006c: anṛṇatvāc ca kaikeyyāḥ svargaṃ daśaratho gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:104.007c: rājarṣayaś caiva tathā sarve svāṃ svāṃ gatiṃ gatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:104.009a: srastagātras tu bharataḥ sa vācā sajjamānayā
GE09ram_02_u:104.009c: kṛtāñjalir idaṃ vākyaṃ rāghavaṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:104.010c: kartum arhasi kākutstha mama mātuś ca yācanām
GE09ram_02_u:104.011a: rakṣituṃ sumahad rājyam aham ekas tu notsahe
GE09ram_02_u:104.012a: jñātayaś ca hi yodhāś ca mitrāṇi suhṛdaś ca naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:104.012c: tvām eva pratikāṅkṣante parjanyam iva karṣakāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:104.013a: idaṃ rājyaṃ mahāprājña sthāpaya pratipadya hi
GE09ram_02_u:104.014a: ity uktvā nyapatad bhrātuḥ pādayor bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:104.014c: bhṛśaṃ saṃprārthayām āsa rāmam evaṃ priyaṃ vadaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:104.015a: tam aṅke bhrātaraṃ kṛtvā rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:104.016a: āgatā tvām iyaṃ buddhiḥ svajā vainayikī ca yā
GE09ram_02_u:104.016c: bhṛśam utsahase tāta rakṣituṃ pṛthivīm api
GE09ram_02_u:104.017a: amātyaiś ca suhṛdbhiś ca buddhimadbhiś ca mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:104.018a: lakṣmīś candrād apeyād vā himavān vā himaṃ tyajet
GE09ram_02_u:104.018c: atīyāt sāgaro velāṃ na pratijñām ahaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:104.019a: kāmād vā tāta lobhād vā mātrā tubhyam idaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:104.019c: na tan manasi kartavyaṃ vartitavyaṃ ca mātṛvat
GE09ram_02_u:104.022a: so 'dhiruhya naravyāghraḥ pāduke hy avaruhya ca
GE09ram_02_u:104.023a: sa pāduke te bharataḥ pratāpavān; svalaṃkṛte saṃparigṛhya dharmavit
GE09ram_02_u:104.023c: pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva cakāra rāghavaṃ; cakāra caivottamanāgamūrdhani
GE09ram_02_u:104.024a: athānupūrvyāt pratipūjya taṃ janaṃ; gurūṃś ca mantriprakṛtīs tathānujau
GE09ram_02_u:104.024c: vyasarjayad rāghavavaṃśavardhanaḥ; sthitaḥ svadharme himavān ivācalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:104.025a: taṃ mātaro bāṣpagṛhītakaṇṭho; duḥkhena nāmantrayituṃ hi śekuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:104.025c: sa tv eva mātṝr abhivādya sarvā; rudan kuṭīṃ svāṃ praviveśa rāmaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:105.001a: tataḥ śirasi kṛtvā tu pāduke bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:105.002a: vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābāliś ca dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:105.003a: mandākinīṃ nadīṃ ramyāṃ prāṅmukhās te yayus tadā
GE09ram_02_u:105.004c: prayayau tasya pārśvena sasainyo bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:105.005c: āśramaṃ yatra sa munir bharadvājaḥ kṛtālayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:105.006a: sa tam āśramam āgamya bharadvājasya buddhimān
GE09ram_02_u:105.007a: tato hṛṣṭo bharadvājo bharataṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:105.007c: api kṛtyaṃ kṛtaṃ tāta rāmeṇa ca samāgatam
GE09ram_02_u:105.008a: evam uktas tu bharato bharadvājena dhīmatā
GE09ram_02_u:105.009a: sa yācyamāno guruṇā mayā ca dṛḍhavikramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:105.010a: pituḥ pratijñāṃ tām eva pālayiṣyāmi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:105.010c: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi ya pratijñā pitur mama
GE09ram_02_u:105.011a: evam ukto mahāprājño vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:105.013a: evam ukto vasiṣṭhena rāghavaḥ prāṅmukhaḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:105.013c: pāduke hemavikṛte mama rājyāya te dadau
GE09ram_02_u:105.014c: ayodhyām eva gacchāmi gṛhītvā pāduke śubhe
GE09ram_02_u:105.015a: etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharatasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:105.016c: yad āryaṃ tvayi tiṣṭhet tu nimne vṛṣṭim ivodakam
GE09ram_02_u:105.017a: amṛtaḥ sa mahābāhuḥ pitā daśarathas tava
GE09ram_02_u:105.017c: yasya tvam īdṛśaḥ putro dharmātmā dharmavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:105.018a: tam ṛṣiṃ tu mahātmānam uktavākyaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_02_u:105.019a: tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā bharadvājaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:105.019c: bharatas tu yayau śrīmān ayodhyāṃ saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:105.020a: yānaiś ca śakaṭaiś caiva hayaiś nāgaiś ca sā camūḥ
GE09ram_02_u:105.021a: tatas te yamunāṃ divyāṃ nadīṃ tīrtvormimālinīm
GE09ram_02_u:105.021c: dadṛśus tāṃ punaḥ sarve gaṅgāṃ śivajalāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:105.024a: sārathe paśya vidhvastā ayodhyā na prakāśate
GE09ram_02_u:106.008a: tyaktāṃ yajñāyudhaiḥ sarvair abhirūpaiś ca yājakaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:106.009a: goṣṭhamadhye sthitām ārtām acarantīṃ navaṃ tṛṇam
GE09ram_02_u:106.010c: viyuktāṃ maṇibhir jātyair navāṃ muktāvalīm iva
GE09ram_02_u:106.011a: sahasā calitāṃ sthānān mahīṃ puṇyakṣayād gatām
GE09ram_02_u:106.016c: bhūmau bāṇair viniṣkṛttāṃ patitāṃ jyām ivāyudhāt
GE09ram_02_u:106.019a: bharatas tu rathasthaḥ sañ śrīmān daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:106.020a: kiṃ nu khalv adya gambhīro mūrchito na niśamyate
GE09ram_02_u:106.022e: nedānīṃ śrūyate puryām asyāṃ rāme vivāsite
GE09ram_02_u:106.023a: taruṇaiś cāru veṣaiś ca narair unnatagāmibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:106.024a: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ jalpan viveśa vasatiṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:106.024c: tena hīnāṃ narendreṇa siṃhahīnāṃ guhām iva
GE09ram_02_u:107.001a: tato nikṣipya mātṝh sa ayodhyāyāṃ dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:107.002c: tatra duḥkham idaṃ sarvaṃ sahiṣye rāghavaṃ vinā
GE09ram_02_u:107.003a: gataś ca hi divaṃ rājā vanasthaś ca gurur mama
GE09ram_02_u:107.003c: rāmaṃ pratīkṣe rājyāya sa hi rājā mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:107.004a: etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharatasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:107.004c: abruvan mantriṇaḥ sarve vasiṣṭhaś ca purohitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:107.005a: sadṛśaṃ ślāghanīyaṃ ca yad uktaṃ bharata tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:107.007c: abravīt sārathiṃ vākyaṃ ratho me yujyatām iti
GE09ram_02_u:107.009a: āruhya tu rathaṃ śīghraṃ śatrughnabharatāv ubhau
GE09ram_02_u:107.010a: agrato puravas tatra vasiṣṭha pramukhā dvijāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:107.011c: prayayau bharate yāte sarve ca puravāsinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:107.012a: rathasthaḥ sa tu dharmātmā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:107.012c: nandigrāmaṃ yayau tūrṇaṃ śirasy ādhāya pāduke
GE09ram_02_u:107.013a: tatas tu bharataḥ kṣipraṃ nandigrāmaṃ praviśya saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:107.013c: avatīrya rathāt tūrṇaṃ gurūn idam uvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:107.014a: etad rājyaṃ mama bhrātrā dattaṃ saṃnyāsavat svayam
GE09ram_02_u:107.015a: kṣipraṃ saṃyojayitvā tu rāghavasya punaḥ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:107.015c: caraṇau tau tu rāmasya drakṣyāmi sahapādukau
GE09ram_02_u:107.017c: rājyaṃ cedam ayodhyāṃ ca dhūtapāpo bhavāmi ca
GE09ram_02_u:107.018c: prītir mama yaśaś caiva bhaved rājyāc caturguṇam
GE09ram_02_u:107.019a: evaṃ tu vilapan dīno bharataḥ sa mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:108.002c: rāmam āśritya niratās tān alakṣayad utsukān
GE09ram_02_u:108.003a: nayanair bhṛkuṭībhiś ca rāmaṃ nirdiśya śaṅkitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:108.003c: anyonyam upajalpantaḥ śanaiś cakrur mithaḥ kathāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:108.004a: teṣām autsukyam ālakṣya rāmas tv ātmani śaṅkitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:108.005a: na kaccid bhagavan kiṃ cit pūrvavṛttam idaṃ mayi
GE09ram_02_u:108.006a: pramādāc caritaṃ kaccit kiṃ cin nāvarajasya me
GE09ram_02_u:108.007c: pramadābhyucitāṃ vṛttiṃ sītā yuktaṃ na vartate
GE09ram_02_u:108.008a: atharṣir jarayā vṛddhas tapasā ca jarāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:108.010a: tvannimittam idaṃ tāvat tāpasān prati vartate
GE09ram_02_u:108.010c: rakṣobhyas tena saṃvignāḥ kathayanti mithaḥ kathāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:108.011a: rāvaṇāvarajaḥ kaś cit kharo nāmeha rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:108.012a: dhṛṣṭaś ca jitakāśī ca nṛśaṃsaḥ puruṣādakaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:108.012c: avaliptaś ca pāpaś ca tvāṃ ca tāta na mṛṣyate
GE09ram_02_u:108.013a: tvaṃ yadā prabhṛti hy asminn āśrame tāta vartase
GE09ram_02_u:108.014a: darśayanti hi bībhatsaiḥ krūrair bhīṣaṇakair api
GE09ram_02_u:108.014c: nānā rūpair virūpaiś ca rūpair asukhadarśanaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:108.015c: pratighnanty aparān kṣipram anāryāḥ purataḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:108.016a: teṣu teṣv āśramasthāneṣv abuddham avalīya ca
GE09ram_02_u:108.019a: tat purā rāma śārīrām upahiṃsāṃ tapasviṣu
GE09ram_02_u:108.019c: darśayati hi duṣṭās te tyakṣyāma imam āśramam
GE09ram_02_u:108.021a: kharas tvayy api cāyuktaṃ purā tāta pravartate
GE09ram_02_u:108.021c: sahāsmābhir ito gaccha yadi buddhiḥ pravartate
GE09ram_02_u:108.022a: sakalatrasya saṃdeho nityaṃ yat tasya rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:108.022c: samarthasyāpi hi sato vāso duḥkha ihādya te
GE09ram_02_u:108.023a: ity uktavantaṃ rāmas taṃ rājaputras tapasvinam
GE09ram_02_u:108.024c: sa jagāmāśramaṃ tyaktvā kulaiḥ kulapatiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:108.025a: rāmaḥ saṃsādhya tv ṛṣigaṇam anugamanād; deśāt tasmāccit kulapatim abhivādyarṣim
GE09ram_02_u:108.025c: samyakprītais tair anumata upadiṣṭārthaḥ; puṇyaṃ vāsāya svanilayam upasaṃpede
GE09ram_02_u:108.026a: āśramaṃ tv ṛṣivirahitaṃ prabhuḥ; kṣaṇam api na jahau sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:108.026c: rāghavaṃ hi satatam anugatās; tāpasāś carṣicaritadhṛtaguṇāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:109.001c: na tatrārocayad vāsaṃ kāraṇair bahubhis tadā
GE09ram_02_u:109.002a: iha me bharato dṛṣṭo mātaraś ca sanāgarāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:109.002c: sā ca me smṛtir anveti tān nityam anuśocataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:109.004a: tasmād anyatra gacchāma iti saṃcintya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:109.004c: prātiṣṭhata sa vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca saṃgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:109.005a: so 'trer āśramam āsādya taṃ vavande mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:109.005c: taṃ cāpi bhagavān atriḥ putravat pratyapadyata
GE09ram_02_u:109.006a: svayam ātithyam ādiśya sarvam asya susatkṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:109.006c: saumitriṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ sītāṃ ca samasāntvayat
GE09ram_02_u:109.007a: patnīṃ ca tam anuprāptāṃ vṛddhām āmantrya satkṛtām
GE09ram_02_u:109.009c: daśa varṣāṇy anāvṛṣṭyā dagdhe loke nirantaram
GE09ram_02_u:109.010a: yayā mūlaphale sṛṣṭe jāhnavī ca pravartitā
GE09ram_02_u:109.010c: ugreṇa tapasā yuktā niyamaiś cāpy alaṃkṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:109.012c: daśarātraṃ kṛtvā rātriḥ seyaṃ māteva te 'nagha
GE09ram_02_u:109.014a: evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ tathety uktvā sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:109.014c: sītām uvāca dharmajñām idaṃ vacanam uttamam
GE09ram_02_u:109.015a: rājaputri śrutaṃ tv etan muner asya samīritam
GE09ram_02_u:109.016a: anasūyeti yā loke karmabhiḥ kyātim āgatā
GE09ram_02_u:109.016c: tāṃ śīghram abhigaccha tvam abhigamyāṃ tapasvinīm
GE09ram_02_u:109.017a: sītā tv etad vacaḥ śrutvā rāghavasya hitaiṣiṇī
GE09ram_02_u:109.019a: tāṃ tu sītā mahābhāgām anasūyāṃ pativratām
GE09ram_02_u:109.020a: abhivādya ca vaidehī tāpasīṃ tām aninditām
GE09ram_02_u:109.021a: tataḥ sītāṃ mahābhāgāṃ dṛṣṭvā tāṃ dharmacāriṇīm
GE09ram_02_u:109.021c: sāntvayanty abravīd dhṛṣṭā diṣṭyā dharmam avekṣase
GE09ram_02_u:109.022a: tyaktvā jñātijanaṃ sīte mānam ṛddhiṃ ca mānini
GE09ram_02_u:109.022c: avaruddhaṃ vane rāmaṃ diṣṭyā tvam anugacchasi
GE09ram_02_u:109.023a: nagarastho vanastho vā pāpo vā yadi vāśubhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:109.023c: yāsāṃ strīṇāṃ priyo bhartā tāsāṃ lokā mahodayāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:109.024a: duḥśīlaḥ kāmavṛtto vā dhanair vā parivarjitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:109.024c: strīṇām ārya svabhāvānāṃ paramaṃ daivataṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:109.025a: nāto viśiṣṭaṃ paśyāmi bāndhavaṃ vimṛśanty aham
GE09ram_02_u:109.025c: sarvatra yogyaṃ vaidehi tapaḥ kṛtam ivāvyayam
GE09ram_02_u:109.026a: na tv evam avagacchanti guṇa doṣam asat striyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:109.027a: prāpnuvanty ayaśaś caiva dharmabhraṃśaṃ ca maithili
GE09ram_02_u:109.027c: akārya vaśam āpannāḥ striyo yāḥ khalu tad vidhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:109.028c: striyaḥ svarge cariṣyanti yathā puṇyakṛtas tathā
GE09ram_02_u:110.001a: sā tv evam uktā vaidehī anasūyān asūyayā
GE09ram_02_u:110.002a: naitad āścaryam āryāyā yan māṃ tvam anubhāṣase
GE09ram_02_u:110.002c: viditaṃ tu mamāpy etad yathā nāryāḥ patir guruḥ
GE09ram_02_u:110.003a: yady apy eṣa bhaved bhartā mamārye vṛttavarjitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:110.003c: advaidham upavartavyas tathāpy eṣa mayā bhavet
GE09ram_02_u:110.004a: kiṃ punar yo guṇaślāghyaḥ sānukrośo jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:110.005a: yāṃ vṛttiṃ vartate rāmaḥ kausalyāyāṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:110.005c: tām eva nṛpanārīṇām anyāsām api vartate
GE09ram_02_u:110.006a: sakṛd dṛṣṭāsv api strīṣu nṛpeṇa nṛpavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:110.006c: mātṛvad vartate vīro mānam utsṛjya dharmavit
GE09ram_02_u:110.007a: āgacchantyāś ca vijanaṃ vanam evaṃ bhayāvaham
GE09ram_02_u:110.007c: samāhitaṃ hi me śvaśrvā hṛdaye yat sthitaṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:110.008a: prāṇipradānakāle ca yat purā tv agnisaṃnidhau
GE09ram_02_u:110.008c: anuśiṣṭā jananyāsmi vākyaṃ tad api me dhṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:110.009a: navīkṛtaṃ tu tat sarvaṃ vākyais te dharmacāriṇi
GE09ram_02_u:110.010c: tathā vṛttiś ca yātā tvaṃ patiśuśrūṣayā divam
GE09ram_02_u:110.011a: variṣṭhā sarvanārīṇām eṣā ca divi devatā
GE09ram_02_u:110.011c: rohiṇī ca vinā candraṃ muhūrtam api dṛśyate
GE09ram_02_u:110.013c: śirasy āghrāya covāca maithilīṃ harṣayanty uta
GE09ram_02_u:110.014a: niyamair vividhair āptaṃ tapo hi mahad asti me
GE09ram_02_u:110.014c: tat saṃśritya balaṃ sīte chandaye tvāṃ śucivrate
GE09ram_02_u:110.015a: upapannaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca vacanaṃ tava maithili
GE09ram_02_u:110.015c: prītā cāsmy ucitaṃ kiṃ te karavāṇi bravīhi me
GE09ram_02_u:110.016a: sā tv evam uktā dharmajñā tayā prītatarābhavat
GE09ram_02_u:110.016c: saphalaṃ ca praharṣaṃ te hanta sīte karomy aham
GE09ram_02_u:110.017a: idaṃ divyaṃ varaṃ mālyaṃ vastram ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:110.018a: mayā dattam idaṃ sīte tava gātrāṇi śobhayet
GE09ram_02_u:110.019c: śobhayiṣyāmi bhartāraṃ yathā śrīr viṣṇum avyayam
GE09ram_02_u:110.020a: sā vastram aṅgarāgaṃ ca bhūṣaṇāni srajas tathā
GE09ram_02_u:110.021a: pratigṛhya ca tat sītā prītidānaṃ yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:110.022c: vacanaṃ praṣṭum ārebhe kathāṃ kāṃ cid anupriyām
GE09ram_02_u:110.023a: svayaṃvare kila prāptā tvam anena yaśasvinā
GE09ram_02_u:110.023c: rāghaveṇeti me sīte kathā śrutim upāgatā
GE09ram_02_u:110.024a: tāṃ kathāṃ śrotum icchāmi vistareṇa ca maithili
GE09ram_02_u:110.024c: yathānubhūtaṃ kārtsnyena tan me tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:110.025a: evam uktā tu sā sītā tāṃ tato dharmacāriṇīm
GE09ram_02_u:110.025c: śrūyatām iti coktvā vai kathayām āsa tāṃ kathām
GE09ram_02_u:110.027c: ahaṃ kilotthitā bhittvā jagatīṃ nṛpateḥ sutā
GE09ram_02_u:110.029a: anapatyena ca snehād aṅkam āropya ca svayam
GE09ram_02_u:110.029c: mameyaṃ tanayety uktvā sneho mayi nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:110.030a: antarikṣe ca vāg uktāpratimā mānuṣī kila
GE09ram_02_u:110.030c: evam etan narapate dharmeṇa tanayā tava
GE09ram_02_u:110.031a: tataḥ prahṛṣṭo dharmātmā pitā me mithilādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:110.031c: avāpto vipulām ṛddhiṃ mām avāpya narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:110.033a: patisaṃyogasulabhaṃ vayo dṛṣṭvā tu me pitā
GE09ram_02_u:110.034a: sadṛśāc cāpakṛṣṭāc ca loke kanyāpitā janāt
GE09ram_02_u:110.036a: ayonijāṃ hi māṃ jñātvā nādhyagacchat sa cintayan
GE09ram_02_u:110.036c: sadṛśaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca mahīpālaḥ patiṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:110.037a: tasya buddhir iyaṃ jātā cintayānasya saṃtatam
GE09ram_02_u:110.038c: dattaṃ dhanurvaraṃ prītyā tūṇī cākṣayya sāyakau
GE09ram_02_u:110.039a: asaṃcālyaṃ manuṣyaiś ca yatnenāpi ca gauravāt
GE09ram_02_u:110.039c: tan na śaktā namayituṃ svapneṣv api narādhipāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:110.040a: tad dhanuḥ prāpya me pitrā vyāhṛtaṃ satyavādinā
GE09ram_02_u:110.041a: idaṃ ca dhanur udyamya sajyaṃ yaḥ kurute naraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:110.041c: tasya me duhitā bhāryā bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:110.042a: tac ca dṛṣṭvā dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ gauravād girisaṃnibham
GE09ram_02_u:110.042c: abhivādya nṛpā jagmur aśaktās tasya tolane
GE09ram_02_u:110.044c: viśvāmitras tu dharmātmā mama pitrā supūjitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:110.045e: ity uktas tena vipreṇa tad dhanuḥ samupānayat
GE09ram_02_u:110.046c: jyāṃ samāropya jhaṭiti pūrayām āsa vīryavān
GE09ram_02_u:110.047a: tena pūrayatā vegān madhye bhagnaṃ dvidhā dhanuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:110.050a: tataḥ śvaśuram āmantrya vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_02_u:110.050c: mama pitrā ahaṃ dattā rāmāya viditātmane
GE09ram_02_u:110.051c: bhāryārthe lakṣmaṇasyāpi dattā pitrā mama svayam
GE09ram_02_u:110.052a: evaṃ dattāsmi rāmāya tadā tasmin svayaṃ vare
GE09ram_02_u:110.052c: anuraktā ca dharmeṇa patiṃ vīryavatāṃ varam
GE09ram_02_u:111.001a: anasūyā tu dharmajñā śrutvā tāṃ mahatīṃ kathām
GE09ram_02_u:111.002c: yathā svayaṃvaraṃ vṛttaṃ tat sarvaṃ hi śrutaṃ mayā
GE09ram_02_u:111.003a: rame 'haṃ kathayā te tu dṛṣḍhaṃ madhurabhāṣiṇi
GE09ram_02_u:111.003c: ravir astaṃ gataḥ śrīmān upohya rajanīṃ śivām
GE09ram_02_u:111.007c: viprakṛṣṭe 'pi ye deśe na prakāśanti vai diśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:111.011a: alaṃkuru ca tāvat tvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ mama maithili
GE09ram_02_u:111.012c: praṇamya śirasā tasyai rāmaṃ tv abhimukhī yayau
GE09ram_02_u:111.013a: tathā tu bhūṣitāṃ sītāṃ dadarśa vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:111.014a: nyavedayat tataḥ sarvaṃ sītā rāmāya maithilī
GE09ram_02_u:111.015a: prahṛṣṭas tv abhavad rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:111.016a: tatas tāṃ sarvarīṃ prītaḥ puṇyāṃ śaśinibhānanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:111.018a: tāv ūcus te vanacarās tāpasā dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:111.019a: eṣa panthā maharṣīṇāṃ phalāny āharatāṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:111.019c: anena tu vanaṃ durgaṃ gantuṃ rāghava te kṣamam
GE09ram_02_u:111.020a: itīva taiḥ prāñjalibhis tapasvibhir; dvijaiḥ kṛtasvastyayanaḥ paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:111.020c: vanaṃ sabhāryaḥ praviveśa rāghavaḥ; salakṣmaṇaḥ sūrya ivābhramaṇḍalam
